mngon shes yon tan rgyal po dang/ chos kyi sna ma'i mi tog char 'bebs dang/ 'od byed dang/ lhun po mngon par 'phags dang/ chos yang dag 'phags rgyal po dri med dang/
spos kyi dbang phyug dang/ dri med spyan dang/ rab tu che bsags dang/ thogs med stobs kyi rgyal po dang/ rang gi yashes bsod nams stobs dang/ yashes chos gos dang/
dbang sgyur dang/ chags med phanabazhod dang/ ye shes yang dag 'byung dang lhun po chen po dang/ stobs kyi snying po dang/ yon tan 'byung gnas dang/ 'khri shing ma tog rgyal mtshan/
dang yon tan 'od dang/ gti mug rnam bral yon tan rgyal po dang/ rdo rje mchog dang/ chos kyi tog dang/ dbyangs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang/ legs sbas dang/ rdo rje rgyal
mtshan dang/ rin chen dbang phyug dang/ mngon 'phags rgyal mtshan dang/ ri bo lta bu dang/ dga' spran dang/ chos byed dang/ sA la'i rgyal po dang/ kun sbopa dang/
@#// rgya mtsho'i rgyal po dang/ yi shes yang dag bsags dang/ ye shes 'od 'phro dang/ me tog tshogs can dang/ glang po che'i dbang po' debang phyug dang/ u dum wA Na'i
ma tog dang/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ sgrogs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ tsan dan dang/ shan tu brtan pa dang/ mthus gnonadang/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i sgron/
ma dang/ yongashes go ramis dang/ rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan dang/ rnam rgyal chos grags dang/ nga rgyal sgrogs dang/ yon tan 'od 'phro dang/ ye shes 'od dang/ ye shes sgor ma dang/
bde ba'i rgyal po dang/ ye shes dbyangs dang/ rgyal mtshan bsdus pa dang/ rje ba sgron ma dung/ bkod pa'i rgyal po dang/ rgyal ba'i grangs dang/ rab tu brtan pa dang/ blo gros zla ba'i
rgyal po dang/ rim gyis sgrogs pa'i rgyal po dang/ sA la' dbang po seng ge 'i sku dang/ sredamod kyi bus rnam pa ra rgyal ba'i snying po dang/ yon tan 'an chen yang dag bsags dang skarama'i
snyange po dang/ skar ma rnams 'jig grags pa dang/ bsod nams stobs la'i rgyal po dang/ yade ngu'ong ba'adebyas dang/ tshangs mchog dang/ yul 'khor srung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//
gzhan yang stong na skyes kyi pad+ma rnam rgyal grags pa 'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dang/ 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba dang/ snang ba'i rgyal po dang/ skyes kyi pad+madam pa'i shugs dang/ yon tan
rgya mtsho'i mtha' yas ye shes bla ma dang/ 'dzam bu'i grub ma dang/ yon tan ri ba'i rgyal mtshan dang/ seng ge 'i tog dang/ klus spangs me teg gza brjidi rgyal po dang/ dri ma sa bon bdagam

dang/ yon tan bdud rtsi gzi brjid rgyal po lta bu zhes bya ba dag tu 'gyur ro// gzhan yang stong na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas chos byon rgyal po klu dbang rnam grol
sad byed 'jig rten rgya mtsho'i mog gi rab zhes bya ba sha stag tu 'gyur ti 'adzrage rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu nyi ma gcig dang/ dus gcig du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung/

chub mngon par rdzogs pa ra 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing/ de dag gi che tshad na bar gyi bskal pa bcur 'gyur ro// srog chags khri pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po' zhabs la yan lag
lngas mgo bos gtugs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ klu ltar brtan par sgrogs dag re zhagi longs// dge ba'i nor rnams dag na yang dag sogs gyasel//
pha rol phyin pa rnams la myur du brtson gyis dang// lha ma 'jig rten rnams kyi 'dren pa dag tu 'gyur// theg pa chen po snying rje bad+madakar po las bam po bdun ma// 'gis kyi bu de nas

bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu dgu ba sdig med ces bya ba la smras pa dang/ snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klungag bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag bzhugs te 'tshozhing gzhes pa rnams bdag ga dbangalags/
par 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gas bya chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par bgyi ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dras gang bdag gis khyod kyi spyan sngar byang chub sems bskyed pa nas/ banamad pa yang dag
par rdzogos pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur ba de'i bar du bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'gyod pa'i sems skyed par ma gyur cig/ byang chub sems kyi
mthar thug pa nye bar bzung pa'i bar du dam bcas pa nga rtan 'ang dza skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyi par gyur cig/ sems can gzhan gyi sems 'khrug par ma brgyud par gyur cig/ bdag nyan thos
dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg bar sems mi skyed bar gyur cige/ 'dod chags kyi sims dang/ soms las byung ba skya bar ma gyur cig/ rmugs pa dang gnyid dang ldan par ma gyur na//
rgod pa dang ldan par ma gyur cig/ 'gyod pa dang ldan bar ma gyur cage/ the tshom dang ldan par ma gyur cigaM/ byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
srog gcod pa ma mchis pa dang/ ma byin par len pa ma mchis pa dang/ mi tshangs par spyod pa ma mchis pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba ma mchis pa dang/ phra ma mchis pa dang/ ngag rtsub
po ma mchis pa dang/ tshagi rkyal pa ma mchis pa dang/ brnab sems ma mchis pa dang/ gnod sems ma mchis pa dang/ log par lta ba ma mchis pa dang/ the tshom dang ldan pa ma
mchis pa dang/ chos la ma gus pa'i sems ma mchis pa dang/ slu ba'i sems ma mchis shang chos de dag ma mchis par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi mthar thug pa nye bar bzung ba'i bar du gom pa
'dor ba tsam la yang rtag tu sas rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sems dang sems las byungab dag 'jug bar gyurag/ bdag byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar dusangs rgyas mthong ba dang/ chos nyan pa dang/
dge 'dunal bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang mi bral bar gyur cig/ tshe rabs thams ci dadu yang rab tu 'byung ba thob par gyur cig/ tshe rabs thams cad duphyag dar khrod par gyurag/ chos gos
gsum pa dang/ shang drung ba dang/ tsog bu pa dang/ dgon pa ba dang/ bsod snyomasaM pa dang/ 'dod pa chung ba dang/ chog shes pa dang/ chos ston pa dang/ tshig
btsan pa dang/ spobs padopag tu ma mchis pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba 'byung bar ma gyur cig/ brdzun du sba ba dang ldan pa'i tshig rnams kyis phas kyi rgol ba 'dul
bar ma gyur cig/ bud med la stongapa nyid dang ldan pa'i chos ston par ma gyur cig/ stong po nyid yid la bgyodebs bud med la chos ston par ma gyur cig/ lag pa sgyur zhing chos ston par
ma gyur cig/ rtag tu bdag theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes skyedabar gyur bdag chos sna kha gang la chos nyan pa
nad la ston pa'i 'du shes kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par gyur cig/ bdag chos sna bdu la de bzhanugshegs pa la dza lta ba de ltar rim gro brgyad pa dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyidi ba dang bla mar bgyid pa
dang ratshor brgyade ba dang/ mchod pa bgyid par gyur cig/ chos skya ba la bdag gis sha dag gi bar dgags kyang bsnyen bkur bgyidabar gyur cig/ bdag snod dang snod ma lags par mi rtog
par sbyin pa sbyin par gyur cig/ bdag chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par gyur cig/ bdag chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna'is mas dang sams las byung ba gas+yad nga ra ma gyur cig/ bdag byang chub
don duganyer ba'i soms can rnams la rang gi srog gi sbyin pas yongs su skyob par gyur cig/ bdag nyid kyi brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang/ smon lam gyis nye bar bsgrubs pa'i rdzas kyis
sems can rnams sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams sdug bsngal rag las yongs su thar bar bgyid par gyur cig/ badrag rab tu byung ba'i rtags can nam/ khyim pa'icugs can ltung ba byung
ba las/ ltung ba ma byung ba dag la skul bar bgyid par ma gyur cig/ bdag rgyud pa dang/ bkur sti dang/ tshags su bcad pa dag la rtag tume dang/ dug dang mtshon cha lta bur
'du shes skyed par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab pa' smon lam 'di dag byang chub kyi mthar thug la nye bar
bzung ba'i bar du yang dag par 'grub ba'agyurab stan/ de'i slad du bdag gi sug pa gnyis su lha'i 'khor lo nipo che rtsibs stong mchas ba lte ba dang bcas pa/ mukhyud dang bcas ga
zhima' kha dog ltar 'od gsal ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ rgyal bu sdog mad kyis tshagi dos mthag tu lag pa gnyis su jilta 'dod pa dalta bu'i 'khor lo dag byung bar gyur ba dang/
mang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub kyi mthar thugag bar du bdag gi rab 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i srodadu 'khor lo' dag/ 'di ltar
thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag sgrus mngon par go bar bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lung ston pa/ dran pa mi brjed pa'i ye shes mthong/ stong pa nyid sgom pa la spyod pa
sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod du stsal ba'i slad du/ dza ltar klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang/ nye dga' bo gnyis ma ba de lta bu'i sgra gsang mthon pos sas rgyas kyi zhing
stages ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa dag tumache bar gyur cig/ gang dag der skyes pa'i sems can dadag thamasacad kyi rna ba'i dbangapo drag tu yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par gyur cig/
00 @#/// grags mthag tu yang sems can de dag gi 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ zhe sdang dang gti mug dang/ nga rgyal dang ( phrag dreg dang/ sar sna rab tu zhi bar gyur/
cig/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yade la baspyod pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu rgyu la bu sdug mdakyis 'khor lo ni
po che de dag btang ba dang/ de dag 'daltar mgyogs par song ste/ 'di lta ste dpalan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mgyogs pas gshegs pa de bzhin du lo la ni po che de dag kyang song ste
phyogs bcusangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu song nas/ sems can rnams byang chub sems dang ba lung ston pa/ dran pa ma brjod pa'i yashes mthong ba/

steng pa nyid bsgom pa la spyod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi chos kyi rnam gras 'ad spyod du bcug go/ sems can gang dgag rnab 'debangakhor chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi
'dod chags dang/ sir sna'i bar gyi sams ngang sems las byung ba dag rab tu zhi bar gyur cige/ thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi yi shes kyi yul yade la byed pas/ blun mang pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'khor lo de dag kyang yud tsam gcig gis phyir log ste/ rgyal bu sdig med kyi mdun du 'dug go/ rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
ba/ bane po tsho'i snying pos rgyal bu sdug med la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'gos kyi bu legs solags so// khyod kyis na smon lam shun tu bzang po btab ste/ lha'i 'khor lo rin po che 'dadeg kyang

sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong dag/tu btang bas na/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag rnyog pa med pasogs dag la bkod cing byang chub yang dag par 'an du brtag pasazha/
gis kyi bu de'i phyir khyod ma 'khrugs pa zhes bya bar gyur cig/ ma 'khrugs ba khyod ni 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren bar gyur gyis/ mi 'khrugs pa khyod kyiso sos rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
lta bu dag 'dod pa la shig/ ma 'khrugs pas gsol pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdagan jo ltar sa gzhi thams cad gsar las grub cing la ga mthil ltar mnyam la lha'i nor bu rin po cha rnam
par bkral ba gsog ma dang/ rgyu mo dag ma mchis pa/ gor ma'i sa ba dang/ phabongadang/ 'a dgAm mchis shang gtsalan da kaltar reg na bde'ang 'jam la/ rkang mtha bzhi g nan
nams shes brgyud/ rkang mthil btog na nib ces bgyid pa de lta bu ' sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan bkod pa dag 'tshal te/ don sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/
gshin rje'i 'jige rten dang/ yi ngogs kyi yul dag ma mchis par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas zhing don drang ba dag ma mchis par gyur la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing da lta'i las shin tu 'das pa'i
sngosakyis khyab par gyucig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing da lta'i mi rtog man+da ra ba dang/ man+da ra ba chen bo dag gis kun du gang bar gyur cig/ dan sems can rnams la sgrub dang/
nad dang bgum pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ gtsag gas gtsag 'jigs pa ma mchis pa dang/ gcig la gcag tho 'tshams pa ma mchis pa dang/ sems can rnams la dus malags par
'gum pa ma mchis pa dang/ 'gyod cing 'gum pa ma mchis pa dang/ mnyam bar ma bzhag par 'gum pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ den sems can rnams sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yod la

bgyid par gyur cage/ ngan 'gro rnams su skya bar ma gyur cagi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa stong pa rnams su skya bar ma gyur cig// byang chub cing yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du
sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar gyur cagi/ chos nyan pa dang/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig/ den sems can rnams 'dangags chung ba dang/
zhe sdang chung ba dang/ gti mug chung bar gyur cig/ den thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi le ma yang dag par blangs nas gnas par gyur cig/ sas rgyas kyi zhing den sems can rnams
bzo bgyid par ma gyur cig/ de na ngan song gi rgyu mtshan machas par ma gyur cage// da na sems can rnams la bdud kyis glags rnyed pa'i lam ma mchis par gyur cig/ de na sems can rnams
la ma dog ngan pa ma mchis ba gyur cig/ den sems can rnams la 'di lta ste/ rje bo dang/ bran gyi rim pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ den sems can rnams la bdag gi bam mchis shang yongs
su 'dzan pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ de na nyan thos dang byang chub sams dpa' rnams la tha nagayar lam na yang khu ba 'byin pa ma mchis par gyur cagi/ den sems can ljams cad chos 'chal
ba dang/ chos yongs su tshol ba lhur len par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can 'agab yang log par lta bar ma 'gyur zhing/ gzhan mu stegs can yang ma mchis par gyur cig/
dun sems can rnams la lus ngal ba ma mchis shape/ sems ngal ba ma mchis par gyur cig/ de nasems can de dag thams cad mngon par shes ba lnga dang ldan par gyur cag/ de na sams
can thams cad la bkres pa dang/ skom pa dang/ rnam par tho 'tshams pa ma mchis par gyur cig/ ji ltar 'dongob na spyod pa'i lha rnams bzhin du kha zas ji lta bu dag 'tshol bar 'gyur ba de lta bu/
dag mdun du rin po che'i snod dag nas 'byung bar gyur cig/ bshang ba dang/ gci dang/ stabs dang mchi ma dang/ lus kyi rdul dgam mtshase bar gyur cig/ den grang ba ma mchis
pa dang/ tshab ma mchis bar gyuracig/ drabida' ba dang/ nyams dga' bar gyur cig/ don reg na bde ba'i bser ma dag ldang bar 'gyur zhing/ de dag lha dang ma rnams kyi sa
kyi bya ba bgyid par gyur cig/ gang gi tsho 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang/ ji lta bur 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang/ gang gi tshog cig nabasar ma bsal ba 'tshal la/ gcig
shos na dron po 'tshal ba dang/ la la ut+pala'i dro bda' ba'athesar ma 'tshalal/ lalanatsin ngan sbrul gyi snyingapo'i dri bda' ba'i bser ma 'tshal ba dang/ lal na dus kyisarjes su'athab/
'a ba' tsan dan gyi dribadu' ba dang/ la la ni rgya spos kyi dra bida'ab dang/ la la na a ka ru'i dra bda' ba'i sar ma 'chel la/ la lan thams cad kyi thams cad dubasar ma ye mi'atshal bar/
'gyur na yang/ de dug gas ji ltar se mas bskyed cing ngamages pa de bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de spugs ma lnga dang bral bar gyur cig/ den
sems can rnams la riri po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa drag mtshos par 'gyur la khang pa brtsegs pa de dgun/ gang du ma dag mchis par 'gyur bar rinapo che sna bdun gyi khri/
rgyudang bal gyis sngas 'jam po dag gis kun dugayogs shang/ ka tsa lan da ke ltar reg na 'jam pa dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi khor yug dag tu gang mid
rag chab kyi bya ba bgyid par 'gyur bar yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chab kyis yongs su bltams pa'idzinge dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ sna ma'i me tog gseshang/ shing ta la dang/
0 bang ldan pa'i phreng ba dag gses brgyan par gyur cig// shingeljon pa drangag kyang me tog sna tshogs dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs dang/ prasna tshogs dang/ gos sna dang gdugs sna tshogs dang//

mu tage garkyen phreng sna tshogs dang/ rgyus sna tshogs dag gsubargyan par gyur cage/ ngan sems can rnams gos dngargyun ji lta bu 'tshalabadag dpag bsam gyi shang dadag las blangs tegyon pa 'gyur cig/
de bzhin dume tog rnams dang/ rgyan dag gi par yang blangs te/ thogs par gyur cig/ bdagagabyang chub kyi shi nariripo che sna bdun las grub par gyur la/ 'phang dur dpag tshad stong mcha/
sdong po sboms sun dpag tshadagatsagi mchas/ yal gagyesapali khyon duyang dpag tshad stongamams par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi shange de bsir mas bskyod pa las/ pha rol du phyin pa dang/ mnganopa
shes pa dang/ dbang po dang stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra/ lhalas shar tu 'dus pa 'jam zhing yid du 'ong bdag 'byung bar 'ag/ sems can gang dag gse sku ngadzes pa ba gyur/
bde dag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyi dran pa sosor thob par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi tshongedan/ budamed rnams ni 'di lta ste dparab gyi/ dga' ldan gyi 'os kya lha'i bu mo lta ra yonaton
thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig/ de na bud med rnams la drang ba ma mtshesishang/ lce gnyis dang phrag dog dang/ sorasnadakris pa ma mchas pagyu cagi/ dema rnams bud med dang ltar cig du
lus sbyor zhing 'khrig pa spyod pa ma mas par gyur cig/ den skyes pagang dag kun tu chags pa'i sims sa par gyur na/ demachas te 'gadu chags pa'i sims skyes par gyuran/ nga mchas/

te kun tu chags pa'i sems kyis yudatsam zhig bud med la bltas pas/ skyes pa'i 'dod chagasarab tu zhabir gyur nas/ shani tu yid byung ste/ slar ldogatsangegatsangams rdul dang bralaba'i tange nge 'dzani thob pa
gyur cig dang tang 'dzanadas bdud kyi zhogs pa dag las yongs su grol nas/ slanachad 'dodogs kyi sems ma skye bar gyur cig/ dan bud ma gang lags pa de dag kun duchags pas skyes pa la brtag
btsam gyis sbrum par 'gyu mnang/ brtags pa tsam gyis gnyis ka'i 'dod chagasarab tu zhi bar gyur tsage/ mngal na gnas pa'i khyi'u'am/ bu mo gang lags pa de dag kyang/ 'di lta ste dper bgyi ne/
sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa dang/ rab tu dga' bar bgyid pa'i lus dang/ sams rgyabab myong ba de lta bu'i lus dang/ soms kyi bde ba myong bar gyuratsagi/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing

nganamangal na gnas pa'i khye'u dang/ bu mo dag gdugs mtshan bdun du nga lta bu'i bde ba nyams sumyobaragyur cig/ budamad sbrum ma de dag kyang/ 'di lta ste bar bgyi'o/ dge slong bsam gtan gnyis pa la/
snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bu'i bde ba myong bar gyur cig/ sems can de dag kyang mngal gyi drim dang/ mi gtsang bas gosaM par ma 'gyur zhing/ dgungabadun pa la mchog tu dri bda' ba dang/ bde ba'i

[as/]yo byad dam pa dang ldan zhani dubatsa' bar gyur cig/ bungamed de yang sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar ma 'gyu pa'i ngeganyis ka rdzing bur zhugs te/ khrus bgyid nas/ bud med des gang gas 'deng chags pasprubral ba gtsang

ba'i ting nge 'dzan thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dran pa thob par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzani des 'ded chags kyi chos rnamalas yongs su grol zhing rtag par rgyun du mnyam par bzhag par gyur cig/ gangags tshe rabs snga

ma dag la bskal pa bye ba phrag mang po ra bud med kyi lus nyams su myong bar 'gyu lab de lta bu'i las bgyis sharibasags pa gang lags pas kyang/ tang nge 'dzan de mngon bar bsgrubs pas bud med kyis lus

thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su bas par 'gyulagang yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du slan chad bud med kyi lus ma thob par gyuratsagi/ sems can gang dag gas gang gis slad du bskal pa brgya nga nga

las 'dus pa dag du mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal nyamasasumyong bar 'gyu ba de lta bu 'alas bgyis shingebasags pa de dag gsabadag gis byang chub thob pa'i ming thos shang dang pa thob pa' gyur nas/ ngengag
denas nigasha'aphos nas kyang bdag gisangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur zhing/ mngal na gnas par skye bar ma gyur cig/ der sems can de dag galas de thams cad kyi thams cad duyongs su bas par
gyur cangesems can de dgabyang chub gyi mthar thug gi bar du slan chadamal na gnas bar skye bar ma gyur ga/ sems can gang dgags dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag las yongasasu bas nas mngal du
gnas par skye bar ma gyur cig// bdag gsang sargyas kyi zhinganabu dadam mang la na gnas pamanab 'asi mas can dedag sasargyas kyi zhing der shin tu bde ba dang ldan par
gyur gi/ sna ma'i lo tog gi shangedang/ shang ta la dag bsorams bskyod par gyurab na/ mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ stong pa dang/ bdag med ba'i sgra skad nyams dga'
ka bar gyur cig/ de ltabu dag 'byung ba'agyur gi/ sgra des ma rnams kyi tongang 'dzan sgom dang ldan pa zhes bgyi bsleb bar gyuratshagi/ tang 'ani das sams na de dgags stong pa'i di snang ba'i tshes
zab ma drag rtogs pa 'gyur cig/ sos rgyus kyi zhong rin 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sgyu ma mchis par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub kyi shing drung dumachis nas/ yud tsam

gcagags bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cagi bdag byang chub thob pan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de name tog kha zums pa ma gtogasakhaba'i dang blob dag gi 'od kyang m ma na
par gyur cagi/ lha' moge gang gis sangs rgyas zhangadapag tum mchasagras ma mchis pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams mthob 'gyur ba de
lta bu'i 'od dag bdagags gtong bar gyurag khadagakhyang chub thob ba na/ sgra gangags stong gsum gya steng chen posangs rgyas kyi zhing dugangakhar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgras chos ston pa gyur cig
dan sa masacan gang dag mchis par gyurab de dag thams cad kyis kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa theb par gyur cig/ de dag gang dumabadang/ 'chag pa dngayachis pa dang/ ldeg par 'gyur ba na/
de dag gis rtag par rgyun tu bag mthong bar gyur cig/ de dag chos rnams la ji ltar the tshom du gyur ba no/ de dag gis bdag la bltas ba tsam dang/ bga mthong ba tsam gyis de dag gi the tshom
ma mchis par gyur tsog khudag byang chub thob pa na/ phyogs bcu'isas rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu ma mchis gras ma mchis pa dag na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
theg pa pa'i m/ bla med pa'i thig pa pa'i sems can gang dag mchis pa de dag gis bdag gamo de dang/ bsngags pa thos par gyur cig/ de dag renas shi 'phos nas kyang/ bdag gi sangs
rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/ de dag gas de bdag las chos thos nas/ nyan thos kyi thog pa pa gang lags pa de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyadakyis bsam gtanapa'i dgra bcom par
gyur cig/ de na gong dag khregab chen po ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang lags pa de dag gis ni bdag las chos thos nas tang 'dzani dang/ gzungs kyi sgo dang/ bzodapa zab
mo dag thob par gyur cig/ de dag de nyid du bla na med pa la nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar ma ldog par yang gyur cig/ bdagag nyen thos kyi dge 'dunan dpag tu ma mchis par
gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ma gtogs bar sus kyang bgrang bar jom thog par gyur ge/ bdag gis byang chub thob pan/ gangadang gang du mchi 'dris phyogs gang

dang gang du rkang mthil bzhag pa de dang derapad+ma'agalamachis la gser gyi mdog lta bu gda' ba dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ bad+made dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa gzhan dag dumachas nas bdag gi
tsha bsngags pa dang/ sgra dang dbyas brjod par gyur cage/ sems can de dag gsi bdagagi ming dang bsngags pa dang/ snyan pa thos nas/ dga' zhing rab tu dang ba dang mchog tungagalabaskye bar
gyur cig/ dudag rab tu dang ba skyes nas bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye 'tshal bar gyur pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang der yongs su sngo bar gyur cig/ de dag de nas ba 'phos/
nas kyang bdag gsangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig/ bdag gnyen thos kyi dga' dun yang dge sbyog dri ma dang bral ba dang/ dge sbyong gi skyon dang/ dge sbyong ga gya gyur dang bral dang/
dge sbyong gi g.yo dang bral bar gyur cig/ 'khor rnams kyang chos lhur lenatsa yo byad ltulen pa mi lags pa dang/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lhur len pa ma lags pa dang/ mi rtag pa dang/
sdug bsngal b dang/ stong ba dngo/ bdag med pa la mngon par dga' bar gyur cig/ bdagagi 'khor rnams brtson 'grus brtsams shing chos la 'bab pa dang/ dge 'dul bab par gyur cig/

ngan byang chub sems dpa' gang dag phyir ma ldog par gyur pa de dag kyang ma 'ongs pa bzhugs pa 'dren pa thob par gyur cig/ dedag tsho'aphos nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i gtam rjod
bar rgyu btsag/ byang chub kyi mtha'i bar dude dag gisachos de dag ma brjedapa 'gyur cig/ bdag byang chub theb nas kyang bskal pa chen po khri'i bar du gnas par gyur cig/ yongs su mya ngan las
'daso nas kyang bdag ga dem pa'i chos bskal pa stong du gnas pa gyur gi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su
blas pan legs so legs so// ma 'khrugs pa khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi byim sU 'das nas/ grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na/
shar phyogs logs su 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong 'das pa na// 'jig rten gyi khams mnapar dga' ba zhes bya ba ji ltar khyod kyis smon lam btab pa de lta bu 'ayon tan bkod pa dang ldan pa zhig

yod do/ der khyod slanamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i mtshan yang ma 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba nyid du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das kyis bar du gyur ro// ma'ikhrugs pas gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal bdag gi rib 'di ltabu yongs su lkogs par 'gyur ba ltan/ de'i slad du 'gerten gyi 'am
thams cad na gang dag sems can dusdug bsngal bar ba sdus pa'i simasacan phung po dang/ khams dang skye mched kyis yongs su than pa de dag thams cad byams pa'i s mas dang ldan par/
gyur cig/ khan ma mchis pa'i sems rtog pa ma mchis pa 7sams su gyur cig/ de dag 'di lta bu'i lus kyi bde ba myong bgyur cig/ 'di lta ste dpar bgyin/ sa bcub la gnas pa'i byang
chub sems dba' ting nge 'dzani pad+mal snyoms par zhugs gang des bsam pa la slong rnam par dag par gyurapa de lta bu 'asems can rnams kyalus dang sems kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur cage/ gag/
bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasal yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i tshe/ sa gzhakhrims cad gaser gyi kha dog lta bur gda' bar gyuracage/ rigs kyi bu des debagan gshegs pa rin po che'asnying po'i bas

la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa de'i tshe de'i dusan/ sems can thams cad kyang ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur/ de'i tshos gzhi thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog lta bur snang
bar gyur pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa// blo gros rab mchog sems ma 'khrugs pa lengs lag pa'i mtha'on 'al mchogarab gnas// ma rnams mang
po snying rje'isims la bkod// blo gros dag khyod 'gro ba'i ston par gyur/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ rgyal bu btsugs kyi nor bu zhes bya ba la snga ma bzhin du/
snga 'o// rgyal bu gangs kyi nor bus kyang ji ltar ga 'khrugs pas smon lam btub ba de bzhin du smon lam btab bo//btsunas bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi ri ba' lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
ba lta na/ de'i slad dusems can thams cad kyis saargyas la dmigs pa'i yid la bgyid ba thob par gyur cig/ thams cad kyi sug par yang tsan dan la gyi snying po'i dri 'byungs gyur cig/
de dag thams cad kyis dra de yang sangs rgyas kyi sku dag la yongs su sngo bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis lam chen po btab pa ni lags so/
legs so// gang khyod kyis sems can thamos cad kyi lag tutsanangan sbrul gyi snyapo bzhagapa dang/ bsamapa klag pas sa sa rgyas yid la byed pa bskyed pas na/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir

khyod kyi spos kyi glang po zhes bya bar gyur cig/ sngos kyi glang po che khyod ni khosgol pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gtsag ga bya ma snyed 'dasanas/ bsal pa grangs med pa gang+ga'i klung gi byim snyadaganyis
bal bab na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa'i phrogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ ma pa'i chos nub nas zhag bdun lon pa dang
spos kyi glang po chekhyod 'dzagi rten gyi khams der slan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gasar ma tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus kyi bar du 'gyur ro// sngos kyi glang po ches yagasol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
gal te bdag gi ri ba 'di lta bu yos su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad dugang gi bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de ts+tsha/ kun dga' ra ba de thams cad du
tsha ma togatsam pa ka'i char rab tu 'bab par gyur cagi@#gas kyi bu gang gatsho byang chub sems dba' sros kyi glapo ches de bzhin gshegs pa ni bo che'i sangapo'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas
ba de'i/ kun dga' ra bad thams cad du me togatsam pa ka'achar ma napar rab tu bab pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ani po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ shan tudrizhim tshogs pa mchog
sams langs// me tog tsam pa mchog chara'adi bab// rab tu rgyanom dge ba'i lam ston la// 'gro ba mang po 'dzagi med sgorakhod tsag/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgyu
mtsho'i rdul gyis rgyal bu bcu gcig pa seng ge zhes bya ba la snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// ji ltar sbos kyi glang po ches smon lam btab pa bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la ni
bo mi'i rgyal mtshan phul ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// khyod rin po che'i tog ces bya bar gyur cig/ 'an po

[4/ ]che'i tog khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dusan/ bskal pa grangs med pa gang+ga'i klung gtsag ga bye ma snyed 'dus nas/ bskal ba grangs med pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ 'jig rten
gyi khams mnopar dga' ba zhes bya ba der de bzhin gshegs pa gsor gyi mi rtog yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ de'i dam ba'i chos nub nas bar gyi bskal pa gsum 'das pa na/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing de rgyal ba'i zla ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// der da bla na med pa yang dag pa'i phrogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa glang po rnam
bar bsgrags pa'i dbang phyug dbyangs zhes bya bo/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyuro// khyodakyisangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'dra ba de lta bur 'gyur ro// 'ani po che'i tog gis gsol/ btsunapa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ldan nga'i
slad du/ gang gi tshibadag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba de' ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang dag byang chub chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dag sams tsa'i shums rung
kyi don du snying rje zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs te/ sar ma ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dran pa soms can thams cad kyis thob par gyur cig gisakyi bu
de bzhin du byang chub sems dba' rani bo che'i tog gsi/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ani po tsho'i snying po'izhabs la phyag byas pa dang/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyis kyang
'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad snying rje'i sams la bkod pa ra gyur ba de lta bu'i dran ba thob par gyur to// ragis kyi bu danas de bzhinagshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos/
byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros legs pa gzugs mchog brtan pa longs// sems can phyir ni dam bcas rab brtan byas// skye bo mang po
rdul bral soms la bzhug/ ma mchog sangs rgyas rab kyi mchog tu 'gyur// de ltar snga mabazhin du sbyar te/ mnyen des la sogs pa rgyal bu lnga brgyas kyang/ ji ltar byung chub
sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa drag yongs su blangs pa de ltar smon lam btab cing/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
klu yon tan bkod pa yongs su blangs nas/ thams cad kyang de bshamagshegs pa rini bo che'i snying pos dus gcag tu'ajig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu bla na med pa yang dag pa ra/
rdzogs pa'i byang chub la reg par 'gyur ro zhes/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te// gzhan yang rgyal bu bzhi brgyas kyang rdo rjegacod pa shes rab/

snang ba'i depal gyi ji lta ba de lta bu'i sasargyas kyi gang gi yon tanabakod pa dag yongs su blangs nas/ de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pan po cha'i snyingaposa'ajigarten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dgatu
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te// gzhan yang rgyal bu dgakhacus kyang kun tu bazangapos lta da khub sminalamabatab cage de ltabu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
blangs so// khams kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po thams cad kyis so so nas smon lam khyad par can dag btab cing/ sosonasasas rgyas kyi zhingag yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su blangs nas/
thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nipo che'i snying pos/ dus gcig tu'ajig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bu mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibya chub tu lung
bstan te// de bzhin du srog chags dung phyur phrag dgu ngung bye ba phrag gnyis kyis kyang so so nas smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag kyang yongs su blangs nas/
thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos de bzhin dukhyed cag kyang dus gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu bla na med pa ya ngangag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes/ bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// gas kyi bu de na bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni po che'i
kya@#// sAngapo'agacen/ gcung po brgyad cu po de dag gathu bo bram ze'akhye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag ces bya ba zhig yod/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ bram ze'i

ka khye'urgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'ukhyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su langs shig/ bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab
'a/ bdag gis smras pa/ yab rdzakhyod kyis sang ge'asgra sgrogs shig/ rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis smras pa// bu rje khyod kyis smon lam thob shag dang/ khonges phyis smon lam gangag pa bya'o// des
smas pa/ yapa cag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su blangs bar bgyi lags sam/ 'on tam le ngasasum ga ba byakharab gyi lags/ mdun na 'don gyi gtsobos smras pa/ bram

zi'i khyi'u gang dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dang 'a de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can yongs su len par byed cing/ somasacan bsam bshen nges pa can lta ba log par gyurapa
dgagadul pa yang yongs su len par byed pas/ khyod bdag rang gsangashes par gyis shog/ ragis kyi bu de nas bram ze'akhyi'u rgya mcho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag dang bzhin gshegs pa rin
po che'i snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ni skye dgu brgyadak+Sha/
thub pa na/ byang chub dam pa la reg par 'gyur de lta bur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'tsha' lags te// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar da ltar gyi sems can rnams la 'dod chags chung
ba dang/ zhe sdang chung ba dang/ gti mug chungab dang/ skyo ba'i bsam pa can dang/ 'khor ba la 'jig pa dang/ skyon du lta ba de ltar gang du bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i
sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can rnams kyang de lta bur gyur cig/ de dag kyang bdag las rab tu 'byungabar 'gyur zhing/ bdag kyang sems can rnams la theg pa gsum po ngag gsachos ston par gyur
cig[0f10 ]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal tebadag gi ba 'ad lta bu yongs surdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang ngag bar rdzogs pa 'byung chub tu
lung bstan du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod na ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa grungs med pa gang+ga'i klung gtsage gtso
ma snyed 'das nas/ bsal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klungag bye ma snyedaganyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa utul yang dag rtog ces bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di slong bzhi pa mchog ces bya bar
'gyur zhing skye dgu lo brgyad khri thub pa na/ byang chub mngon par 'thob par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che brtsegs zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/
sa gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bstan/ pa'i slad du kun dga' ra ba 'di thams cad du zhu

dge dmar po'i cha dag rab tu 'bab bar gyug/ sha ljon ba thams cad las kyang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan gyi sgra dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ gis kyi bu gang gi tshobram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i
dbang phyug khyab bdagags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'asnying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas pa deratso/ kun dga' ba desngams cad ngumu tig dmar po'acher dag kyang rab tu
[‚Äì ]'bab/ shing ljon pa thams cad las kyang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i sil snyan gyi sgra byung ba dang/ de bzhani gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ mthu mchogami zad shes rab
mdzod longs shagi/ sems can sU rtsa phan 'dod byams pa'i sams// khyod kyi bsam pa dgu ba rdzogs 'gyur te// 'jig rten sems can dona mdzad sangs rgyas 'gyur//
bram ze' buganyis pa yang dag 'byung zhes bya ba des kyang rgya mtsho'i dbang phyug khyab bdag gas/ ji lta ba de bzhin du gsol pa da/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa//
bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyang bskal pa ut+pal yang dag rtog la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di glang bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mchogaces bya bar 'gyura'adzi skye dgu'i lo brgyad khrir phal pan
de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ma tog ces bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// bzhin du sbyar te gsum pas kyang gsol pa dang/ lo gnyis stong ba na skar ma'i
drazhis bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasakyi bar du 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de bzhin dusbyarate/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sna ma'i me tog dang/ pho'i rgyal po dang/ spyan
bsdams dang/ tshas mchog dang/ 'dzam bu'i grib mdang ( gangab dang/ bla ma dang/ chen po dang rgya mtsho'i snying po dang/ sridamed kyi bu dgatsug tor can dang/
gsar thub nga/ thub dbang dang/ ko'ud rgya dang/ seng ge 'i mal dang/ ye shesargyal mtshan dang/ sangs rgyas sgrogs dang/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/
rgyal ba dang/ phan bad dang/ shes rab snang dang/ dbang chen dang/ zhib dang/ shes rab 'byung gnas dang/ dga' ba dang/ rgya gro d+hargyal po dang/ gsar spyan dang/
phan bcas dang/ gnyi dga' dang/ mi chen gtsug tor can da/ sbyan bzang dang/ tshangs pa dang/ mdzes ba dang/ tshangs pa khyu mchog dang/ sgra rab dang/ chos kyi
zla ba dang/ don mthong dang/ ston pa dang/ dga' na dang/ grags mchog dang/ gzugs bzang dang/ dra khom dang/ groms g.yaradang/ rab mchog sbyin dag/
ba spong dang/ don bcas brtul zhugs dang/ thugs kyi re ba bzang dang/ shes rab mchog dang/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang/ sbyamadzes dang/ ngag pa'i
lha dang/ zas gtsang dang/ legs mthong lha dang/ 'phags skyes rgyal mtshan dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ tshangs dbyangs dang/ dpal 'byung dang/ nga rgyal dbal dang/
rdul bral dang/ nor bu bzang dang/ 'od zer can dang/ shAkya thub pa dang/ dbyangs kyi dbang phyug dang/ bden 'byung dang/ mthu bo dang/ yang dag 'byung dang/
mi tog dang/ ya nga dag ma tog dang/ mi 'khrugs pa dang/ nyi mo'i sU po dang/ dga' ba'i dbong phyug dang/ klus byon dang/ rdo rje'i 'od dang/ grugs pa'i rgyal po dang
stag 'od zer dang/ spyodabacas dang/ ye shes 'byung dang/ spos kyi dbang phyug dang/ sA la'i dbang po dang/ srang mad kyi bu'i snying po dang/ skar ma'i snying po zhes bya ba drag tu
rgyu 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// rigs kyi bu de na mdun na 'don gyi bu thams cad kyitha chung 'jagi pa'i gdung bral zhes bya ba gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni po che'i snying
po'i spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bram ze'akhyi'u bdun cu rtsa dgu po 'di dag thams cad bskal pa ut+pal yang dag tog gi yar skye ba gnyis pa la/[}]

khyab blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan lags pas na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs/
pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par brgya ste/ bsal pa uts+tshal yang dag rtog bas par 'gyur ba na thams cad kyi tha mar byang chub mchog la reg par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas 'adunanurtsa dgu po'i

ga ga/ sku tshe'i tshad ji tsam pa bdag byang chub thob pa gcig pu'i tsho'i tshod kyang de tsam dugyug go/ de ga ga'adul ba dza snyad mchis pa 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar de dag theg pa gsum po rig gas chos
ston par 'gyur ba bdag gcig pu'i yang de snyad du gyur cig/ ji ltar de dag gi nyenathos kyi dge 'dun snyid mches par 'gyur bya bdag byachub thob pa gcig pu'i[‚Äù]thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed
dugyur cig/ sangs rgyas bdun cu rtsa dgu po dedag byung ba'i bskal ba ut+pal ya dag rtog del soms can gang dag gas ma'i lus thob par gyur ba 'asems can dodagathams cad kyang bskal pa
'gyur pa na/ bdag bla na med pa yi dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ thog pa gsum po dag gis nges pa la dgod par bgyi'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
gal te bdag girob 'di lta bu yos su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ltan/ de'islad dubatsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bgabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan tu gsol/
gisakyi bu nas de ba zhin gshegs pa ni bo'i snying pos/ 'gas pa 'gadung khrul la legs so zhes bya ba byin// skyes bu dam pa khyodos mas can bgrang ba las 'das pa/
dag la snying rdzazhing phan par byed pa la zhugs pa ni legs so legs so/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma dgatsag 'das nas/ bskal

kha bgrag med pa gang+gA'i klung gi phyi ma snyed gnyis bal pa ba ba na/ bskal ba ut+pal yang dag rtog de zad g thams cad kyi phyogs ma 'khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mgopar rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab
'gyur te/ dran gzhonagshegs pa rdul bral yang dag 'phags mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur ro// ji ltar sangs rgyas bdun cu rtsa dgu bo de dag gi bskal pa phye du
'gyur ba de bzhin khyod gcig bu'i yang bskal pa phyed du 'gyur te/ jaltar smon lam btab pa'i smon lam de dag thams cad kyi bar yang yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// des gsol/ btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag ga ri ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba lta na/ dra'i slad du gang gi tshe/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba de'i/ sangs

rgyas kyi zhingebad thamasacad ng me tog sngon po'i char shin tu bda' bdag 'bab par gyur ci'i// sems can gang dag gas dra de tshor ba'agyur pa de dag thams cad kyi khams rnams rab tu dang zhing mi mthun
[z. ]/ba ma mas bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad kyi nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur gi/ 'gis kyi bu gang gi tshibram ze'i khye'u 'jigs pa'i gdung bral gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'an po che/
snying po'i zhabs la yan lagalngas phyag byas pa de'i tsha/ de'i dusanasas rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad du ma tog sngon po'i char dag kyang rab tubab/ soms thams cad kyis kyang dring tsho bar
nas de dag thams cad kyi khams rnams kyang snyoms shing mamathun ba mdabar gnas par gyur/ de na sems can thams cad la nad med cing gnod pa med par gyur pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bo chas/
snyang bos bka'astsal pa/ snying rje'i brtul zhugs dul ba'i si mas langos shig/ 'jig rten mgon po mang bo mchod 'gyur zhing/ nyon mongs g.yo gdung dam po gcod 'gyur te// dge ba dam
ba shes rab mdzod du'agyur// thog ba chen po snying rje pad+ma dkarapo'i do las 'am po brgyad pa// 'gis kyakhubram ze de'i slob ma bye ba phragagasum kun dga' ra ba'i sgo na 'dug pa de dag gas kyang/
sems can 'os pa rnam gsum la skyabs su 'aglob la bkod cing/ byang chub yang dag par 'dzan du bcug go/ rags kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis slob ma de dgal smas
pa/ kyi bram ze'i khye'u dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems skyid lo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhingeg yon tan bkod ba ji lta bu 'dod pa dag kyang lashagi/ smonalem
ji lta bu 'dod pa dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thob cag/ de nabram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog gas smras pa/ lam ji lta bu dang/ tshogs ji lta bu dang spyod pa ji lta bu
dang rjes su dran pa ji lta bu s byang chub 'thob par 'gyur lags/ mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u byang chub kyi lam la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas mi zad pa' mdzod bzhi 'di deg
yang dag par bya ste/ bzhi gapal nA/ bsod nams kyi tshog sami zad pa dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang/ shes rab kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang/ chos rngams cad yang dag par bsgrub
pa'i tshogs ma bod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu lam nadi lta bu yanano// bram ze'i khye'u de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnamanatshogs rnam par dag pa sdung ba zhes bye ba/
tshogs nyams su len par byed pa// chos kyi sgo sbyin pa 'i tshogs yongs su gtong bar byed de// don 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su sman par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub so mas dpa'
rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzodapa'i tshigs ni mtshan dang dpakhyadabazang po yongs su rdzogs par byed par
gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi tshogs na/ dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs nicang shes kyi sims
bsubyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi tshog sana'on mongs pa thams cad yos su shes bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i tshogs ni
sbobs pa thogs pa med pa 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs nasems can thams cad nye bar 'tshob byed pa 'gyur ro// byang chub sams dpa' rnams
yoshes kyi tshogs ni shes pa thogs pa med par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas kyi tshogs nusims las su rungabo'abyed par 'gyu'i// byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong gatshogs na the tshom dang bral bar byed para'agyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa'i tshogs zhi 'gras pa med pa'i s mas su byed par 'gyur//
byang chub sems dpo'a rnams kyi snying rje'i tshogs 'dul ba la mi skyo bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshogs chos kyis kun dga' la dga' mos bar byed
bar 'gyuro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms kyi tshog sani rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba spong bar byed par 'gyur ro// bya chub sa mas dba'a rnams kyi chos nyan pa'i
chogs ni sgrib pa spongabar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par byung ba'i tshogs yongs su 'dzan pa thams cad spong bar byed bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi dgon par gnas pa'i tshogs na dge ba'i las byas pa chud mi za bar byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ms kyi gang spel ba bsgom pa'its+tshagasan
dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa'i tshogs ni gzungs thob par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi blo gros spyi tshogs
! ni blo' bye brag 'byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi mos pa'i tshogs ni don gyi rnam pa rjes su rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub samasadapa' rnams
kyi dran pa nye bar gzhug pa'i tshogs ni lus dang/ tshor ba dang/ sa mas dang/ chos la so sor rtogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i
sbyong ba' tshogs ni/ dge ba'i chos thams cad bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i tshogs sa dang/
rgyu sems yang ba nyid dubyed par 'gyurar// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po' tshogs ni sdom pa yongs suljobs par byed pa 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi tshog[‚Äú]
nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs chos kyi bonyid khong du chud par byed bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems

[ps ]dpa' rnams kyi snyingapor byed pa drug gi tshogs ni 'dul ba'i sems can rnams yongs su dag par byed pa 'gyur zhes gsus so// bram la khye'u tshogs rnam par gapa sdud pa zhes bya ba de ni tshogs nyams su
len par byed pa'i chos kyi sgo yin no// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyisbyin pa'i tshogs ni longs spyodachen po dang/ g.yog 'khor mang por 'gyur bar gsungs la/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis tshul
khrims ni mtho ris su skye bar 'gyurapa dang/ thob pa ni shes rab chen por 'gyurapa dang/ dad pa dang/ tshob dang/ sgom pa ni 'khor ba las rgal bar byed par bstan te// mduna'adon gyis smras pa/

bram ze'i khye'u gang dag lorab la mngon par dga' ba rnams na sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bram ze'akhyi'u de yang ji skad du shes kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag byang chub kyi lam la zhugs pa de deg gis
na dul ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// zhi gnas kyi sems kyis tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o// rtog pa med pa'i sems kyis thos pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o// hUMng+geN+Da chen po'asim
kyis bsgom pa bsgom pa bya'o// chos lhag ma rnams kyang shes rab dang ye shes dang/ thabs kyi tshogs yang dag par bsgrub paphyir yongs su btsal bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/ bram ze'i

khye'u de ni byang chub kyi lam yin no// tshogs de lta bu s byang chub thob par 'gyur te/ bram ze'akhyi'ubasgom pa ni lta bu yani/ dran pa de lta bu yin/ bya chub kyi lam gyi spyod panadi lta bu yan gyis 3
bram ze'i khye'u byang chub du 'dun pa skyed cagi/ bram ze'i khye'abyang chub kyi lam na yang dgupa yan gyis/ bsam pa thag pa nas smon lamathobashagi dang/ yongs su rdzogs par
'gyur ro// bram ze khye'ubasam pa dag pas byang chub kyi lam ni deng ba yin no// bram ze'i khye'u g.yo med pas/ rnam par dag ste nyon mongs pa rab tu bsal bas/ byang chub kyi lam ni drang
ba yin no// bram zelekhye'u bla na ma dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pas byang chub kyi lam na grub pa dang/ bde ba yan gyis smon lam thogal/ sangs rgyas kyi zhingeg yon ta'abakodapa yongs
su dgapa 'am/ yongs su ma dag pa lta bu 'adodapa le shage/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog gse/ deng zhin gshegs pa ni bo tsho'asnying po'aspyir star pus mo g.yA
pa'i lha ngas la btsug te/ 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunapa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyiste/ sems can
'dod chags chung ba rnams dang/ zhe sdang chung ba rnams dang/ gti mug chung ba rnams dang/ sems 'khrul ba ma mchis shing m 'khrug pa rnams dang/ 'akon pa'i soms ma mchis pa rnams dang/
phrag dog dang/ ser sna'i sems rnam par sbyas pa rnams dang/ log par lta ba'i sems yongs su spangs pa rnams dang/ yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems la gnas pa rnams dang/ dag bar
soms pa rnams dang/ dge ba yongs su tshol bsams pa rnams dang/ nasong gsum gyi lam rnam bar skabasams ba rnams dang/ mkho se kyi lam gsum la brtson par sems pa rnams
dang bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gsum po dag gis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sdud pa rnams dang/ theg pa gsum po dag la brtson par sems pa rnams kyi slad du/ bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi
zhang nyon mongs pa can 'di'i/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar 'tshang rgyabar gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag ga ri ba 'dalta bu yogs tshogs par

'gyurab ltan/ de'i slad dubadag ga sum pa lag pa gnyis suglang po che gtso bo dag 'byungabar gyur cagi/ tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus de'i lag ba gnyis su glang bo chagatso'i thal
kar yan lag bdunashani tu gnas pa dag byungabaragyur pa mthonas/ des smos pa/ khyedacagarlung zad tsam zhig thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i stag nam mkha' la dengal/ yan
lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i cha shani tuprazhim bdagags sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'a nas/ sems can thams cad sad par gyis shig de'i thogs pas sems can gang dag galus la phog gam/
gang 'gags dra tshoba'agyurapa dedagag sgro'i ba lngaspangs bar gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa la 'dun pa'i sgrob ba sangasakhar gyur cig/ gnod sems dang/ rmugs pa dang/
gnyadi dang rgod ba dang/ 'gyod pa dang/ the tshom gyi sgrib pa sbyangs par gyur gi/ tshig de skad snas ma thag tu glang po che de dag ste nga ga re ra snangal/ 'di ltar mgyogs par 'dod
ste 'daltaste dbar na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa brkyang ba las bskum ba 'am/ bskum pa las bskyang ba de bzhin dudaltar mgyogs par dong nas/ glangapo chagatso bdag gis ja
sad snga snus pa'i phyi ba dag byas nas/ phyir log ste de'i mdun du 'khodo// gos kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar ma'i khyu mchog shAn tuyid dga' bar gyurapa dang/ de la de/
bzhin gshegs pa'i n po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ gas kyi bu khyodon ma 'ongs pa 'dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klungag bya ma snyadaganyis ba la babo ba na/ bskal pa sgra/
sna zhes bya ba la glang bzhi pa 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing sgra yang dag par basags pa zhes bya ba zhig 'byuba'agyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che chen po'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa'i 'od zer
zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur// bags kyi bu danas byang chub soms dpa'i skar ma'i khyu mchog gis/ de bzhin gshegs ba rin po che'i snying po'i zhi
la yan lag lngas mgo bos gtugs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i stong bos bka' stsal pa/ rdul dang rnam bral semaMs can rnam dag longs// khyod kyis sems can bye
mang lung bstan to// byang chub phyin rab dag lam sbyong zhing// rgyal mchog sems can rnams kyi 'dren par 'gyur// deng zhan du sbyar te/ bram ze'i khye'u stong dang/ bram ze'i/
khye'u bye ba phrag gsum po gang dag gas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dare bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dedag thams cad kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bo che
snying bolungabastan te/ thamanas nigs rgyus rnam par gathagres dang/ gtsug tor can dang/ thams cad skyob kyi bar dag tu 'gyur ro// bram ze'i khye'u lung bstanub de dag thams cad
las gang dag gi byed klog pa 'a bram ze stong zhig yod pa'i thu bo mang pos bla mar bkur ba khyab 'jug rlupazhes bya ba des gsol pa/ bdag nisas rgyas kyi zhing sogs ma lnga dang
ldan par/ ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'ibyang chub la rog par gyur cig/ 'dod chags bdeb deng/ zhe sdang bdob dang/ gti mug bdeba'i sems can rnams la chos ston
bar gyur cig/ bram ze'i khyi'u skar ma skyong zhes bya ba des smras pa/ kyi mkhan po khyab 'jug rlung 'dus don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyagasam lnga dang ldan par smon
lam 'debs par brgyadi lags/ mdun na 'don gyis smas pa/ snying rjechen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa den/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigasam lnga dang ldan par
byang chub 'thob pa byecang/ sems can skyabs med par rnams dang dpung gnyen med pa rnams dang/ nyon mongs pa dag gis gtses pa rnams dang/ lta bas nyon mongs pa
gyur pa rnams kyi don byed cing skyabs dang dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba dang/ sam can rnamA skye ba'i rgya mtsholas sgrol bar byed pa dang/ yang dag blta ba la rab tu'agod par byed cing/ sems can rnamA

mya ngan las 'das pa'i bdud rtsi 'a ros mi par byed do zhes grag ste/ gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par smon lam 'debs pa byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' snying rjechen po yi'i
bar snang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bo snying pos bka' stsalal/ khya'ajug rlung khyod ni 'ongs pa'i dus 'a/ bskal ba grangs med pa ga'i klong gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/
bskal ba grangs med pa ga bklungag byi ma snyed gnyis pa la bab pa na/ shar phyogs lags su sangs rgyas kyi zhingesangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snya'adas pa na/ 'dzagi rten gyi khams

ngur smig rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ skyes bu dam ba khyodadir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang rgyal po zhes bya ba
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// khyab 'jug rlung gis gsol la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yongs su tshogs bar 'gyur ba lta na/ de'i slad du
ba/ gang gi tsha/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal bde'atsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis brgyan paganyase bdagag spyi bor 'jog par/
gyurag/ gas kyi bu gang gi tshabram ze'i khyi'u khyab 'jug rlung gsa'acom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs pa de'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying bos/ byachub sems dpa'
khyab 'jug rlung gi spyo bo zhabs gas bzhag ste bka' stsal pa/ snying rje'i bsam ba shes rab rnon po las// byang chub mchog phyir spyad pa sbyogs la// brtan nyin mos 'ching ba dam
tshod gi[‚Äù]/khyod ni phan pas snying brtse sasargyas gyur// rigs kyi bu denas bram ze'i khye'u skaram skyogaso/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rinapo che'i snying bol
pus mogayas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs tagasol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs la 'a byang chub tu sems baskyod par bgyiste/ sas rgyas
kyi zhing 'daresems can 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang gatshugagasems chamanyam pa rnams dang/ gre ba dang mi dag pa'i bsam pa la mi gnas pa'i skye dgu tshol bzhi ba thub ban/ blanam
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying bos bka' stsal pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa g+hA'i ngagacig gi phyi ma
snyed 'das nas/ bskal pa gras med pa gnyis la bab pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'animi mjed ces bya bar gyur te/ ci'i phyir da ma mdas bya ba zhin/ sems can//
de dag 'dod chags la ma la jid pa dang/ de dag zhe sdang la ma mdzad pa dang/ gti mug la ma mdzod pa dang/ nyon mongs pa'i 'chang ba rnamaMs la ma mjedapas/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams den
mdaces bya'o// 'gorten gyi khams cha mdzad der bskal pa chen po bzang bo zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur// ci'i phyi'i bzang po zhes bya zhe na/ bskalamachen po bzang po de la/ sems can

sgyur 'dod chags dar/ zhe sdang dang gti mug spyod pa rnams kyi zhing du rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rjechen po dang ldan pa stopa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir to/ skyes bu dmab khyod kyang

bskal pa chen po bzang po rdze zhang skye dgu lo bzhi khro thub pa na/ thams cad kyi dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin
rgyu gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur zhing/ theg ba gsum po dag gis chos ston pa 'gyur te// 'khor ba'i chu bos bdas pa'i sems can
bgrang pa las 'das pa drag kyang sgrol bar 'gyur zhing/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i pha rol tu 'khod par yang 'gyur ro// gas kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' skaram skyong gis
de bzhin gshegs pa ni bo ma'i snying po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas mgo bos phyag byas nas las te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ gas kyi bu des phram gyi byi'u gnyis pa tam/
bu ru zhes bya ba yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi'i stang bo'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ gsol ba/ btsunas bcom ldan 'das bdagakyang de bzhinagshegs pa 'khor ba 'jagi gsasu mtshams
sbyong zhing/ 'jig rten gyi skye dgu tshal sum khri thubapan/ sangs rgyas su'abyungabar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs panipochasnying pos bka' stsalal/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod bskal ba gras
med pa gapa'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ bskal ba khrus med pagopa'i klong ga khyim sde dganyis bal bab ban/ sangs rgyas kyi zhim mdzodadubaskal ba bzang bo byung ba/ de bzhin
gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi rjes su mtshams sbyor zhing skyeguratshal sum grub na/ d bzhi gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas gsal sgrub ces byakharagyur//
'jigarten dum ba grags par 'gyur ro// des bcom ldan 'as las lu bstanab sos/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bo che'i snying bo'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalato/ bar
bcasanas/ de bzhin gshegs parinapo che'i snyayo'ispyan sngar 'dug ste/ mo togadagags 'acom ldan 'das kyi sku la 'thor zhing thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsung
ba dag gis mngon par bstod ba/ nyani du 'brel ba legs sgrugs rab snyan gsung ba po// ma 'khrul ma 'dres ma snyogs dra ma la ma 'a ba// khyad 'phags shan tu
sdom tson klu ba blo gros ldan// drasrongadam pa khyodamadzes grub gtso khyu mchog lags// yon tan brgyas bltam yon tan mang po stsol ba khyod// thub mchog bde ba mdzad ba ma ma
tshe dam pas bdud// srid pa gsum na khyod 'dra'isoms can gzhan ma mchis// deng khyod sems can mang bo byang chub lung lam bstan// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i
khye'u kun gyis bsrungs zhes bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snyang po'i spyan sngararanipo che sna bdun gyi khri'u bzhag ste/ rin thang 'bum gyi bsham pas bshams nas khri'u de la
gser gyi lhung bzed ni po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ba dang/ gsar gyi rol babyung ga ra dang/ rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod sdongadag bzhugaste/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dag slong gi deg
'dun la phul nas/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang ma 'os pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grasamad ma mchis ba gang+gA'i klung gcig gi byamasnyed 'das nas/
bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyadaganyis pa la bab pa na/ bskal pa bzang po de la tsho'agrib pa dang/ rtsod pa'i dus kyi mtshan ma byung ba dang/ sems can 'dod
[s/ ]gas dang/ zhe sdang dang gti mug bdo zhang ngargyal dang/ phrag dog dang ser snas kun nas dkris pa rnams dang/ sems can log par lta ba dang/ ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa/
nga mi dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs kun nas khrus pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsakha'isoms yongs su nyams pa dang/ yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems rnam par spras pa dang/ log pa tshor mi dge ba'i
sams dngaldan pa rnam kyi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa ga bcom payang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas 'giwa pa dang zhabs su ldan par 'gyur zhinge/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsar bayongs su
mya ngan las 'das te/ dam pa'i chos nub nas/ 'jig rten long bar 'gyur zhunge/ 'dren patshamachis la skye dgung [$]len khri thub pa na/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag bar tshog sakha'acingachub mngon/
pa rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cagi/ rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni po che'asong pos/ bram ze kun gyis khasungs la bka' stsalapa/ bram ze legs so legs
sa skyes bu dam ba khyod kyis rtsod pa'i sa kyi mtshan ma byang zhing/ skye dgu'i tshon khre thub pakhor dang/ 'jagi rtegal bar gyur ci'adren pa mdaba' ni ngang smon lam btab ba nirtogs
ba chen ng ye shes dang ldan pa yin pas/ rigs kyi bu ri'i phyi'i khyod mkhas mdzodape ston ces khyabar gyur cig/ mkhas mdzod snying rje rten khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa gras med/
ba kaklung gcig gi byol ba'adas nas/ bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pa la bab pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dubaskal pa bzang po byung zhingaskye dgu'i tshal nyakhaM
thub pa na/ d bzhi gshegs pa 'od srus zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro/ ga sa kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' makhas mdzod snyadzertan gyis/
de bzhin gshegs kha ranipocho'asnying po'i zhabs lamanalagalngas phyag byas te/ phyogs gtsagatu'adu gnas / de bzhin gshegs pa 'ani po che'i snying bo la/ ma tog dang me tog phreng dang/ spos dang

ts+tsha// phyam dag gis gtor nas/ tshags su bcad pa 'di dagags mngon par bstod do// ma mchog phan pa mdzad pa dga' ba brgyud pa skyed pa po// zhal 'dzum rab tu dgyes pa shani dusnyan pa'i gsum nga' ba//
gnas mkhyen mkhas pa phan pa mdzad pa stobs bcu rab mchog ldan// ye shes bsam gtan rnam par mthar phyin bdagashogs khyod la 'dud// spyod pa mang po spyad pa zhal ni rnam rgyas pa//
khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag mang po// gzhal yasabyang chub slad du lung yang bstan pa mdzad// mi mchogabade bar gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//

gis kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ bram ze'i khye'u bzhi pa bgrod bya'i bu drim med ces bya ba la yang dag pa bskul te/ dges kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u bgrod bya'abu srim med de

bzhin gshegs pa 'ani po che'i snying bo'i spyan sngar 'dug ste// gsol la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang de bzhin du bskal pa bzang po de la byang chub par 'tshalamodakyi rtsodapa'i dus de lta bu 'ba' shagi
gi tshalato/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'od sras yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ skye gu'i lo khri thun pa na/ sems can sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang yang dag par sdom pa'i bsam pa
khas pa rnams dang/ nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyenal stan par 'du shesapar soms la zhugs pa rnams dang/ bsod nams bya ba'i dongs pa gsum po dag don
spyi gnyer ba rnams dang/ legs bar spyod pa gsum dang bral ba rnams dang/ nyes par spyod pa gsum po dag la brtson pa rnams dang/ nyonamos pa'i mun pas soms rnam par dkrugs ba rnams
dang theg pa gsum po dag don du mi gnyer ba de'i dus su na/ sus kyang byang chub kyi spyod pa sgrub par jom thig lags na/ skye dgu'i tshilo stong thub pa na lta mos kyang ca'emal te/ sems
can de dag kyang tshel brgya pa'i bar du 'gyur te/ de'i dus na ni sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsab mang ngam mchis na/ dge ba'i rtso baspyod pa rnams lta smos kyang 'tshal/ shig snyigs ma
lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten tsho'abri zhing lo brgya par gyur nas/ mtshon gyi bskal pa bar mnye bar gnas par gyur pa de'i dus na/ bdag lha rnams kyi nang nas/ babs shing sems can
rnams yongs su skyob par gyur cige/ mi dge ba spangs nas dge ba la spyod par gyur cig/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'alas kyi lam gyi bar dag la rab tu 'god par gyur cig
sems can rnams kyinyon mongs ba dag kyang dge ba'i las kyi lam rnams kyis yongs su sbyong bar rgyun gi/ theg pa gsum po dag la ya nga sbyor bar gyur cig/ snyags ma lnga dag yongs su sbyong

kha'agyur cig/ skye dgu'i tsho lo brgyad khri la thug pa na/ bdag bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i phyang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang gtumugadang pa
ts+tshA a rig pa dang/ phag dego dang/ sos sna chub 'asems can rnams la chos ston cing/ theg pa gsum po dag la yang dag par sbyor bar gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba yos

su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ldan de'i slad du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lungabastan du gsol/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasagang ga tshobadag de ltar bstan
pa thob na/ theg pa gang gis myur du 'khor ba las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i nyan thos kyis yang don du mi gnyer la/ rangasas rgyas kyi sa yang don du ma gnyer lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
snyang pos bka' stsal pa/ bram ze'i khye'u byang chub sems dpa' le lo can rnams kyi dngos po ni bzhi pa 'di dag yin te/ le la' dingos po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kha cig na
yun 'ang po ra 'khor ba 'dod de/ lta ba'i g.yangs dang/ 'khor ba'i btson rar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing/ dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub kyang myur du 'thob bar 'gyur
ro[;]bzhigangazhen/ 'dal byang chub sems dpa' la la chog dmanab dang/ grogs dman pa dang/ yongs su gtong ba dman pa dang/ smon lam dmanab yin te/ boltar na byang chub sems
dpa' chog dman pa yin zhe na/ 'di la lus dang ngag dang/ yang kyi spyod pa ma bsdams shing/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i sems can rnams dang
lhan cig 'grogs shari rgyu ba dang/ thams cad yongs su ma gtong zhing kun la yang yongs su mi gtong lha mi'i dpal dung bde ba 'dod pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang/ lhag pa'i
bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan bkod pa yos su mi len cing 'dul ba la rtog pa'i smon lam yang yongs su mi len pa yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa byang chub sems dbar le

la can n yun ring por 'khor ba'i btson rar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur zha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du thob par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
dang ldan na/ myur dubla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar 'tshargya bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhon/ lus dang ngag da/ yid kyi sbyod pa bsdoms dang tshul khrims/
dang ldan ba dang/ theg pa chen po la yang dgu pa zhugs ba rnams dwang lhan cig 'grogs shing rgyu ba dang/ thams cad yongs su gtong zhing kun la yang yongs su gtong la/ sems
can rnams sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir/ sArI rna2soms bskyed cing/ sbyin par byed pa dngo lhag pa'i ngesam bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing g.yon tan bkodapa dang/ 'dul ba

la rtog pa'i smon lam gos su'adzazhi bar byed pa ste// chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' na myur dubla na med pa yang dag bar tshogs pa 'byed chub mngon pa ra rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
'gyur ro// chos bzhi ba 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam nye bar ston par byed pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ bu rol tu phyin pa rnams la mngon par brtson pa dang/ sems
can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po gtong ba dang/ rgyas pa'i gnas pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par rtsa ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' chos
rgyu gas ngoms ma myong bar gnas par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ sbyane pas mas mi myong ba dang/ chos nyan pas ngoms mi myong ba dang/ bsgom pas mas mi myong ba dang/ sems can
rnams la bsduba'i dngos pos ngoms ma myong bar gnas par bya ba dag go/ byang chub sems dpa' ma zad pa'i gter bzhi bo 'di dag yongs su rdzogos khar bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub
sems dpa' dad pa ma zad pa'i gter yongs surdzogs par bya bdang/ chos bstan pa dang/ yos su bsngo ba dang/ samasacan dbul po yongs su gzung ba ma zad pa'i gtamayongs su rdzogs/
par bya ba dgago/ bzhi po 'di rig ni bdag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa yin te/ bzhigang zhen/ sems can med pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims yongs sudag bdang/ srogamer
pa'ibu'i ting nge 'dzani yongs su dag pa dang/ gang zag med pa'i phyir shesa'ab yongs su dag pa dang/ rnam par grol ba'i yi shes mtho ba'i phyir/ rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa ste/ byang chub
sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du blan med pa'i ng dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa tshang rgya zhinam
mkha' 'khor lo yang skor bar byed/ mi rtag pa 'khor lo dang/ mi mnyam pa'i 'khor lo dang/ brjod ngomad ba'i 'khor dang/ sa bar 'byin pa'i 'khor lo dang/ sa par 'byed pa'i 'a
dang bskor du med pa'i 'a'o lamangaskor bar byed do// bgrod bya'i bu dril ma khyod ma'ongs pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa gang+ga'i klung gtsag gi bye ma snyed 'das te/ bskal pa bzang po la

bab nas/ ring bo mna'ang snyigs ma lnga rab tu zhi ba'i dus la bab pa na/ skye dgu tshol brgyad khri thub pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur to/
bya// de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// thumaze'akhyi'u bgrod byar bu dri ma medakyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'ani po che'i snyate
po'i zhabs la yan lag lngas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang/ me tog phrang dang/ ma dag gis mchod pa byed ba la brtson zhape tshags su bcad pas ma bsu
'tsho bstod pa/ mgon po khyod kyi dpral ba'i dbyes che mdzod spu gangs mdog mdzes// khyedazhige sar gyi brtsigs pa 'dra zhing yid dumachi/ yon tanabargyas bltam bdag dus 'di gsungs 'grona'ang

bdag 'tshang rgya// thub ba khyu mchog 'jig rten sgron khyod la nisu mi 'dud// bram ze mdun na 'don rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis// bram ze'i khye'u ragi byed klog pa stong po thams cad byang chub yang dag pa rab n du
bcu gnas / ltar 'khor ba 'jig dang/ gsor thub dang 'od srus dang byams b.lung bstan pa de bzhin du/ bram ze'i khye'u rig byang klog pa sa ge dang/ mchog tu dga' ba dang/ dgu brgya dag
bdurtsa dgu bar du thams cad kyis kyang bskal pa bzangapo 'al bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub tu snyomalam btab nas/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos bsal
pa bzang po 'di nyidi la bla na me dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub l bkodo// de dag thams cad kyi nu bo b+hachung gang yin pa de la yang mdun na 'don gyis 'di skad du/ kyakhram
ze'i khyi'u stobasachen shugs 'chang ring du brtas tu jiyod/ sems can rnams la snyaperje chen po skyed cig ces yang dag pa tshabaskul nas tshigs su bcad pa 'darig gas kyang mnob ra go'abus go/
sems can gang dag rgyadang nad dang 'chi'apho'i 'jigs pa sredapa'i klong du lhung ba pa// phu bo rnams la zhen pa'i mi dag srid pa'i btsona' rab tu 'jigs par chung ba rnams// phan tshun gsod pa
byed pa'i nyon mongs dug 'thungs nas ni sdug bsngal rgya mtshorarab chu gnas o// gtimugags na lam ster bzhin dum gtsang 'khrul 'khor dag na 'khyam par gyur// lagapa la gnas pas/
'byung po thams capasaMde pa gsum na sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'bar// srog chags mas da 'gro ba lnga po dag na ji ltar 'khor lo 'khol bzhin du 'khor// 'gro ba lnga po dgan chos kyi
mgo nyams skyabs med sems can rnams ni rAn gyis la// yang dag shes rab kyis nimanur yade gnyis spongs la byang chub don du'adunab skyod// 'gro ba rnams kyi spyi ba'i mya na
solal sems can rnams kyi gnyenang rgyurapa ra rgyas// 'gro ba'anyon mongs 'ching ba dgrol bar bya phyir byang chub don du sems kyang gazhol kyis shagi/ gtamugakhrul ba chos mig rnam par
nyams pa rnams la lam gyi dam pa sbyin par gyis// 'khor ba'i srid pa ba btson ra ngag na 'ab ra ba rnams la chos kyi bcud kyis tsham gyis shagi/ phan pa byed pa byed na myur du nye bar song la thub
ba'agabs la gtugs pa gyis// reb thams cad grub smon bkra shis ldan pa rab brtan 'dres bas sa sargyas 'gyurakhar byes// 'jig rten dag na sems can/
rnams kyi dbugs 'byin gyis la srid pa'i mtsho las sems can thon/ dgya nom thar pa'i sa la dbang po' stobs dang byang chub yan lag sbyin bye ba'agyurab gyis// chos pa'i chos kyi char
tsha pa rab du bol lta sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar gyis/ gis kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chades kyang sbasal/ mkhan po bdag 'khor ba la mgo/
par dga' ba'i dpal mi 'tshal la/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thig pa yang ma 'tshal te/ bla na med pa'i thogab 'tshal b.lags kyis/ kyi mkhan po yud tsam zhig gzhes la bdag
seng ge sgra sgrogs pa la gson tsagi/ rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de nas phyi'i byung ste/ rang gi bsnyen bkur ba bram ze'i khye'u lnga bo la bos te sbas pa de
kyi khye'u dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'aphyang chub tu sems skyod mge de dag gis myong snas pa/ bdag cagal gang sangs rgyas la sogs ba dug slong dge 'dun la dbul bar bgyi
kha nung zad kyang ma mchis lags na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsrungs pa khag cag gi ji ltar byang chub tusems bskyed par bgyi/ rigs kyi bu de nas mdun na 'don gyi gtso'i bram ze rgya

mtsho'i rjel gyis bsnyen bkur ba dang re le thang spyod cesakhyabade ba na rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dog ga rgyan dug byin/ bsnyen bkur ba gnyis pa thang la spyod ces bya ba de la ni rin po chu sna bdun gyi rna cha byin//

bsnyen bkur ba gsum pa tshul sbyo ces bya ba de la ni/ 'ani po che sna bdunagyi khri byon/ bsnyen bkur ba bzhi ba shugs kyis spyod ces bya ba de la ni rani po che sna bdunargya'ar ba byin/ bsnyen bkur/

ba lnga pa spang po spyod ces bya ba de la ni gsar gyi rol ba byung ga ra phyin nas smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u dag khyed cag ngeng la dngos po de rig sangs rgyas la sogs kha dge slong gi dge 'dun laphul la/
blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems skyed cig/ de nas bsnyen bkur ba lnga po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong ste/ de ltar bskur ba'i dngos po de dag sangs
rgyus lasogs pa dge slong ga dge 'dun la phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis bdag cag bskal pa bzang po de la bla na med pa yang dag pa rardzogs pa'i byang chub
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabara'agyu3'gag named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/ rigs kyi bu snga mabazhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin
po che'i stong bos bram ze'i khye'u lo tang sbyod ni/ bas la pa bzang po 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtan dbyas zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub tu lung bstan to// thang la spyod
nadi'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa bde dpang blo gros zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// tshul spyod na de'i 'og tude bzhin gshegs pa don bcas gsung zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//
shugs kyis spyodazhi pa'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs ba dga' ba dang zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i khya'i snying po spyod pa'i 'og tu bzhanegshegs pa seng ge 'i bshes gnyon gtsug bu
ces bya bar 'gyur ro zhes byang chub tu lung bstan to// bram ze'i khye'u lnga po de dag bskal pa bzang por lung bstan ma thag tu mdun na 'don gyis/ yang bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs
'amang la smras po stobs chen shugs 'changasangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag lashage/ smon lam ji lta bu 'adod pa yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thob shagi/ sams
can thams cad kyang chos kyi bcud kyis 'gron du gnyer cig/ brtson 'grus brtan pos rang gi byang chub kyi spyad pa yang spyod la/ yang dang yang du ringedu ma rtog shig ces lag pa nas bzung ste/
bcom ldan 'dras la phul la// 'gis kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye'u stobs chen shugs 'chang de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'adas
ma 'ongs pa'i dusan/ bskal pa bzang po de la thub pa nyi ma mang nyung ja nyid e 'byung bar 'gyuralags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin pa che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ bram ze'i
khye'ub skal pa bzang po de lan byub pa nyam ste rtsa ba'i 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bskal ba chen po bzang pa de la rgya la ba nyi tshe ba dag yongs sumyan lasa'asab de dag gi
thatsha'abram ze'i khye'u gces lag bla na mad pa yang dag par tshogs po'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge 'i bshes gnyen gtsug bud ces
bgyi ba 'gyur ba de srid du yun ring por bdag gis brtul zhugs dang/ dka' thub dang sbyong pa dang/ sbyin pa dang phyol ba dang yang dag par sdom pa dang/ thos pa dang brtson 'grus dang/
bzed pa dang/ nges pa dang/ bsod nams dang/ shes rab kyi tshigs sna tshogs dag yang dag par bsdu zhing byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// bskal pa bzangapo ba de dag thams
cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ripo man par dpapor bsod snyoms kyang dbulakhar bgyi'o// yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi sku gdung dag la yang mchodabar
bgyi'o// dedag gdam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzani par yang gyur cig/ sems can tshul khrims dang/ bral ba rnams na/ tshul khrims phun sumatshogs pa yang dag par 'dzadu'ajug pa
dang 'dzud tsang 'batu'agod par gyur cig/ sems can lta ba dang bral zhinganyam ba thob par gyurapa rnams ni yang dag pa'i lta ba yang dag bar 'dzani du 'jug pa dang/ 'dzud pa rab tu 'gong
gyur cig/ de bzhin du bsam pa dang bral ba rnams n yang dag pa'i bsam pa la rab tu 'godaparagyur cig/ bzhin du cho ga dang bral ba rnams ni cho ga la rab tu 'godabar gyur/
chug/ sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i spyod pa rnam ba sna tshogs dag kyang nges par ston par gyur cig/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dam pa'i chos nub nas nge po ma lon par bdag gis
tsha 'jig rten du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul dang/ dam pa'i tshos yongs su gzung ba dang/ dam pa'i chos 'byung ba dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar bgyid par gyur cig/ mtshon gyi bskal pa
bar ma'i dus kyi tshon/ sems can rnams srog gcod pa spong ba drang/ yang dag pa'i lta ba'i bar la rab tu 'gong pa ra gyur cig/ sems can rnams mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang/
lam ngan pa dag nas bton cing yang dag pa'i lam du'agod pa 'gyur cig/ nyes par spyod pa'i mun pa 'jig bar bgyid par gyur cig/ legs par sbyodapa'i snang ba ston par gyur cig 'jag
rten na dus kyi snyigs ma dang/ tshongang ltadang/ nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma'i bar dag 'jig par brgyad pa 'gyur gi/ mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshon/ bdag sems can rnams sprin
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor bar gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzani ngu'ajug ca 'dzud par gyur cig/ bdag sems can rnams pa rol tu phyin pa
drug po dag la sbyor bar bgyid ba na/ thamasacad mu ge dang mun pa dang 'thab pa dang/ rtog pa dang/ g.yulashAm pa dang/ 'khon dang rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dag rab tu 'bar gyur cig/ sems can

rnams kyi rgyanal nyon mongs pa'i mo'i gdung ba dag zhu bar gyur cige/ nangakyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshan/ bdag gas sems can rnams snyingepor 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa'i chos drug yang dag pa rab ni
du 'jug par gyurag/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag la sbyor bA bgyid cing rab tu 'gong par gyur cig/ sems can rnams kyi nang kyi mun ba rnam baba'ajig par bgyid par gyur cig/ sems can rnams
kyis mas kyi rgyud la nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i bar du gyur cig/ bskal pa bzang po lasas rgyas kyi 'ongam mjed du de ltar sems can rnams sdug bsngal dag las yos sathapar
bgyid par gyur cig/ gang gi tsho bas la pa bzang po lasas rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong rtsa bzhi 'byung ba dgayongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'gyur nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul thams cad
kya thams cad du nub par gyur pa na/ de'i 'og tu gdong bdag blon med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub man par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur/ bskal ba bzang po'isasargyas
bcom ldan 'das stong rtsa bzhi bo dag gi sku tshe'atshod ngom par bdag gi byang chub thob pa'itsho'i tshadakyabadatsam du ring ba gyur tsagi/ dodag gi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ji snyedapa bdag cig
punyan thos kyi dge 'dunayang de snyed du gyur cig/ bskal pa bzang po de la sangs rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po de dag gis sems can jisnyad btul bar gyur pa'i sems can de snyed
[Or ]ga dug bdag gis kyang btul bar gyur cig/ sems can gang dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gnyid thos kyi bslab pa la 'khrul par gyur pa dang/ lta ba'i g.yang sar ltung bar gyur pa
'a nga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam la ma gus pa'i sems dang/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems su gyur pa dang/ chos dang dge 'dun la 'khrul pa'i sams su gyur ba dang 'ded chogs
kyi sems dag dang/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dag dang/ mtshams med pa bgyid par gyur pa dag kyang bdag gis byang chub thob nas 'khor ba'i dam nas 'byin cing ma 'jigs pa'i

khyami mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'dzud par gyur cig/ ji srid du bdag yongs su mya ngan lha 'das nas dam pa'i chos bas par ma gyur ba de srid dubaskal pa chen po bzang po ya babs par ma gyur
cag/ bdag gi dam pa'i chos bas par gyur pa na/ bskal pa bzang po yang bas par gyur cig/ bdag skyes pa'i sku gdu gang lags pa de dag kyang ng bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu tshon
