kho'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan cing mtshan rayang dpa byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan pa dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag tu gyur ta gnas par gyur
gi rwa bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kya phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dbag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag tubazhudanas sangs rgyas kyi sku re re kyang sems can
pa gtum mas gras ma mchis ba rnams thog pa gsum pa ga yang dag par 'dzan tu'ajug pa dang/ 'dzud cing rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangan bar gyi bskal pa zhagapar
mgyur pa der de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de ga bzhud nas dza ltar sngar brjod pa de ltar so mas can rnams yongs su skyob par 'gyur zhing sa kyis 'di bzhin nor bur rgyu gnas / sangs rgyas kyi zhing/
gang dag na sems can rnams 'ani po chang bral bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu mchis shang rane po che'i char 'batu 'bebs pa dang/ gter dag kyang rab tu ston par gyur cig sangs

rgyus kyi zhing gang dgan sems can rnams dug ba'i spyod pa dang/ phrala'ang nad gyis nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa 'a sa sa rgyus kyi zhing de dag tuyang tshanadan sa mchogapa dang/ sbrul gyi snying bo dang
dus kyis rjes su 'brang ba dag ga skos kyi char rab tu 'babs par gyur cig/ sbyos kyi char de dag gis kyang sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rnams dang/ lta ba'i nang rnyems dang/
lus kyi nad rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyud par gyur cig/ de nas sems can de dag kyang bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dag la mngon par brtson par 'gyur zhing/ mtho ris la gzhol bar
yid gyuracug/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ de ltar sems can rnams yongs su skyob par gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob nas kyang/
de ltar sangs rgyas mdzad pa brgyad pa ra gyur cig/ bdagayos su mya ngan lasa'adas nas kyang de ltar sangs rgyas zhing mtha' yas mum mams pa ga gsems can rnams yongs su skyob
paragyur cagi/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi re ba 'di lta bu yos su rdzogs par ma 'gyur zhing/ sems can rnams kyi snyan du yang 'gyur ba ltan/ bdug phyogs
btsu'o'adzagi rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu mamachis pa dgan sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangadag bzhugs te 'tshozhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa de dgabasnyus
paragyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tulung ston par yang ma gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das srog chags bye ba phrag mang po gang dag blan mod
[ ]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs shing lung bstan pa'i sems can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur ba dedag kyang/ bdag gis thugs byungabar bgyis par gyuragi/

bdag byang chub kyi slad du yang dang yang du 'khor ba 'khor ba na sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang/ chos kyi sgra dang dge 'dun gyi sgra dang/ dge ba'i sgra dang/ dag pa'i chos gyi sgra dag rna lam duglog par ma gyur cig/
gal te bdag ga'i ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur zhing/ sems can rnams kyi sman duyam 'gyur ba ltan/ bdag rtag tumanAmamadapar gtogs par gyur cig
gis kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ni bo che'i snying pos bram ze'i khye'u stobuchen shugs 'chal legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu ma pa legs so legs so// khyod ni sems can rnams

kyi son du 'gyurazhing sdug bsngal rag las yos su thar par byed parayang 'gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod sum gyi rgyal bo skam dri ma med ces bya bar gyur cagi smanagyi rgyal skaram dris med ba khyod
ma 'ongs ba'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ bskal pa grangs med pagang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyegs pa la bab bano/ bskal pa bzang bo la sas rgyas stong
rtsa bzhi po dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring po ma lon pa rang gi smon lam ji ltar ba tab pa'i bar dag bzhin dubasod snyoms 'bul ba'agyurazhing dbananagshegs pa soge'abashes
gnyen gtsug khur ba zang bo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par tshogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs

pa gsal mdzad ces bya ba sasargyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ro// khyod kyi tsho'i tshong ni bskal pa phyadangu'agyurato// bskal pa bzang po sangs rgyas stong rtsa bzhi po dod ginyan thos kyi dge 'dun
grubya/ nyid du'agyur ba khyod gcig bu'i thos kyi dge 'dun yang de snyed du'agyul/ sems can de dkya 'dul bar 'gyuro// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang ji srid dubaskal pa

chen po bzang po'i bskal pa zad par mgyur ba de srid du/ dam pa'ichos nub bar mi 'gyur la de srid dusangs rgyas kyi sku dug kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhingagazhan dag dusngosakyi char bsasems
tshe na rnams kyi mos pa'i nad rnams dang/ ltakha'i nad rnams dang/ lus kyind rnams kyi bar dag kyang rab tuzhale 'byed par 'gyural/ sems can rnams kyakhasonams bya ba'i dngos po
a gsum bo dag la rab tu'agod tsamatho 2si la gzhol bar byed par yang 'gyur ro//
bam po dgu pa// rigs kyi bu danas byang chub sems dpa'
sman gyi rgyal po skar ma dri ma med pas gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'adas gal te badrag ri ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ltan/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams kyi
tshu mtshan gyis brgyunapa' phyag gas bdag ga spyi bo la byug par gsol/ rags kyi bunas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po skar ma/
ma dri ma med pa sems dgala'ange ma la ya'i sa shing rab tu dga' bar gyur te/ de bzhazhigshegs ba'ani po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas s/ langs te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/
bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyisalhabaka bgos bskon te/ smras l/ skyes bu dum b.legs so legs so// khyod kyis smon lam bzang por btab ste/ da phyin chapa khyod kyis kho bo'i bsnyen bkur bya
tshadegs kyis/ ji ltar bde ba nyidadu sbyod ga/ gas kyi bu des bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar thams cad dang ldan pa 'khor 'di na snang ba dag da lta' bdag
gas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag blan mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzani tu bcug go/ sems can chen po 'dig thams cad kyis nismon lam rgya cha dgu
btachung/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba shastag yongs sukhAngs te/ khyab 'jug rlung ma gtogs ba byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis rtsod ba'i dus yongs su spyas pas/ bdag gis ni
rtsod ba'i dus la bab pa'i gyur ba na/ sems can rnams chos kyis bcud kyis mgron duganyer bar bya zhing/ brtson 'grus brtan por bya ste/ bdag gsatsanis kyang byang chub sams dba'i 'khor
te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag la legs soms bya ba byani cing lung ston bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du
sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag khyogs btsun bzhugs 'tshozhingesazhes l sems can rnams la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gis seng ge 'i sgrubasgrigs pa legs
so zhes bya ba bya'i zhatshe/ bla na med pa yang ga bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par yang mdzad la phonyidag kyang gtong bar 'gyur ba dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i kho'as kyang de thes/

pho nya de dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang/ go ba yang phyi ma'i dus na/ snya chen po dang ldan pa'i bye chub sems dpa' dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de lta bu'i rtsod pa chen po 'dus kyi tshil
sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mos pa can du smon lam gyis byang chub yongs su'adzan pa 'a 'gyurazhing/ chos kyi mu ge'i dgon pa dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ nad dag gis bdas par gyur par sems
rgyu can rnams yongs su skyob par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas mdzad ya mdzad par 'gyur la/ sems can rnams la yang chos ston par 'gyur ba dang/ bag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang/ bskal
pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bsam gyis ma khyab pa dag 'das kyi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal dum mchis pa dang/ dpag tu ma mchis pa dag nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das dpag tu ma mchis pa dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsngags pa brjod tsang snyan pa dang/ byas kyang sgrog par gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdun du badrag gasmon
lam gyi tshul yang brjod par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos shing byin gyis brlabs pa'i smon lam mthong nas mchog tu mtshar du 'dzin par
'gyur zhing de dag kyang sems can la snying rje chen po skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ de nas de dag kyang de lta bu dag ni go sa su 'dzani bar 'gyur zhing ltar da ltar bdag gis yongs su bzung
ba de lta bu'i sas rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa nad gdudadag kyang byang chub mngon par rtogs bar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyurab dang/ tshubo bzhis bsdus bar gyur pa'i sems can nams sgrol bar 'gyur/
zhing theg pa gsum po dag gas 'dul ba'agyur ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi bar dag la'agod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i smon lam gyis seng ge 'i bsgrags par bya'o snyam mo//
gis kyi bu mdunan 'don gyi gtsobo khyim ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ sa rjen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i smonalam de ltabu dag yang dag bar skyengs/ chos gos phrag pa gcig tugazar to/

de bzhin gshegs 'ani po che'i snying bo ga la ba desong ngo// yang de'i tshonalha bye ba khrag khriga'abum phrag mang po dag gis nam mkha'i dkyilanasalha'asal snyan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po
dag gis salabakrol zhing me tog gi char rab tu phab nas tshig mthun par sbas la/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du songal smon lam
kyi rab mchog dag shod lazung shagi dung/ khyodaminyon mongasapas dkrugs pa'i 'jig rten dusems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal yeshes kyi chus rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad dang ldan
'a pa'i 'khor des kyang thal mo sbyar te mngon du phyogs nas/ tshagi mthun par smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so// mkhas pa rab mchog bdag cag la phan par mdzad pa blo
zla mchog mnga' pa smon lam brtan po thobashag dang/ bdag cag kyang nyan par 'tshal lo// gang ga tshomadun na 'don song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sduramadunan 'donagyis bus mo'i lha ngas
la btsugs pa dang/ de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'a'adza?g rten gyi khams jatsim pa de thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul//
'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ ldeg rab tu ldeg go/ sal snyan dag kyang ma bkrol bar sgra khrol lo// ri dgas dang bya gagaji snyad pa de dag thams cad kyang 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra sgrogs so//
shing ljon pa dag las kyang ma tego dag 'bul lo// stong sum gyi stopachen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nasems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang/ gshani rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams ma gtogs pa

gang su dag sa la rten cing gnas pa'i 'byung bo byang chub yang dag bar 'dzan tu bcug pa gang yan pa dag dang/ byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du ma bcug pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang phan pa'i sems dang//
dgeba'isoms dang/ khon med pa'i soms dang/ rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang/ byams pa'i soms dang/ ngomatshar gyi sems dug tu gyur te// sems can gangadag nam mkha' la rgyu bde gakyi bram

ze'i smon lam sgra 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba mnyanapa'i phyir/ nam mkha' la 'od nas 'di ltar mchog tu dga' kha'i yad kyis me tog dang/ me tog phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ rinapo 'chi'i
gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ gos dang/ ras bcos bu dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to// de bzhin du'og min gyi gnas man chang gyi lha gang ji snying ba rnams kyang bram
smon lam nyan pa'i phyi'i/ 'dzam bu'i gling du babs te/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod cing/ lha'i smyos nga/ ras bas khu bar dag gis mchod pa'i las la brtson pa 'gyur to// bram zes
kyang thal mo sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po chab snying bo la tshagis su bcad pa 'dAdIg gas mnopa rab stod de/ bsam gtan dag gsa rnam grol tshangs pa bzhin// gzung
sa 'od gsal ba bya'i 'drab ste// rgyal bo bzhin du nor 'bru 'bagateng zhang// ni chen mchog mar thub ba tshong deng bzhin// zha ba sgrogs mdzad ral seng ge 'dra// mi 'gul brtan ba
lhun po 'dra ba ste// rgya mtsho bzhin du 'khrug pa mi mnga' zhing// yon tan skyon la sa bzhin mtshungs par spyod// dri ma thams cadud pa chu bzhin te// thul ba mo lta ra
nyon mongs nags rnams sreg/ rlung ltar gang la'ang chags ba ma mi nga' zhing/ thub ba lha ltar yang dag nyid kyang ston// klu lha thub ba chos kyi char 'bebs shing// charab lo zhan du 'gro
'tsho kun ngoms par mdzad// kha rol mu stegs 'dzoms la seng ge 'dra// me tog batshan du yon tan yang gtong// tshangs pa bzhin du snyan pa tshig gsun gzhung// 'gro ba sdug bsnga' grol
rgyu mdzad sman pa bzhin// sems mnyam nye bar gnas ba ma bzhin te// 'gro ba rtag tu rjes 'dzan mdza' shes 'dra// brgyal dgra 'joms rdo rje brten bzhin te// thub ba mtshon bzhani srid ba'i
khra shang gcod// zam pa'i shang bzhane'agro ba sgrol mdzad cing// klu ltar thub bam shes tsa rnams sreg/ grub pa mngang ltar 'ong bsal gtong mdzad cing// mi yi bad+ma 'byabanyi ma
khanyani// 'bras bu mchog bzhu sbyin mdzad ljon shing 'dra// thub pabyabazhin drang srong tshogs kyis bskor// rgyalab 'ablo yangs rgya mtsho bsrub ste// 'gro ba dag las mas mnyam rtsa shang
khazhani/ malam bzhin du chos rnams stong rtog cing// 'jig rjes mthun 'jug chu dang 'dra// thubapamtshan mchog mnga' ba thugasacan// khyod kyis soms na byang chub lung
yang bstan// sems can mang bo mtha' yas khyod kyis btul// bya chub chog rab tun bdag lung ston// drang srong chen po bden bzhi shes rab mchog/ bdag ni 'gro nyonamos
'thab rtsod che// sas rgyas byang chub lung ston rogs cho la// sems can brgya dag zhi bde'i lam du'od// gis kyi bu gangag tshomadunan 'don gyi gtsobobram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis//
de bzhin gshegs pa ni po che'i snying po la tshigs su bcad pa dpag gis mngon par bstod de/ de na 'dug pa de'i mol// lha dang drawe dang mdang thams can dang ldan pa'i 'khorades legs so
legs so zhes bya ba bya no// mdunana'adon gyis gsolapa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'angs bdag gis srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag pa
'an du stsal te/ de dag gis kyang rang rang ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya che dag dag yongs su bzung zhing dul ba'asems can ya bsam ba yos su dag pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun ba dang/ gdul
sla ba dgu yongs subazung lags so// gang dag skar ma skyong la sogs ba bram ze'i khye'u rig byeng klog pa stong bzhi po 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas bskal pa bzang po rilung bstan te//

skyes bu dam pa de dag gis kyang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang/ nga rgyal spyod pa dag theg pa gsum kho dag gas 'dul bar bgyi lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag gse'ogamongs pa'i sgrib pa shas che ba dang
rtsod pa'i dus kyi snyagasam dag yongs su spyas pas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang/ mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa rnams dang/ a pa'i chos ba rnams/
nga 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa rnams dang/ log par lta ba las dang/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang/ phar mi 'dzan pa rnams dang/ mar ma 'dzani pa rnams dang/
dge sbyong du mi 'tshanil rnams dang/ bram zer mi 'di pa rnams dang/ bgyi ba ma lags par bgyi de pa rnams dang/ bsod nams malags par bgyid pa rnams dang/ 'jig rten pha rol
zla 'gos bar mi lta ba rnams dang/ legs par sbyod pa gsum po dag don du mi gnyer ba rnams dang/ de bzhin du khyu dang kha mas kyi dpal dang/ 'byor pa dag la brtson pa rnams nyes par
spyod pa gsum po dag la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang bral ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes nyen thams cad kyis spros pa rnams dang/ mkhas pa
thams cad kyis bor ba rnams dang/ sride ba'i btson rar chudapa rnams dung/ rgyun phyogs su bdas pa rnams dang/ 'gyur byed chu klung du nub pa rnams dang/ la 'o ba'i 'dam du
byang ba rnams dang/ gti mug gi mun pa dang ma bral ba rnams dang/ ma dge ba'i bgyi'i thams cad m gtang ba rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong ba thams cad du bor ba rnams dang/
mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang 'grogs par gyu rapa rnams dang lamangan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang shu nyam ngaban po thob par gyur pa rnams spangs lags te/ de'i tshe na bskal pa
bzangapo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzed na/ mi'i tsho lo bcu thub par 'gyur ba thams cad skyes bu dam pa mkhA pa 'di dag gis spangs shing bor bas/ 'tsho sridapa'i dba' klong dang/ 'khor ba'i
'khrul 'khoran skyob pa ra ma mchis pa dang/ skyabs ma mchis pa dang/ dpung gnyen ma mchis pa dang/ sdug bsngal gyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag sbyangs nas/ rang rang ga sangs rgyas kyi
zhangabazang dgu yongs su bzung shin tu ngul pa dang/ bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang/ sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bgyi na/
bgyis pa'i 'al ba rnams yongs su bzung ba de lta bu ma lags sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni po che'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ bram ze de bzhin te/ sems can bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
dusmon lam 'debs par byed cang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yang yongs su bzung ba rnams pas kyang de nyid du lung bstan te// bram zes gsol pa/ btsunapa bcom ldan 'das/
bdag ni dper na/ shang kang ku sha'i 'dab ma bzhin du snyape'adar zhing bdag g.yang Tishani[G]skyol/ bdag gi lus thams cad ni thang bar gyur cing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal
te de byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis skus gang tsed pachen po'i dus kyi mun par 'phang ste thams cad kyis yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems can rnams bdag gasnying rje'i
gnas su 'gyur bstan/ btsunab bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa 'dus na/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+ga'i klung gcig gi khyim snyed gnyis pa la bab ba na/ bskal pa bzang po de la

skye dgu tsho laskong thub pa na/ sdod tsang bdag yun rang bosrid du byang chub kyi spyad pa spyodab na 'khor bas yongs su ma skyo ba'agyutsagi/ bdag gi tingang 'dzani gyi stobs kyis yun ring por sar bar
bgyi 'tshal ba'i gdul ba rnams yo ngas su'adzan pa la spro bar bgyi zhing pha rol tuphyin pa drug la spyod pa na/ 'dul ba rnams yongs su gzungabar bgyi ste/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las/

dngos pa'i mtshan ma yongs su btang ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa legs so zhes thos pas bdag gis de lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba spyad par bgyit+taM/ ji ltar tsho rabs gzhan dag na/
slongs mo pa 'i sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag 'chibaba'agyun yang de dag la yongs su gtong ba 'di lta bu dag yos su gtong bar gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ zas dang skom dang bza' ba dang
bca' ba dang btung ba dang/ bldag pa dang/ gos dar/ mal chadang/ stan dang/ gnas dang/ me tog phrang dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ naba'i gsos smanagyi sbyin pa dang
gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ grubapo che dang/ rtadang/ bang rta dang/ gser dang dngul dang/ mgron bu dang nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/
brladang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ bya ru dang/ dngul can dang/ sa le sbram gyi sbyin pa thams cad yang dang yang duyongs su gtong ba na/ bdag kyang 'di ltar mchog tu dga' zhing snyirje'iyod/
kyis 'bras bu ma 'chel bar sems can rnams la stsal nas/ sems can yongs su sman par bgyi ba'i don dang/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i slad du btang ba'i tshogs rnams
yongs su gtong bar gyur cig/ gal te yang btang bar dka' ba slongaba'isems can dag mchis naas/ 'di lta ste/ branangang bran mo dang/ grongadang grong khyer dang/ rgyal srid dang/
mchis brang dang/ bu dang bu mo dang/ lag pa yongs su gtangab dang/ rkangapa yongs su btung ba dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang mag dang/ lce dang/ pags pa dang/ khrag dang/ rus pa dang
lus dang srog dang/ mgo yongs su btang ba de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba dag slong bar bgyadenayang mchog tu dga' zhing/ snying rje'i yade kyis 'bras bu mi 'tshalabar 'dul ba rnams la phan
gdags pa'i slad du/ sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyane par gyur cig/ bdag gis 'di lta bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang spyad par bgyi ste/ gang sngon chad nam yang sems can gang/
gis kyang de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba yongs su btang bar ma gyur pa dang/ man chad kyang byang chub sems dpa' na med pa yang dgapar tshogs ba'i bya chub kyi sad dusbyakha sbyod pa gang
yang de lta bu'i yongs su gtong ba yongs su gtong bar ma gyur de lta bu yongs sugatong ba dag yongs sugatong ba'agyur gi/ gangabadagatsarabs gzhanon bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gras ma

mos pa de dang de dag tu bla na med yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad pa spyod pa nayang sbyani ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pagyuragi/ bdag gis sadama' byang chub sems dpa' snying rje
chen po dpaldan bag lags pa rnams kyang yongs su gtong ba'i tshul gyi yon tanal 'godapar gyur cigo/ nyon mongs pa 'gayulo rab tu zhib gang lags pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha sol tu phyin pa lags
te delta'abag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du spyad ba sbyod pa na/ rtag par tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs snatshogs kyi dga' ba spyad pa spyod par gyuratsagi/
ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du yul rnams la mi bzod ba ma mchis pa dang/ bdag la so sor rtog pa'i bar gang lags pa de na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/ bdag de lta bu'i bzod pa
sgom pa'i gyuratsagi/ ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du 'dus byas thams cad dbenabanyidirang/ 'dus ma byas thams cad zhib sgomapal btson nang/ bla na med pa 'i sbyor ba las slar
mi ldog pa gang lags pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// 'du byed thams cad la phyin calog spang ba'i skad du stong pa 'di la sbyod pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu/
phyin pa lags so// rang bzhan gyis ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa gang lags pa don/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags te/ gang dag boskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu ma mchis grasam

mchas pa dag tu spro ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis skyed pa la ji ltar sngon chad byang chub sems ban mdab yang dag par rdzogs pa 'a byang chub kyi slad du/ spyad pa spyod pa 'gas kyang de ltar spro
ba brtan po'i stobs kyi shugs kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma spyad cing/ slad kyis byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa yi byang chub kyi slad du spyod
pa spyod par gyur pa dag kyang de ltar spro ba brtan pa'i stobs kyishugs kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi 'gyurab de lta bu la bdag spyod par gyur cig/ slad ma'i byang chub sems

dpa' snying rje chen po dang ldan pa gang yan pa rnams kyang tshul gyi yon tan la 'godapar gyur cig/ bdag gis soms dang po bskyed pas kyang slang ma'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po
'grub par gyur cig/ blan mad pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du byachub sems dpa' rnams ngo mtshar du 'dzani par bgyi ba'i da dubadag sbyin pa la rlom sams ma mchis bar spyod par
rgyucig/ tshul khrims la gnas pa ma mchis pa dang/ bzod pa la nom sems ma mchis pa dang/ brtson 'grus la bang ba ma mchis pa dang/ bsam gtan rnams la//
gnas pa ma mchis pa dang/ shes rab la gnyis su ma mchis par spyod par gyur cig/ sems can 'aphags ba'i nor bdun dang bral ba rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong ba thams
cad dubor ba rnams dang/ dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa rnams dang/ lag par lta ba rnams dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'gregs shangenyam
nga ba thob pa rnams dang lAn pas bcom par gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag 'bras bumi 'tshal bar spro ba brtan pa'i stobs kyi shugs kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod pa
gyur cayig/ bdag gas sems can re re'i don duyang sems kyi rgyud la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon gzhag pa'i sladadu bskal pa chen po bcur yang sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyi
tshor ba la sbobar gyur cig/ de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang/ ya degs rnams dang/ gnod sbyin dbul po rnams dang/ ma dbul po rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba yang spro bar
gyur cig/ ji ltar sems can gcig gi sems kyi rgyud la dgopa'i sa bon 'jog pa lta/ soms can thams cad la yang de bzhin du gyuratsage/ chapa stong pa lta bu dang/ sems kyi rgyud

tshagi ba 'dul ba de lta bu dgu yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig/ bdag gis srid pa tha ma pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar brgyad pa'i slad duskye ba gcig gisathogs shing/ dga' ldan gyi/
gnas nas dus la sdod cing mchis pa ma gtogs pa bskal pa'i mtha'i bar du yalta'i bde ba skye bdag don dum gnyer bar bdag gis yun ring po de sridangu 'khor bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

sa ngas rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la bsnyen bkurab gyis nas/ bgasangs rgyas re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phrarab kyardul snyed kyi mchod pa rnams sna tshogs dag bgyid par

gyuracig/ sangs rgyas re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab gyardul snyed kyi yon tan dag rtogs par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi yong gardulaphrarab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyang byung

chub ma dag ba'adzan du stsol bar gyur cig/ de bzhin dbangag garing sangs rgyas kyi thogapa dang/ de bzhin du nyan thos kyi thogab pa'i soms can rnams kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin duyang dag par 'dzani
du stsol bar gyur cig/ 'jig rtenan sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis na yang dag gi drang srong gi brtul zhugs kyis sems can rnams dage ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sbyor ba'agyur tsag/ tang 'dzani
rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa dag la yang sbyor bar gyuratsagi/ bdag gis sems can lta ba la chags shing dbang phyug chen po la dad pa rnams kyang dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis ge rnams l sbyorab r
da bya// gyuracig/ bdag gis sems can sred med kyi bu dang/ zla ba dang/ nyim dang/ tshangs ba'i bar dag la dudapa rnams kyang tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis dge ba'i chos rnams la/
sbyor bar gyur cig/ de bzhin dunam mkha' lding rnams la yang nam mkha'i lhangag gzugs dang/ brgya byin gyi bar la yang brgya byin gyigazugs kyis dgaba'i spyod pa dag la sbyor bar gyur cig/
kha sems can ltogs pa rnams la yang rang gi sha dbakhrag gas tshim par brgyade par gyur cig/ sems can sdug bsngal bar gyurab rnams la yang rang gi lus dang srog gas yongasasu skyob pa 'gyuracig/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag yun ring po de srid du sems kyi rgyud tshagi cang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su nyams pa rnams kyi don du stobs po cheshugs kyis spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag gis yun
nga po de srid du 'khor bar sems can rnams kyi slad du/ gtum pa dang/ bsrung ba dang/ mi bzad pa sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal dgunod par gyur cagi/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+ga'i klung
gcag gabye ma snyed kyi kher dag 'das nas/ lhag ma bskul pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+ga'i klung gi khyemasnyad gnyasi pa la bab ste/ bskal pa bzang po la thug pa na/ gang gi tshe bram ze'i khye'uskur
ma skyong bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs bar sangs rgyas M nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba'adzag ces bgyi bar 'gyurab/ de'i dus na bdag gis 'phags
pa'i shes rab kyi mgi gas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sas rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bsnyem ldan 'das dag chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas
bzhugs te 'tsho' gzhes pa dag mthong bar gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can sems kyi rgyud tshagi pa rnams dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ 'grogs ba rnams dang/ lo bdun dang bral
ba rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong par bor ba rnams dang/ mtshams ma mchis pa brgyade pa rnams dang/ dam pa'i tshes spong ba rnams dang/ lam ngan pa 'bir gyis bcom pa rnams dang

nyamang thob pa gang dag dang po thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu stsalamangebatsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sems can dedag bdag gis dang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag
bar 'dzani tu stsol ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin tu stsol la 'dul nga'adzud de rab tu 'god par gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can de dag gi dge
ba'i rtsa ba' sa bon de yang bla na mang ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog cing/ n gnas ong rnams las yos su thar bar bgyid par gyur cig/ shes rab dang bsod nams kyi tshogs la sbyor bar yang
gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yong de dag tu 'bul bar yang gyur cig/ de'atsho bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
bstan pa yang thob par gyur cig/ tadenge'adzan dang/ gzungs dang bzod pa dag kyang thob bar gyug/ sa gnonapar yang gyur cig/ bdag gis sems can de dag/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tanabakodapa'i smon lam yang dag bar 'dzani dustsolatsange slob tu stsol bar yang gyur cig/ dengag kyang ng ltatsham pas nags rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod ba dag kyang 'dzin bar
gyur cagi/ gang ga tshobaskal pa bzang po la bab ste/ rgyal ba nyi ma 'khor ba 'jig shar ba de tsho/ bdag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag/ sas rgyas
bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tshozhi gnas la sems can rnams l chos kyang ston pa dag kyang mthong bar gyur cig/ de'i tshon bdag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar tshog sala'i
sangs rgyas 'khor babag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ring po ma lags pa'i drung dumachibar gyur cig/ mchis nas kyang nga tshogs brgyud par gyur cig/ zhu ba yongs su zhu bar yang
gyur cig/ rab tu 'byung bar yang gyur cig/ tshul khrims dang/ thes pa dang/ tangange 'dzani dag la mngon par brtson par yang gyur cig/ chos kyi mchog ston par yang gyur cig/
deb tshesems can gang dag sems kyi rgyud tshig pa rnams dang/ ma dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa 'gyur pa rnams dang/ lta ba'alam du zhugs pa rnams pa'/ mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid/
pa rnams dang/ lam ngan pas bcom par gyur pa rnams dang/ nyam nga ba chen po thob pa 'gyur sems can de dag la yang chos ston par gyur cig/ bdag 'dul ba de dag kyang rab tu 'dzani par

gyur// rgyal ba'anyi tshe nub ba de'i tshon bdag lhun gyis grub pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyud par 'gyur zhing skye dgu rnams tshe lo brgya par gyur gyi bar dusams na rnams bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po
gsum po dag la sbyor bar gyur cig/ dus dal bab pa na lha'i 'jig rten dumachis nas lha rnams l chos ston par 'gyur zhing 'dulab rnams kyang rab tu 'dzani par gyur cig/ sems can rnams kyi tshil
brgya nyi shu pa'i bar du 'gyur ba na/ bad bdang/ dbang phyug dang rig dang/ gzugs kyi drigs pas myosashing/ sorasnacan du gyur te/ snyigs ma lnga'i mun par chud pa'i soms can 'dod
chags bdo ba/ zhe sdang bdob/ gti mug bdob/ nga rgyal bdo ba/ snag pa dang/ phrag dog dang/ sor sna bde ba/ chos ma lags pa la 'dod chags kyis chags pa/ chos la
lags pa'i longs spyod tshol ba/ leg par lta ba/ phyin ci log tu mthong ba/ 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang bral ba/ phar ma 'dzan pa dang/ mar mi 'dzazhi pa dang/ dge sbyong du mi
'dzan pa// bram zer ma 'dzin pa/ bgyi ba ma lags pa bgyi pa/ bsod nams ma legs pa brgyad pa/ 'jigarten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba/ bsod nams bgyi ba'i
dngos bo gsum po dag la mi brtson pa/ theg pagasum don du mi gnyer ba legs par spyod pa gsum la mi brtson pa// nyes pa lnga spyod pa gsum la brtson pa/ dge
ka ba bcu'alas kyi lam ma brtsonapa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la brtson pa/ phyin ci logabag nyamasapa/ rgudapa bzhal gnas pa/ bdud bzhi'i dbang du mas pa//
tsha chu bo bzhis ded pa/ sgrub pa lnga'i dbang du mchis pa'i sems can dag 'byungabara'agyur lags so// dbang po drug gi drigs pas myos pa/ log pa brgyad la zhugs pa// 'dod
pa'i nyam pab thob pa/ bag la nyal kun nas slong ba/ lha dang mi'i dpal dang/ 'byor pa don du mi gnyerab/ phyin ci log gi lta ba can/ lam ngan pas bcom pa/ mtshams
mams pa bgyi dpa/ dam pa'i chos so ga/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams pa/ khwa ltar mu noras ba/ byas pa mi gzo ba/
dran pa nyams pa/ dge ba la smod pa/ shes rab 'chal ba/ thos pa nyung ba/ tshul khrims 'chal pa/ tshul 'chos pa/ sar sna can phan tshun ma snyan pa brjod pa/
gtsagi la gcige ma rgyas pa/ le lo can/ dbang po ma tshang ba/ nyam chung ba/ gos ma mchis pa/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis zin pa/ bsam pa dang dran pa'i snying po nyam pa
ka nad sna tshogs kyis nyen pa/ nyon mongs par gyur pa/ marag ngan pa mi sdug pa/ ngo tshab ma mchis pa/ khrel ma mchis pa/ gcig gis gcig 'jigs pa/ gang dag snga po gcig la
lus dang/ ngag dang yade kyis nyes par sbyod pa mang du spyod pa de dag la stod tsang/ thar zug tu lta ba'isems can jug kyang 'byungabar 'gyur lags so// thungapo lta la mngon par zhen pa'i
sams dang/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chums pa'isoms dang/ sdang ba'i sems dang/ gnod sems kyi sems dang/ khon 'dzani pa'i sems dang/ rnam par 'tsho ba'i soms dang/
rtog pa'i sems dang/ rtsub pa'i sems dang/ 'khrug pa'i sems dang/ ma dul ba'i soms dang/ gnod pa' sems dang/ rgod pa'i sems dang/ chos ma lags pa la mngon par
zhen pa'i sems dang/ khyad par la ma gnas pa'i sims dang/ phan tshun nos pa rtsom pa'i sems dang/ 'dzangs pa'i sims dang/ gcig la gcig gsod pa'i soms dang chos yos
su spyas pa'i sems dang/ mi brtson pa'i sems dang/ chos rnams la nongs par brtson pa'i sems dang/ mi dge ba skyed pa'i sems dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba mtshol ba'i soms dang/
sbyi'i gnas ma lags pa'i sems dang/ kun tu sbyor ba dang/ 'chi ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'isoms dang/ nad dang/ rga ba dang/ 'chib la yid rton pa'i soms dang/
kun tu sbyor ba thams cad kyis gnas pa'i sims dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i soms dang/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan bstsal bar bgyi ba'i sems dang//
ltakha' rgyal mtshan bsgang bar gyi ba'asims dang/ phan tshun mi snyan pa brjod pa'i sems dang/ gcig gis gcige bza' ba'i sems dang/ phan tshun 'tshab la dbang brgyad pa'i sems dang
tshu/ zhe sdang yang dag par 'dzan pa 'i sems dang/ gcig la gang gi kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang/ 'dod pa dgags ngoms ma myong ba'i soms dang/ thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing
'jug pa'i sems dang/ byas pa mi gzo ba'i soms dang/ gzhan chungam brnab pa'i sems dang/ gnod sems kyis 'tsho ba'isoms dang/ smon lam ma mchis pa'i sems dang ldan
pa'i sems can dag kyang deSh+Tha tshin 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// der sgra 'di lta bu dag phan tshun thos par yang brgyad de/ sems can dmyal ba'i sgra dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnasakyi sgra dang/
gshani rje' 'dzage rten gyi sgra dang/ nad kyi sgra dang/ rnaba' sgra dang/ 'chabo'asgra dang/ gsod pa'i sgra dang/ mi khom pa'i sgra dang/ rtag tu dgra bgyid pa'i sgra dang/ khung sgo ngang
khong sgril dang/ 'ching ba dang/ btson ra'i sgra dang/ chad pa'i sgra dang/ gnod pa'i sgra dang/ mi snyan pa dang/ gshe ba dang/ sbyo ba'i sgra dang/ khyim 'bugs pa'i sgra dang/
tshogs byed pa'i sgra dang/ chom rkun gyi skadar/ b.rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi sgra dang mu ge'i sgra dang/ 'dod bal la go bar g.yem pa'i sgra dang/ brdzun du ba'i sgra dang/ ltas nagyi/
sgra dang/ phra ma'i sgra dang/ ga rtsub po'i sgra dang tshig khyal pa'i sgra dang/ phrag dogadang/ sor sna'i dang/ kun tu 'dzani pa dang/ yongs su 'dzin pa'i sgra dang/ nga 'tshanab dang/
bdag gir 'dzin pa 'i sgra dang/ sdug po dang mi sdug pa'i sgra dang 'deng ba pad ma 'dod pa'i sgra dang/ stug pa dang bral ba'i sgra dang/ nyo tshongag sgra dang/ gcig ga gtsag 'khol zhing 'tsho ba'i
sgra dang/ mngal na gnas pa'i sgra dang/ drang ba'i sgra dang/ grang ba'i sgra dang/ tshaba'i sgra dang/ bkros pa dang/ skom pa'i sgra dang/ la dang chad pa ratshol ba'i sgra dang/ zhing slas kyi
sgra dang/ bzo'i las sna tshogs kyis yongs su skyo ba'i sgra dang/ nad snatshogs kyis nyen pa'i sgra dag ste/ sems can de dag gcig la gtsagi sgra de lta bu dag thos par yang bgyid lags so//
de'i tshon 'dzagi rten gyi khams mi mjed na/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su nyams pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su nyams pa/ sdangaba'i sems dang ldan pa de lta bu dag thos nas kun tu btam
par gyur te/ sems can dedagan thems cad de dag ni mkhyen pa dag gis stongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su bor bar 'gyur te/ ji ltar bza' ba dang btub dang/ dul ba dang/ yang dag
khabasdom pa dang/ dge ba'i las kyi bya ba dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa dang bral zhing mi dge ba dang 'gregs la/ mun khrong nas mun khrod du mchab 'i sems
na de gan/ de'atshonalas gyi rgyun rab tu dam pos bskal pa bzang po la lo brgyad lishu pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur lags sa// sems can de dag gi las kyi rgyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing sa
'a mjed kyang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can thams rud kyis yongs su spangs shing dman par 'gyur te/ sa gzhi btsa can du 'gyur sa gzhagor ma dang gseg cha dang/ rdul dang
wi ring 'ong can du 'gyur/ sha sbrang dang/ sbrang bu mchuranges dang/ sprul dang/ gcan gzan khro ba dang/ bya gdug pa ga las kun tu bltam ba 'gyur/ dus ma lags par rdul gyis
'khrigs pa'i bsar ma lcangabar 'gyur/ dusamalags bar 'o ma mchis bo dang/ lan tshe dang 'dres ba dang/ mi bsil ba'i char 'bab par 'gyur zhing/ de ltar sa la lo tog dang/ sman dang
rtswa dngashang ljonapa dang/ lam dang/ ma tog dang 'bras bu dang/ 'bru dang/ no rnams dang/ sems can rnams kyi bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ longs sbyod dang/ nyer ba
spyod pa rnams kyang na pa dang/ rnyog pacan dang/ 'ud rong po dang/ rtsub pa dang/ dug dang 'dres par 'gyur te/ sems can ngag gis 'tshal nas kyang/ slar zhing+gargya cher rtsub pa dang
gdug pa dang/ khrab dang/ gtum pa dang/ b.rung ba dang/ 'jungs pa dang/ gsheb dang/ gcig la gcig ma gus pa dang/ 'jigs pa'i sems gyis kun nas mnar sems kyi sams/
dang/ gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur zhing sha 'tshal ba dang/ khrag 'tshal ba dang/ ridigs kyi bags pa 'tshal ba dang/ mtshon thogs pa dang/ srog chags 'gums ba la brtson
pa dang/ byad gzugs dang/ rigs dang/ brgyud dang dbang phyug dang/ bstan bcos dang/ ya gi dang/ rta rtsal dang/ mda' gzhu dang/ mtshon cha thogs pa dang/ 'khor dang/
sor snadang/ dregs sa pa 'gyur te/ 'jig rten dka' thubadang/ brtul zhugs ngan pa rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ba de'i tshon/ bdag 'dul ba'i sems can
rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ dga' ldan gyi gnas nas babs te/ 'khor la sgyur ba'i rigs brgyud khyad par du 'phags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i
rigs btsun mo dam pa'i 'ong du mngal na gnas pa nye bar 'dzin par gyur cig/ de'i tshe bdag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhang ma mjed snang ba rgya chen pos khyab bgyid
par 'gyur zhing steng dun 'og min gyi gnam gyi bar gyi mthar thug pa'i bar dang/ 'og tu ni gsar gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar dag kyang snang brgya chen pos khyab par gyur cig/ de'i tshe
nas ngas rgyas kyi zhing las dan/ sams gang dag sems dmyal ba rnams dang/ dud 'gro'askye gnas dang/ gshage'i 'jig rten dang/ lha dang mi rnams su
skyes bar gyur bar de dag thams cad kyis kyang snang ba de mthong yang drag pa dang/ kun tu 'tshal bar gyur cig/ 'khor ba la rtog cing sdug bsngal gyis yang byung ba de dag kyang/ mya ngan las
'das par 'tshalazhing tha na nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyi ba'asims skyed par yang gyur cig/ dang po lam mchog gis bon 'di yang skyong par gyur// gang gatsho dag chos thamasacad kyi tshul
la mkhas pa'i tipe de 'dzinethams cad ston pa'i chos kyi sgo gcig gis bskal pa phyi ma'i mthar ston cing/ sems can mnyam par bzha gnas / zla ba bcurama'i mngal na gnas par gyur cig/
bdag gsasangs rgyas nyidi thob nas/ yongs su skyo ba'i soms can gang dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar bgyid bar 'gyur ba'is khas can de dag gas/ bangag zla babcur ma'i mal nor bu'i
snying po la yang dag par ston ba la sems mnyam par bzhag nas skyil mo krung gis mchis pa mthong bar gyur cig/ blabab po 'dus nas bdag gas bsod nams thams cad yang dag par
bsags paT ting nge 'dzin gyis thams cad ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyis rnams pa drug tugayo bar bgyidabar 'gyur zhing/ steng dun 'ogaman gyi gnas agyi mthar thug pa'i bar dang/
khog tun gsar gyi 'khor le'i mthar thug pa'i bar dag kyang/ rnam pa drug tugayo bar brgyad par gyur cig/ de'i tshon sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du sems can gang dag sems can dmyal ba rnams//
dang ma rnams su skyes par gyur ba de dag kyang rab du sad pa bgyidabar gyuracig// theg pa chen po snying rje pad+ma dkar po'amados bam po bcu pa////bdag ma'i mchan khung g.yas pa nas mngon par

'byungaba'i tsayang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed snangab rgya chen pos khyab bar gyur cig/ de'i tshe de'i dus na sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjedathams cad kyi sems can rnams la yang
dag par skul bar gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i soms can rnams kyi rgyud la mya ngan 'das pas bon 'debs bar gyur cig/ rgya ngan las 'das pa'i sa bon bskyed pa'i sems can rnams kyi

rgyud la ni// tingade'adzani gyimyu gu skye da par gyur cig/ gang gi tsho bdag gi rkang pa'i mtha'el rgyas la reg par 'gyur ba de'i tshon/ shAms cad d ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang mi mjed kyis sa gzhi gsal
gyi 'khor le'i mthar thug pa'i bar dag rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa dang/ rab tu 'gul ba dang/ 'khrugs par gyur cig/ de'atshon bdag gis gang dag skye gnas bzhir gtogs shing 'gro ba lnga la
rten pa'i sems can tshul rten ba rnams dang/ sa la rten pa rnams dang/ nam mkhA la rten pa de dgathams cad rab tu sadabar bgyid par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gi rgyudal ting ngo'anagyi
smyu gu ma skyes ba rnams kyang sbyang par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin gyi myu gu brtan par gyur ba rnams ni/ theg pa gsum bo dag la phyir mi ldog pa la 'godapar gyur cig/ bdag/
ka btsas ma thag tu de'i modol sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma mjed de'i tshangs pa chen po rnams dang/ bdud rnams dang/ brgya byin rnams dang/ zla ba rnams dang/ nyi ma rnams dang/ 'gi rten skyob
rnams dang/ ku'i rgyal po chen po rnams dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang/ rdzus te skyes pa rnams dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ klu dang/ lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po
thams cad kyang bdagal mchod pa bgyi ba'i sladangu'u bar mchis par gyur cig/ bdag btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyuracig/ bdag gis bsod nams thams cad yang dag par

bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gang lags pa de thog pagasum po dag gis rab tu dang ba thob par gyur ba de lta'achos ston par gyur cig/ 'khoradenanyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i/
rgyu sems can sridapa tha ma par gyur ba gang lags pa de dag bdag gis 'dul bar gyur cig/ de na gang dag rangasas rgyas kyi thogab par gyur pa'i soms na de dag gis rnam par snang byad ma tog gabazod/
pa thob par gyur cig/ den gang dag blan med pa'i theg pa chen po par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis/ rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzani rgya mtsho'ikhrugs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur cig/
nga nge 'dzin des sa gsum po dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur cig/ gang gi tsho bdag khrus bgyid par 'atshal ba na/ naklu rgyal po nabo khyad par du 'phags pa gang dag mchis par gyur pa
dadag bdag la khrus bgyid par gyur cagi/ sems can gang dag gis bdag 'khru bar mtho bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis theg pa gsum po dgags ji skad smos pa'i yon tan de lta bu dag man
par rtogs par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gis bdag shing rta la 'tshal ba mtho bar gyurapa dang/ rgya cher bgyid na sems can gang dag gis bdag gzhon nu rtse ba dag dang/ bza'
gnas dang/ las kyi gnas dang/ stan sna tshogs ston pa dag dang/ b.rub du rung ba dang/ bud moda rnams kyi gnas su 'dod pa'i yon tan lda' dga' ba dang/ rtse mos yid byung nas/
dgungaphyad na mngon par byung ste/ rgyun dang/ lhab lhub spangs nas yang dang yang du gos dmar po dang/ chos gos ngur smag yos su tshol ba dang/ byang chub kyi shing drung dunye bar bgrod
ba'i slad du mtshib mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag la yang bdag gas bsod nams thams cad yang dag par bsags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis cinas kyang theg pa rgasum po dag gisasems cand
dge 'dun pa drag cing brtson par gyur pa de ltar chos ston par gyur cig/ de nagang dag rang sangs rgyas kyi thig par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad byas rnam par snang byed/ me tog gi ting
da'adzin thob par gyuragi/ gang dag gis theg pa chen po'i sa bon btab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'akhrugs kyi ting nge 'dzanithob par gyur cig/
ting nge 'dzin des sa gsum po dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur cig/ bdag nyid kyis gdan btang ba bsdus te/ byang chub kyi shing drung rdo rje'i gdan bshams pa la skyil mo krung bcas nas
lus drang por bsrang ste mchis naas bdags dbugs 'byung ba dang/ dbugs rngub pa nye bar zhi ba de lta bu'i mkha' khyab kyi bsam gtan sgom bar gyur cig/ bdag gdugs la lan cig bsam
gtan las ldang bar gyur cig// langs nas kyang zasasu tal gyi 'bras bu phyad tsag 'tshal bar gyur cig/ phyang naslos kho la stsol bar gyur cig/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du
gtogs pa'i 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyi lha ji snyid pa de dag thams cad kyang/ badrag la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du nye bar mchi bar 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad kyang bdag dga'i
ba sbyod pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba de srid du/ yun ring por bdag de lta bu'i dga' ba spyad pa spyod par gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de na gang dgags nyan thos kyi theg pa rus bon brtag
bar gyur pa de dag gi rgyud la nyon mongs pa zhi bar bgyid par gyur// ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi thig pa pa gang lags pa dag kyang bdag gis 'dul ba'i sridapa thamar
0 dgyur cig/ de bzhin du/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang lha ma an dang nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ yi dwags dag dang/ sha za dang/ grul bum
rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong rnams kyang badag la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchibar 'gyur zhing de dag thams cad bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i dpang du gyur gi/
gangadag nyan thos kyi thog pa pa dgag bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ gling bad pa de na gzhan mu stegs can brtul zhugs dang/ dga' thub ngan pa'i dga' ba spyad pa spyod
ba gang lags pa de dag la yang mi ma lags pa dag gis khyed cag dka' ba byed pa ma yin te/ ji ltar phyogs 'di na bya chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa dang/
stangel yad la byed pa 'dogasashang/ lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs pa dang/ ngag gi 'du byed ni tu sbyangs pa dang/ de'i dbugs dbyung ba dang da dbugs rngub pa dag rab tu zhi ba dang
ni gcig bzhin du lan re bsam gtan las langs nas zas su til gyi 'bras bu phyed za zhing de ltar bsam gtan sgom pa'i dka' ba spyad pa de ni ma bu che ba yin/ de ni 'bras bu che ba yin/
de ni rgya che ba yin te/ de ni ring bo ma thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// gal te yid ma ches na deng la nyid kyis ltos
shagi ces sgo bar gyur cig ngedag gisakyang dka' ba spyod pa de btang ste/ bdag dka' ba spyod pa mthong nas/ gang dag gis sems kyi rgyud la nyan thos kyi theg/
ka ba'i sa ben gyi myu gu gnas par 'gyur ba'i bar du ji ltar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ mi'i rgyal po rnams dang/ bdag bkrabs pa rnams dang/ grom rnams dang/ ljongs kyi mi rnams
dang khyim na gnas pa rnams dang/ rab tu byung ba rnams dang/ grong khyim dang bcas pa gang lags pa de dag kyang bdag dka' ba spyod pa'i drung du mchiba'agyur nang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i
bar du ji ltar sngarasmos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ bud medagang dag blta ba'i slad du mchibar 'gyur ba de yang/ de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma thob par 'gyur khang/ gangadaganyan thos kyi thig ba pa'i
bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ radigs dang/ bya gang dag gas bdag dka' ba spyod tsangamachis pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag kyang/ de dag gi dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi lus kyi
bla ma thob par gyur cig/ radegs dang/ bya gang dag nyag thos kyi thog par sa bon btab par gyur pa dag kyang bdag gis 'dul ba skye ba gcig gis thogs par gyur zhing/ gang dag rang
sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dag gi bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ tshul de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye nas phra mo dag la ya ngabarjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin duyi dgas rnams la
yang brjod par bgyi'o// ji srid dusems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dgu bdag dga' ba spyod pa'i dpang du gyur zhing ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa 'gyur ba dpag tu ma mchis/ gras ma mchis/

pa de dag gi sems kyi rgyud la tharapa'i sa bon skyed par 'gyur ba'i yun ring po de srid du bdag skyol mo lung gcig gis de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad pa spyod par gyur tsag/ ji ltar sngan chadasems can du bgrang ba

gzhan mu stegs can dang nyan thos kyi theg papa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi klog pa pa dang/ bla na med pa' thig pa chen po pa sus kyang sngon de lta bu'i dga' ba ma spyad pal/ slad chadakyang sems can

du bgrang ba dang/ gzhan mu stegs can su yang ji ltar bdag spyod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad paspyod pa rngo ma thog pa de lta bu'i dka' ba spyad pa bdag sprodapar gyur cig/ bdag gis bla na med pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob pa de'i tshe skyes bu'i rtse la bgyid cing/ bdud dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa pham par brgyadapar gyur cig/ las kyi rdebras bu'i lhag ma drang bcas pa la
gnas pa'i 'omongs pa'i bdung las rgyal zhang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ nas kyang bdagasems can gcig gi sams
kyi rgyudal dgra bcom pa nyidi 'jog par 'gyur ba dang/ debabs duganyis pa dang/ de bzhin du gsum pa dang/ de bzhin du bzhi pa la yang chos ston par gyur zhangasams kyi rgyud la yang dag
bcom pa nyidi 'jog par gyur cig/ sems can gacigag don gyi sladadus bdag tsho'aphrul 'bum phrag du ma ston par 'gyur zhing de'i sems kyi rgyud la yang dag pa'i lta ba//
'jog par gyur cig/ chos kyi don dang/ tshagi 'bru stong phrag mang po dag kyang rjod bar gyur cig/ ji ltar ngo thog pa'i 'bras bu la yang 'phrog par gyur cig/ sems can rnams kyi sems
rgyud kyi nyon mongs pa'i ri bo ye shes rdo rjes 'dzoms por gyur cig/ theg pa rnam gsum rnam par dgong pas/ chos ston par gyur cig/ sems can gcig gi don du chos ston cing/
mi 'odrag pa'i go 'phang la rab tu dgod pa'i slad du yang bdag dpag tshad brgya phrag mapo dag tusug pas mchipar gyur cig/ bdag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba dag dgag pa ma mchis par
'gyur zhing/ nyam chung ba dang/ dran pa nyams pa dang/ sems rnam bar 'khrul pa dang/ mu cho' sma ba dang/ phyi rdol can gyi sems dang/ shes rab 'chal pa'i samasadang/
nyon mongs pa mang posadakrugs pa'i sams dang ldan pa rnams dang// bungamong kyang bdag gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ba phun sum tshogs par gyur cagi/ bdag la 'khor bzhi po dge slong
dang/ dge slongam dang/ dge bsnyan dang/ dge bsnyen ma dag mchis skye bo mang po dag gis bstan pa rgyas par gyur cig/ lha rnams kyi bden pa mthob dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang//
klu rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams kyang 'aphags pa'i gso sbyong yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa la gnas pa dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes ba'i bar dag kyang tshangs pa sbyod pa'i gnas bar gyur cig/
btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag byang chub 'thob ba na/ sems can gang dag rab tu snang ba'i sems kyis bdag la mtshon cha'am/ mda' gzhu kham/ mdungangam/ lag ca rnam pa sna tshogs
dag gse 'dabs su mchabe dang/ tshagi rtsub po dang/ brlangapo rtag gas gshe'ang smyo bar 'gyur ba dang/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu yang mi snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs par bgyurab dang/ dug
dab 'dres pa'i bza' ba dang/ btung ba dag stobs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las kyi 'bras bu yongs su ma bas pa la gnas nas/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thobe ba nasoms can dang sngon gyi 'onagyis 'gum pa'i yo byad kyi sbyor bas dag la tshagi rtsub po dang/ mtshon chasnatshogs dang/ dug dang
'dris pa'i btung ba dag stsol bar 'gyur zhing khrag kyang 'byon par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag la bdag gas/ tshul khrims dang/ thos ba dang/ ting nge 'dzani dang/ snying rjechen po bsgoms
pa'i tshangs pa' sgra dbyangs kyi rje sgra bsgrags pas/ de dag gi soms rab tu dang bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston par 'gyur zhing/ dge ba la sbyor bar yang gyur cig/ de ltar sems ma dag/
kyang las kyi sgrib pa'i chags bar 'gyur zhing slar chad kyang sdom pa len par gyur cig/ sems can de dag gsemasi dang/ thar pa'i 'bras bu dang/ 'dod chags
dang bral nga/ zag pa zad ba la sgrib pa'i chos su yang ma gyur cig/ der badrag ga las kyi 'brasabu yang yongs subs pa dang/ mthar thug ba dbyakha'agyur go/ btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das bdag byang chub thob nas kyang gdugs gcig bzhin du bdag gi sbu'akhung bu ji snyid pa desnyad kyi sas rgyas kyi sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan su cutsu gnyis dang/ dpe byadabazang po brgyad
nus legs par brgyan pa dag sprul zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dengagakyang badag gis sangs rgyas kyazhistongapa dag tu 'gyod par gyur cig/ stongapa ma lags pa dag tu yang 'gyed par gyur
gi/ sangs rgyas kyi yonge gi snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa dag tu yang 'gyadabar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gcigegs kyang gdugs gcig la yasangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ sems can
glu gang dga mtshams mamachas pa brgyad pa rnams ng/ dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams dang/ 'bags pa la skur ba 'debs pa rnams dang/ mi dge ba dang 'grogs pa'i bar gadung/ na
sems can gang dganyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang/ rangasas rgyas kyi sgrig pa la yabadag babazhugs ba rnams dang/ theg ba chen po la yang ga bkazhugs pa gal
(bslab pa dag la 'dren bar brgyad pa rnams dang/ zhig ral du spyod pa rnams dang/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba byung ba rnams dang/ sems kyi rgyud tshig ba rnams dang/ dge ba'i lag rab tu nyams pa rnams
nga khoma' 'brog dgon par zhugs pa rnams dang/ lam ngan pas rnam par bcom zhing/ ma ngab chen po thob par gyurapa de lta bu sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum dag la chos ston par
gyur cig/ sems can gang dag dbang phyug chen po la dad pa'isems can de dag la yang dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis chos ston pa 'gyur mgi/ sangs rgyas kyi shong tshad jedadu bdag gi
bsngags pa rjod par yang gyur cig/ der sems can rnams smon lam 'debs pa la brtson par yang gyur cig/ sems can de dag gis bdag gi bstags pa thos nas/ bdagag sangs
rgyas kyi zhing du skyabara'atshala'ang smon lam yang 'dabs bar gyur cagi/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag sems can dengag gum pa'i dus kyi tshomadun dum mchis sam/ chos ma
bstan tam/ sems rab tudang bar ma bgyis na/ bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas par ma gyur cig/ gal te sems can
de dag gum nas ngan 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyuraram/ bdag gisangs rgyas kyi zhing du mi'i lus thob par ma gyur na/ bdag gis tshosathams cad nyams par gyur cig bdag la sla
yang snangabar ma gyur cig/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag sgrub par yang ngom theg par gyur cig/ gal te sems can gang dag slad med kyi bu la dadab/
rnams dang/ samasacan de dag gumanas ngan 'groltung ba'i bar du gyuran/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag sgrub par rdzom thogabar gyur cig/ bdag byang chub thob nas kyang sas
rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dag na/ sems can mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang/ lam ngan pas bcom gange nyam nga ba chen po thob par gyur pa'isems can dag gum nas/ bdag gi sangs

Sh+Tha rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyurab de dag gi mtshan man 'angalags te/ sems can de dag gi kha dogs lta bur 'gyur ba dang/ sha za'i gdong 'dra bo dang/ bskyadangs pa dang/ dri mi bangal ba dang//
tshul khrims 'chal pa dang/ tshe thung ba dang/ nad rnams sna tshogs kyis nyen pa dang/ sems can de dag gi yo byad rnams kyang yongs sutams ba'agyur bo ste/ soms can dedag gi don du

[%, ]bdag de'i na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi klong bzhi pa ji snyid mchis par gyur pa'i glabazhi pa thams cad du yongs su dga' ldan gyi yi/nas nas 'bab cang ma'i mngal du skye ba ston par gyur cig
rgya cher 'gyu na gzhon nu rtse ba dang/ bzo dang/ las kyi gnas dang/ dga' ba spyod pa dang/ bdud 'dul ba dang/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor bskor
bdang/ gling bzhi ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha'adaganye bstod par gyur cig/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang/ sku gdu'agod pa'i bar dag nye bar ston par yang gyur cig/

bdag byang chub thob nas kyang tshig gcig rjod pas chos ston la 'gyu zhing/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag gsan nagros kyi sde snod kyi chos bstan pa'i tshal ba'agyur ga/ rang sangs rgyas
kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gang lags ba de dug gsin/ rang sas rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ bla na med pa'i thogab chen po'isi masacan gangalags ba de dag
gsin/ theg pa chen po'i gtamagyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ tshogs dang bral ba'i sems can gang lags pa dedag la ni/ sbyin pa'i gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/
bsod nams dang bral zhing mtho ris kyi bde ba 'tshol ba'isems can gung lags ba de dag gis ni/ tshul khrims gyi gtam gyi chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ gcig la gcig 'jigs pa dang/

rtog pa 'asoms dang rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan ba gang lags pa de dag gis ni byams pa brjod pa'i chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/srog gcod ba rnams kyisan/ snying rje bstan par 'tshal bar gyur
cig/phrag dog dngaser snasawi ces zho pa rnams kyis ni dga' ba brjod pa'i gtama'ichos bastanapa'i tshal bar gyur cig/gzugs dang gzugan chis pa 'i gas bas myos pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams
kyis na/ btangasnyoms brjod pa rigatam gyis chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyuracig/ 'dod pa 'dod chags kyi dregs pas myos pas sems dang ldan pa rnams kyisan
ka yang dag pa ma lags pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur pa'i// theg pa chen po la'i soms can rgod pas rnam par dkrugs bas sems dang ldan pa gang lags pa de dag gse ni dbugs
'byung ba dang/ rtsub pa dran pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ shes rab 'chal ba rnams kyis ni rten cing 'brel par 'byub brjod pa'i chos bsten bar 'tshal bar gyur cig/
T+Tha thosaM panyung ba rnams kyis ni baspyad pa ma mchis shang/ thos pa 'dzan pa chud mi za ba brjod pas chos bstan par gyur cig/ lta ba napo nyam nga bar gyurab rnams kyis ni stong pa nyidabarjod
pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ rnam par rtog pa kun tu spyod pas nyams pa rnams kyisan/ mtshan s ma mchis pa brjod pas ches bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ smon pa ma
mtshes pa'i yongs su dag panyams pa rnams kyis ni smon pa ma mchis pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ bsam pa yos su ma dag pa rnams kyis rnabasam pa yongs su
ga pa brjod pas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ rnam par 'dres par spyod pas nayams pa rnams kyis ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mjed pa brjod pas chos bstan pa 'tshal bar
gyur cig/ zad pa'i sbyor bad nyams pa rnams kyis na bcos ma ma lags pa brjod pa'i chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ lhag pa'i bsam pa ni du sbyangs pa nyams ba rnams
kyisan rton pa ma mchis pa bdakhas chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ nyon mongs pa can gyi sems dang ldan ba rnams kyisin/ dgeba'i sems brjod pa dang/ dgab
mi bskyud ba rnams kyis na rnam par snang byed brjod pa dang/ bdud kyi las la brtson pa rnams kyis ni/ stongab nyid brjod pa dang/ na dam pa la yarag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/
mngen po 'phags pa brjod pa dang/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis sams nyams par gyur ba rnams kyis na brel ba brjod pa dang/ lamanamanyam par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/

rnamakhar ldog par brjod pa dang/ theg pa chen po la ngo mtshar du rtog pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis na ldog pa brjod pa dang/ 'khorabs skyo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni mngon bar dga'
ba brjod pa dang/ dgo ba dang sa dang/ ye shes ma rtogs pa rnams kyis ni rmongs pa brjod pa dang/ dgaba'i rtsa ba gzhan dang gzhan dag gis chog par 'dzin pa rnams rgyas nas pa brjod pa
dang gcig la gcig sems mi mnyam pa rnams kyis na 'od zer thogs pa med pa brjod pa dang/ las dka' ba la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/ byab la 'jug pa brjod pa dang/
dpya/ 'khor gyis 'jigs par gyur ba rnams kyis ni/ seng ge 'itog brjod pa dang/ bdud bzhis zal gyis non pa'i sims dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni dba' ba brjod pa rab
sangs rgyas kyi zhing snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni bodabakod pa brjod pa dang/ rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba rnams kyis na ri ba'i phung po brjod pa dang/ sas rgyas kyi chos
snang bas hril gyis non pa rnams kyis ni/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan brjod pa dang/ shes rab chen po dang bral ba rnams kyis ni sgron ma dang ldan pa brjod pa dang/ gto chog gi mun ga
mchis pa rnams kyisan/ nyi ma'i sgron ma brjod pa dang/ zad pa'i dri pa'i tshig la brtson pa rnams kyis ni yon tan 'byung gnas brjod pa dang/ bdag la dbub rdos pa lta bur mngon pa'i tshal
ba rnams kyis ni srid mad kyi bu brjod pa dang/ blo g.yo zhing 'gyur ba rnams kyis snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa dang/ spyi gtsug ltar ba ba rnams kyis ni/ lhun po'i rgyal mtshan brjod pa dang/
sngon gyi dam bcas pa bor ba rnams kyis ni/ snying po can brjod pa dang/ mngon par shes pa nyams pa rnams kyis na rdo rje'i tshagi brjod pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying po mngon par 'tshal ba rnams
kyis ni rje'i snying po brjod pa dang/ chos thams cad la smon pa rnams kyis na rdo rje lta bu brjod pa dang/ sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu 'tshal ba rnams kyis na spyod pa dang ldan pa
(brjod pa dang/ dbang po mchog dang mchog malags ba 'tshal ba rnams kyis ni/ shes rab sgron ma brjod pa dang/ phan tshun dutshig brjod pa ma'atshal ba rnams kyis ni sgra la 'jug pa brjod pa/
dang chos kyi sku thob ba rnams kyis na dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs bsgom pa brjod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang bral ba rnams kyis ni/ mig ma 'dzums ba brjod pa dang//
dmags pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyis dgon pa brjod pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor la mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyis// 'khor lo dri ma med pa brjod pa dang/ rgyum mchis
ba'i 'gis pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis// rigs pa la brtan pa'i rjes su mthun pa brjod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhingegacig pu ther zug lta ba rnams kyis na/ legs par

bgyid pa rnam par 'byed pa brjod pa dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyi sa bon bskrun pa rnams kyis ni/ rgyan dang ldan pa brjod pa dang/ tshig dang sgra rab tu 'byed par rngo ma thog ba rnams kyis na/ so so
sgrub pa brjod ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yashes mngon par 'tshol ba rnams kyis na chos kyi dbyings rnam pa'i khrugs pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang da lta'abyung ba'i chos rnams la
pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang/ lam rnam par 'khrugs pa rnams kyisan 'gyur ba ma mchis pa brjod pa dang/ nam mkha' lta bu'i yashes mngon par 'tshal ba rnams kyang
na tsa yang m mchis pa brjod pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa rnams kyis na yongs su dag pa la rab tu'agod pa brjod pa dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po yongasasumardzogs ba rnams
kyasinashun tu yang dag par gzung ba brjod pa dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa tshol ba rnams kyis ni spyirab mnyam pa brjod pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs 'an po cheyongs sum rdzogs pa rnams kyis rnam

pa ra gnas pas nges par 'byung ba brjod pa dpa/ 'ashes pa ma bsgom shangarab tu snang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyu brjod pa dang/ mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa la mtsha
dusams pa rnams kyis ni/ sogam mams pa brjod pa dang/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rab tu nyams pa'isi mas dang ldan pa rnams kyis ni// bskyud pa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang/ phanatshun legs
bar snang la ma ngegalab rnams kyis na rab rib ma mchis pa brjod pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum la rab tu dang ba thob pa rnams kyis na bsod nams tshob brjod pa dang/ chos kyi sgo' cher rab tu 'bab pas
chog ma 'tshal ba rnams kyis na chos kyi sprin brjod pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum rgyun chad par lta ba rnams kyis ni rin chen bkodapa brjod pa dang/ shes pa nyams pa'i las la mngon par batson pa
rnams kyis ni depa ma mchis pa brjod pa dang/ kun tu sbyor ba dang/ 'ching ba can thams cad gyis na nam mkha' sgo brjod pa dang/ chos thams cad gzhan m lags par sems pa rnams kyis ni 3/
yeshes kyi phyag rgya brjod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan yosu ma rdzogs pa rnams kyis ni 'jig rten gyi rig pa mngon sum du bgyi ba'i dngos bo brjod pa dang/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas la lhag par
bgyi ba bgyis pa rnams kyis ni/ rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul brjod pa dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' bskal par chos kyi sgo gcig ston pa rnams kyis na/ chos thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang/ mdo sde
thams cad la rnam par nges pa rnams kyis ni/ chos kyi rang bzhinamanyam pa nyid du rnam par nges pa brjod pa dang/ snyapapo'agyul ba dang mthun pa'i chos drug yongs su spangs pa rnams kyis ni/ chos
thams cad kyi tshul brjod pa dang/ rnam par tharapa'i sams kyi theg pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams kyis// mngon ba rashesapas rnamapar rtsa bakhadzodapa dang/ de bzhin gshegs gsung ba'is
su 'jug pa la rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ni/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba brjod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug pa la rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis ni/ gdam gyi dring mi
'jog pa brjod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la mngon par ma brtson pa rnams kyis ni yi shes thob pa brjod ba dang/ te du la yang dgapar ston ba rnams kyis na thams cad kyi rjes su song
brjod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams kyis ni/ dbang bskur ba brjod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs pa rnams/
kyis ni/ ma choms ba brjod pa dang/ ma'adzags pa bzhi ma thob pa rnams kyis ni mi zad pa brjod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ma thob pa rnams kyis nam 'phrogs pa brjod pa dang/
tsha mnyanapa dang/ blta ba don mchis pa rnams kyis ni smon lam brjod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du rjes su rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad durgyun 'khrugs pa rnams kyis na
rgyu rgyam tsho drim med pa brjod pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes lhag ma dang bcas pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas Ani du rnamapar sangs rgyas pa brjod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/
tho kyi dgos pa ma thob pa rnams kyis ni/ mtha' ma mchis pa dang/ shug pa ma mchis ba brjod pas/ chos bstan par 'tshal bar gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dgagayo ma mchis pa/ sgyu
mamachis pa/ drang ba drang ba'i rang bzhin can te/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dbagatum mchis/ gras ma mchis pa de ngag gsems kyi rgyud la tshag gcig brjod pas kyang chos kyi ba/
sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ ting 'dzani gya sgo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ gzungs bdun khri lnga stong po yon tan de dag rab tuu0f8bgod par gyur cig/ des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
0/ rnams ge chachen po 'tshal bar gyur cig/ smon lam gyi khyad par bsam gyi mi khyab pas mngon par ba phags par gyur cig/ bsamagyisami khyab pa'i de mthong dang/ byang chub na//
tanadam pas brgyan par gyur cagi/ 'di lta ste/ lus mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan par gyur cage/ ngag legs par smras bas/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
du yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pas brgyan par gyur cage 3tangenge 'dzani tshag ma mchis pa'i slad du/ thos pas brgyan pa dang/ gzungs bsgyud pa ma mchisakha'isladadu/ dran pas brgyan
pa dang/ 'gro ba ngan pa khong du chudapa'i sladadu yad kyis brgyan cing/ mya ngan las 'das pa bskrun pa dang/ dam bcas pa la brtan pas slad du/ bsam pas brgyan pa dang/ a bas
pa nyams su len pa'i slad du/ sbyor bar brgyan pa dang/ sa nas sar par pa'i lhag pa'i thasam pas brgyan pa dang/ dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i slad du/ sbyin pas brgyan pa
dang legs par thos pa khong dungum ma mchis pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa dang/ sems can thams cad la zhes 'gras pa'i soms mamachisakha'i slad du/ bzodapas
brgyan pa dang/ tshogs thams cad nye bar bsags pa'i slad du/ brtson 'grus kyis brgyan pa dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang/ mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba'i slad du/
bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa dang/ nyonamengs pa'i bag chags yongs su 'tshal ba'i slad du/ shes rab kyis brgyan par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yang dag/
bar skyob pa'irjes su mchis pa'i slad du/ byams pas brgyan pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su ma gtong ba la gnas pa'i slad du/ snying rjes brgyan pa dang/ chos thams cad la
'a the tsom ma sa par 'gyur ba'i slad du/ dga' bas brgyan pa dang/ mthon dman gnyis pa dang bral ba'i slad du/ btang snyoms kyis brgyan pa dang/ mngon par shes pa thams cad
zla kyis rnam par brtse ba'i slad du/ mngon pa ra shes pas brgyan pa dang/ longs spyod ma bos pa'i rin po che'i lag ba thob pa'i slad du/ bsod nams kyis brgyan pa dang/ sems can
thams cad kyi spyod pa mngon par 'tshal ba'i slad du/ ye shes kyis brgyan pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyis chos rtogs par bgyi ba la mkhas pa'i slad du shes brgya ba dang/ shes rab
kyi mig gi snang ba thob pa'i slad du/ snabs brgyan par gyur tsagi/ don ngang chos dang nges pa'i tshogi dang/ spobs pa so so yang dag par mgi bathob pa'i slad du/ so so yang dag par rig
pas brgyan par gyuracig/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis bral gyis ma non pa'i slad du/ mi 'jigs pas brgyan pa dang/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rjes su thob pa'i
slad du/ yon tan gyis brgyan pa dang/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par thogs pa ma mchis pa'i lcobs las sems can rnams la chos ston cing/ chos kyi brgyan par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas/
chos thams cad snang bar gyur ba'i slad du/ snang bas brgyan pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur pa'i slad du/ 'od kyis brgyan pa dang/ khyad b.lung stong pa'i sladadu/

kun rjod pa'i chos 'aphrul gyis brgyan pa dang/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su ston pa gsol ba'i sladadu/ rjes su ston pa'i tsho'aphrul gyis brgyan pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rkangapa bzhi'i rim
pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i spyod du/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis brgyan pa dang/ bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i rjes su zhugs pa'i sladadu/ de bzhin gshegasepa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs
kyis brgyan pa dang/ gzhan l rag ma las pa'i ye shes shes pa'i slad du chos kyi dbangaphyugs brgyan pa dang/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid tsang/ thamasacad kyis mi chomApa sladadu/ dge
ba'i chos thams cad la nan tan snying por bgyid pas brgyan par gyur cig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa' sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag la yang dag gis tshagagatsagibarjod
pas dge ba rnam par sbyong ba yang dag par bsags pa chen pos yang dag bar tshim par gyur cig/ des na byang chub sems dba'asams dpa' chen po de dag gas/ chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi
[r/ ]@#// 'jog pa' ye shes thob par gyur cig/ chos kyi snang ba chen po dang yang ldan par gyur cig/ myur du byan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub man bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya

bar yang gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na nyan thos kyi thig pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa pa 'am/ blan med pa'i thig pa chen po ba'i sems can ng dag mtshams

mamachis pa ngagyid pa dang/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba'i bar gyi nongs pa dang bcas pa dang/ sams kyi rgyud tshig bar gyurapa de dag kyang smonalam gyi dbang gis bdag gas sangs rgyas kyi zhing skya bar gyur cig/
sems can mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang 'grogs pa/ rtsub pa/ sdig pa 'tshol ba/ kho khro dang dmurgod kyi rgyud can/ blo ldog pa kun 'dzin pa'i rgyud can de dag la yang bdag gis sems dang skud brgyud khri

bag stong dag ston par gyur cig/ sems can le lo can gyi bar dag la yang bdag gis chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dag rgya cher ston par gyur cig/ de na sems can gang dag bla namadapa'i theg pa chen

bo par gyur pa de dag la yang/ bdag gis pha rolatu phyin pa drug gi chos rnams rgya cher ston par 'gyur zhing/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher ston par 'gyur ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba'
du rgya cher ston pagyur cig/ yang de nas ms can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ragyur pa 'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun cing bstan bcos la mngon par dga' bar

ma gyur ba de dag kyang bdag ga gsum la skyabs su mching la 'god par rgyu shing slad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la yang sbyor bar gyur cig rnam par 'tshob la dga' ba rnams ni/ srog gcod pa spong ba la
'god par gyur cig/ 'dod pa mi bzad ng sa wal gyis non pa rnams ni/ ma byin par len pa spong ba la 'god par rgyun/ chos ma lags pa la 'dod pas chags ba rnams ni/ 'dod pa la log par

g.yem pa spong ba la 'god pa ra gyur cig/ phan tshunabardzun gyi tshigs ba rnams ni/ brdzun du smyu ba sbong ba la 'god par gyur cig/ myos par 'gyur ba la mngon par dga' ba rnams// chang dang bcos ba'i

chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med ba stong ba la 'god par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag nongs pa lnga po bathams cad bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag nanos pa lnga po spong zhing/ dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa la 'god par
gyur cig/ sems can gang dag dge ba'i chos rnamA la mngon ba ma dega' ba de dag ni/ bdag gas nya zhag gcig tsam yang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims la rab tu 'god par gyur cig/
somasacan gang dag dge ba'i rtsa ba chung dul mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni/ bdag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la nye bar sbyar bar bgyi zhing/ 'ab tu byung ba'i sdom
pa bslab pa'i gzhi bcu'i tshongs par spyod ba la 'god bar gyur cig/ sems can gang dag dge ba' chos rnams yongs su tshol kha'atshal ba de dga' khengag gas dgi ba'achos rnams la lha ba bsgrubs nas
tshangs par spyod pa thams cad la rab tu 'god par rgyur ga/ sems can mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa dang/ kun 'dzani ba'i rgyudacan gyi bar de lta bu dag gi don du bdag gis don rang
tshagi dang yi ge rnam pa snatshegs mang bo dag gi cho 'phrul rnams kyis chos ston par gyur cig/ phung po dang khams dang/ skye mched rtag mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag ma mchis pa dang/
stong par ston par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang/ dgi ba dang sha ba dang/ shis pa dang/ 'jags pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu 'gong par gyur cig/ de ltar bdag
'khor ba' po dag slongadang/ dag slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dag la chos ston par gyur cig/ gang dag rtsod 'tshol bar 'gyurab de dag la bdag gis chos kyis btsud pa'i bstan
bcos rab tu ston par gyur cig/ gang dag dge ba'achos rnams la mngon par ma dga' ba de dag la bdag la bdag gsazhal ta bgyid pa las ston par gyur cig/ kha ton la mngon par dga' ba
rnams lan stong nyid kyisam gtan gyi chagatsag gis rnam par grol ba'i lam ston par gyur cig/ sems can re re'i don gyi slad du/ yang bdag dpag tshad 'bum phrag mang po dgadu sug pas mchibar

gyur zhing/ don dang tshagi dang/ ya gi dngathabs dang/ cho'aphrul rnam pa sna tshogs mang po de gas skyo ba ma mchis shangespro khar bgyid par 'gyur ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bkajag la 'god par gyur
cig ting nge 'dzani gyi stobs kyis bdag gis cho'i 'du byed jatsim pa lnga cha'ador bar gyur cig/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshon/ rang gi sku gdung bdag nyang kyis yungs 'bru'i
tshad tsam du gcog par 'gyur zhang/ soms can rnams la snying rjeba'i slad du/ bdag na slad kyis yongs sumya ngan las 'das par gyur cig/ bdag yos su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang la stong du ma
ba'i chos gnas par gyur cig/ ya dral lnga brgyar na rim pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyana gnas par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das ba'i sku gdung rnams la ni po che
rnams dang/ rol mo'i sgra dag gi bar gyis mchod pa brgyad par spro ba skye bar 'gyurab dang/ than sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tsam dang/ phyag gcig tsam dang/bskor ba gcig tsam dang/ thal mo sbyarab
gcig tsam dang/ me tog gcig tsam gyi rgyus mchod pa bgyid bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag gas sar ma ldog par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag
bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bistan pa la tha na bslab pa'i gzhi gtsag tsam 'dzani par gyur ram/ tshom bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par blangs nas sam/ chag bzhi pa'i tshogis su//
bcad pa gtsage tsam gyi bar dag kun chub par brgyad dam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang ston par 'gyur ba dang/ gangadag gis thos nas sems rab tudang bar 'gyurashang/ than dam pa'i chos smra ba la ma
tog gcig tsam dang/ phyag gcig tsam gyis mched ba bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ theg pa gsum pa dag gis sar ma ldog par gyur cig/

tshiman dam ba'i chos nub ste/ chos kyi sgron ma ni gum chos kyi rgyal mtshan na skyel bar gyur pa na/ bdag skyes pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gser gyi 'khor lo' mthar thug pa'i dogs la lhags par 'gyur zhing/

gang gi tshisangs rgyas kyi zhingam mdzod ni rin po ches phongs par gyur pa de'i tsho/ de dag nor bu bzlasla tog gi blo gros shesabagyi ba'agyur te/ zhugs ltar gda bzhi ng kun tu gnas par gyur cig de yang de
nas mngon par 'phags te/ go du 'og min gyi gnas mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas nas/ mi tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur zhing/ me tog man ra ba dang/ mamar ba chen po dang/
par ya trA ga dang/ many+dza sha ka dang/ many+dza sha ka chen po dang/ mdog mdzes dang/ mdog mdzes chen po dang/ ma na ba dang/ zla ba dri med dang/ 'dab brgyapa dang/ 'dab stong pa dang/ kun tu /
'od dang/ kun tu dri dang/ shin tu mdzes po dang/ rtag tu 'bras bu rgyas dang/ stangedang/ mag mngon par dga' ba dang/ skar 'od dang/ skar mdog dang/ kha ngog mtha' yas dang/ drimatha' yas dang

me tog de lta bu dag ga me tog gi char chen po mdzes par rab tu 'babs par gyur cig/ me tog gi char de dag las kyang sgra sna tshogs dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi

zla dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra dang/ dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa'i sgra dang/ 'phags pa'i gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'i sgra dang/ rab tu byung ba'i bslab pa'i gzhi bcu'i sdom pa sbyin pa' sgra dang/

tshul khrims kyi sgra dang/ tshas pa ra spyod pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sgra dang/ zhal ta bgying pa'i sgradang/ klog pa'i sgra dang/ nang du yang dag 'jog gi sgra dang/ tshul

bzhin yid la bgyid pa'i sgra dang/ mi sdug pa'i sgra dang/ dbugs rgyu ba dang/ ba pa'i sgra dang/ 'dushes mnga'adushes med minaskya mchod kyi sgra dang/ ru yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sgra dang/ rnam shes

mtha' yas skye mched kyi sgra dang/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchedakyi dang/ zil gyi gnon pa'i skye mched kyi sgra dang/ zad bar gyi skye mched kyi sgro dang/ zhi gnas dang lhag ma thong ga sgra dang/ stong pa nyidi

dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i sgra dang/ smon pa ma mchis pa'i sgra dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i sgra dang/ nyan thos kyi sde snod mtha' dgag sgra 'byung ba dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa'i
sde snod mtha' dag gasgra 'byung ba dang/ theg pa chen po'i gtam pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' dag gi sgra dag me tog de dag las 'byung bar 'gyur zhinge/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad kyis shes
pa gyur nas/ rang rang gis sngon chad bgyis pa 'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing/ sems can chen po dag dag ba'i chos thams cad la smon pa ma mchis par gyur nas/
dedag de nas bab te/ 'dzag rten gyi khams mi mjed kyi mi thams cad kyang/ dge ba bcu'alas kyi lam la sbyor yang rab tu 'god par gyur cagi/ de bzhan du 'dod pa na
ka stod pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang thos 'gyur zhing/ de dag kyang sred pa'i kun tu sbyor ba dang dga' ba dang/ rtsedamodang/ yadi bde ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems las byung ba thams cad
rgyun chad par gyur cig/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi sngon chad bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rjes su dran par 'gyur zhing/ de dag lhang 'jig rten nas babs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
mo medzad kyi mi thams cad dge ba bcu'i dus kyi lam yang dag par 'dzan du 'jug cing/ rab du 'god par gyur cig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das me tog de dag kyang nam mkha' la rin po che sna tshogs drag
du'agyur shang/ 'di lta ste/ dngul dung 'gron bu dang/ gser dang nor bu dang/ mu tug dang/ baiDUrla dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ bya rudang/ dardul can dang/ sa le sbram rdo'i snyipe
bapodang/ g.yas su 'khyil pa dang/ de lta bu'i nipo che'i char ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du mngon par rab tu 'bab par gyur cig/ sas rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad thams cad na
thab mo dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dpa 'gyed pa dang/ mu ge dang/ nad dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang/ tshag brtsub cang b.rung ba dang/ dug rnams thams cad kyi thams cad
du rab tu zhi bar gyur cig/ sas rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du bde ba dang/ nad ma mchis pa dang/ thab mo dang 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'ching ba dag ma mchis pa dang/ lo legs pa/
ga kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ sems can gang dag gis rin po che de dag mthong ba dang reg pa dang/ longs spyodang/ yongs su spyod pa'i las bgyid par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang/
theg ba gsum po dag gis slar mi ldog pa ragyur cig/ sku gdung de dag kyang slar gsar gyi 'khor le'a mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas bar gyur cig// theg pa chen po snying rje pad+mada' bo'i mdo las
bam po bcu gcig pa// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma'i dus kyi tshe na yang dodag nor bu rin po che in+d+ra nyi la dag tu kun nas gnas par 'gyurazhing/ de dag steng du/
'og man gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du gnas nas/ 'di lta ste/ me tog mnar ba dang/ mnar ba chen po dang/ pa ra ya dra ka dang/ me tog mtha' yas kyi bar gyi me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag mngon
par rab tu 'bebs par gyur cig/ me tog gi char de dag las kyang ji ltar snga'i smos pa'i bar bzhin du blta sta/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang/ chos kyi sgra dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra dang/ sgra yid du'ong

ba rnams pa snatshogs dag 'byung bar gyur cig/ yang sku gdung de dag kyang slar 'og tu gser gyi 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa'i bar du kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ de bzhani dugang gitshom ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i
dus kyi tshin yang sku gdung de dag steng du 'og man gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar gyen du 'phags nas/ me tog gi char gyi bar du sngar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ nad kyi
bskal pa bar ma'i bar du yang ji ltar smos pa bzhin du gyur cig/ ji ltar bskal pa chen po bzang po lA/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung rnams ston pa'i mdzad pa bgyid
bar 'agyur zhing/ gdul ba bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das ba dag kyang thag pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldeg pa la 'god par gyur/ de bzhin dubaskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga'i
tshe rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyedadag byung gi bar du yang dag gi sku gdung rnams kyis 'dul ba'asems can rnams theg pa gsum po dag gis slar mi ldeg par 'god par gyur cig/ bdag byang chub

sems dpar gyur cing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub kyi slad du sdud pa spyod nga na/ gang dag bdag gis dang por bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du
