stsal cing rab tu bkod pa rnams dang/ bangagags pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzin du stsal cange btsud de rab tu bkod pa de dag slad kyis/ gang gi tshobaskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+ga'i klung stongag
bye ma snyed 'das nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dang gzhan ngag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasasha stag tu 'gyur de 'byung bar gyur cig/ bdag byang

chub rdeb nas kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin dustsal cing/ btsung de rab tubakod pa'i sems can rnams dang/ gang dag bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'dasapa'i sku

gdung gi rnam par 'phrul pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang spang kyis bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gang+gA'i klung stong gi bye
ma snyed byung yang 'das par gyur pa na/ phyogs bcu'ajig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis gras ma mchis pa dag tu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas

nas/ 'di skad du gang yun rang po na bskal pa bzang po zhes bya bzhigabyung bar gyur te// bskal pa bzang po de la bab pa na/ rgyal ba nyi ma bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'dazhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur pa des

bdag cag dang po bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzan du btsud de rab tu bkod do// bdag cag nasaMms kyi rgyud tshig pa mi dge ba dang 'grogs par gyur pa/ mtshams med pa byed
pa log par lta ba'i bar du gyur pa yanin/ des bdag cag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yang dag par 'dzani du bcug cing btsud de rab tubakod pa nas/ de'i phyir bdag cag nga ltar thams rud mkhyen pa
gyur cing/ rnam pa thams cad du chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor la skor la/ 'gro ba'i 'kher la zlog cig/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po ngag/ mtho ris dang/ thar pa'i
@#/// 'bras bu la rab tu 'god par byed ba yin mozhes bdag gis bsngags pa rjod tsangesgrogs la dbyas kyang rjod par rgyun gi/ gang dag byang chub don du gnyer ba'i sems can rnams kyis
kyang ngabazhin gshegs pa de dag las bdag gab sngags pa dang/ grags pa dang/ snyan pa thos par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de gal 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg

ba des don gyi dbang su zhig gzigs na/ de ltar rtsod pa'i dus la bab cing snyigs ma lnga byung bar gyur pa na/ banamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gyur ces

yongs su zhubar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu'am/ ragis kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gi snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa dang/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshul 'ang yang ston par gyur cig/ byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigis kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang ngo mtshar du'adzani par
'gyur zhing/ de dag kyang rgya chen po la mos par gyur cig/ de dag kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par 'gyurazhung/ de ltar rtsod pa'i dus su sAgam lta dang nyon mongs
pa'i snyigs ma 'doba'isangs rgyas kyi zhing na mtshams ma mchis pa brgyad pa dang/ mi dge ba'i beradag kyang 'gre pa'i 'dul ba rab tu 'dzan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i smon lam yang 'debs kha gyur cig/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ phagis kyi bu mo de dag gis snyigs ma lnga dang/ nyon mongs pa bangoba'i rtsed ba'i dus su smon lam btab pa bzhin/
du byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag gis bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du de lta bu'i lung bstan pas lung ston par gyur cig/ sas rgyas
bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag kyang/ sems can byang chub donaduganyer ba'i rags kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag la 'di skadang yun ring bo 'di sride cig na/ rgyal ba nyi ma mtshan 'angazhis bya ba

zhagabyung bar gyur ba de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa sku gdung rnams kyis de ltar sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams kyi don ltabu'i cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna

tshogs dag mdzad de/ de'i sku gdung gi rnam par 'phrul pa dag gis nged cag dngabo blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bskul nas/ nged cag thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ 'grogs pas dang po sems bskyed cing/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag la brtson pa byas so zhes bdag gi sku gdung ga rnam par 'gyur ba'i sngon gyi tshulangag ji ltar smos pa'i bar du
rgya cher ston par gyur cig/ de nas mdunana'adonagyi gtsobo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar lha dang dri za dang/ mi dang bcasapa'i
@#// skye dgu thams cad kyi don du snying rje chen po dang ldan ba'i smon lam chen po lnga brgya po de dag btab nas/ des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de
lta 'badag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dusan/ bskal pa bzang po la nyon mongs pa dang/ thab mo nga/ snyigs ma bde zhing rtsod pa 'i dus la babapa na/ 'jig rtenamados shi 'dren pa ma mchis
ba dang/ yongs su 'drenapa ma mchis pa dang/ lta ba'asdug bsngal gyi mun par chud pa'i 'jig rtenan/ mtshamasamamachis pa brgyad pa rnams dang/ sngar smos pa lta bu'i ber ga la bdag
[¬© ]gis re ba 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing/ gal te bdag gis ji ltar smon lam btab pa de lta bu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad sgrub par jothog ba stan/ byang chub kyisad dustson pa

sngagam bgyi zhang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang zhungegazhanadu yongs su bsngo bar ma brgya ste/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag gi nges pa lags so// yang bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des rang sangs rgyas kyi thig

pa ma 'tshal/ nyan thos kyi thag pa yang mi 'tshal/ lha dang ma 'jag rten gyi rgyal srid kyang ma 'tshal/ lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug kyang ma 'tshal/ 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyi longs spyod kyang mi
'tshal/ lhar skye ba yang m 'tshal/ dri ba dang/ lha ma yin dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ klu dang nam mkha' lding du skye ba yang mi 'tshal la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan duyongs
subasngo bar yang mi gyid de gang yang bcom ldan 'adas kyis 'di skad du/ sbyin pa'i na longs sbyong chen por 'gyur/ tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris su skye/ thos pas ni shes rab chen por
'gyur/ bsgoms pas ni 'balabar 'gyur ro zhes kyang gsungs la/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du/ sems can bsod nams dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pas na/
re ba'i bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis kyang sbyin pa las byung ba dang/ tshul khrims las byungabang/ nyes pa las byung ba dang/
bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams dag bsgrubs pas na/ gal te bdag gis smon lam ji ltar btub pa deltar re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyub na/ de'i slad du bdag gis dge ba'i
rtsa ba dedag thams cad sems can gang dag gas/ sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa rab tu rtsub cing drag pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myoba' sems can dmyal ba pa'isems can rnams kyi slad du/
yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtse bas de dag re nas ldang bar 'gyur zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir ma thob pa thob par yagyug/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos
'phul ba bsgrub par bgyid pa 'gyur nang mchog nying gyis yongs su mya ngan laMs 'das par yang gyur cig/ sems can de dag gi las kyi 'bras bu longs su ma byas par gyur na yang de'i spang du
bdag gumanas sems can dmyal ba chen por skye bar 'agyur zhing/ bdag gi lus kyang sas rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang mi rtsol ba dag 'byung
bgyur cig/ bdag gi lus re re'i chodakyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du che ba dag 'byungabar gyuracig/ bdag gi lus las kyang ji ltar daltar gyi lus gcig pu 'dis/ bdeb dang/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba

'tshe ga yang dag par 'tshal ba de lta bu'i bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dag ya ngadag par 'tshal bar gyuracig/ bdag gi lus re res kyang sems can dmyal ba pa'i sdug bsngal drag partsub pa ma bzang pa/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dgamyong bar gyuratshagi/ daltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag na/ sems can gang dga mtshams ma
mchis pa bgyid pa dang/ mnar mapa'ibar dag la gzhol ba'i las dag yang dag par sog par 'gyur ba rnams dang/ sems can gang dag bskal pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed

kyi bar dag 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad pogazhan dag tu mtshams ma mchis pa las kyis 'phan pa ra 'gyur ba 'am/ kun nas slongapar 'gyur
ba de dag thams cad kyi don tu bdag las nges sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas pa nyams su myobar 'gyur zhing/ bdag gisems can ngag ni sam mdmyal ba rnams su skye bar ma gyur cig//

sa mas tsan de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba dung/ 'khor ba las rgal bar 'gyur ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug par gyur pa 'i yun ring po de srid kyis

bdag sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ba gzhan dag na/ sems can rnams kyis de lta bu'i las kun ms/
bsub ngang/ 'phangs pa dang/ myongabara'agyurab r nges pas/ sems can dmyal ba rab tshutsha bar skye bar 'gyur bdang/ debahan dutshab dang/ ngu 'bod chen po dang/ ngu'abod dang/ bsdus gzhom dang/

thig nag dang/ yang sos kyi bar dag la yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du brjod par bagyi'o// de bzhin du dud 'gro snatshogs dag la yang brjod bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du gshin rje'i 'jig rten la yabarjod par
bgyi'o// de bzhin du gnod sbyin dbul po la yang brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin grul bum dang/ sha za dang/ nam mkha' lding dag la yang brjod par bgyi'o// gang gi tshe phyogs bcu'agi

rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyedapo gzhan dag tusems can rnams sngon gyi las de lta bu dag gis 'phangs par gyur pa dang/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ gangaragam rnams kyi nang du khyon
pa dang/ long ba dang/ lce ma mchis pa dang/ lag pa ma mchis pa dang/ rkang pa ma mchis pa dang/ dran pa rab tu nyams pa'i sims dang ldan pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ migatsang bza
ba rnams la yang de bzhin du sbyarate/ ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du yang bdag soms can dmyal ba mnar med pa dag du skye bar gyu ra cig/ gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba de lta bu'i yongs su rdzogs bar mi 'gyur ba ltan/ 'khor bar soms can rnams yun ring po dzasrid du khams dang skye mched dang/ phung po yongs su 'dzan par 'gyur ba'i yurang
po ngasung du/ bag ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin du/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dwags dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ srin po rnams su mi'i bar gyi sdug bsngal skye ba rnam

pa sna tshogs de lta bu dgags de ltar sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar gyur cig/ ji ste bdag gis sngar smos pa'i bar gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re ba 'di dag lta bu yongs su rdzogs
par 'gyur ba ltan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gas dpang du gyur cig/ phyogs bcu'ajig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa gzhan dag na/ saa rgyus/
bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tshozhingagazhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang bdag gi dpang du 'gyur zhing/ ye shes su 'gyur bar gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom
ldan 'das bdag ga ji ltar dam bcas pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag sgrub par rje thog cing bdag bskal pa bzang po la skye dgu'i tshol brgya nyi shu thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur ba ltan/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung stan tu
gsol/ de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par thams cad dang ldan pa' 'khor de dang/ lha dang/ ma dang lha ma yan du bcas pa'i 'jig rten sa dang nam mkha'i ngos la

gnas pa de dag thams car mchim rab tu 'dzag bzhin du yan lag lngas nang pa la phyag byas te sbas pa/ snying rjechen po dang ldan pa khyod kyi dran pa zab mo thob pa dang/ sems can zab mo rnams la snying
rje chen po bskyed pa dang/ smon lam chen po zab mo btab pa ni legs so legs so// lhag pa'i bsam pa ngesasems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos yang dag pa ra bkab cing/ mtshams mo
pa byed pa dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs pa'i 'dul ba rnams kyang phal cher yongs su bzung ba yin no// jiltar khyod kyis bgamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu se mas bskyed
pa'i smon lam des n/ sems can rnams gyi smon dang/ skyabs dang dpung gnyen du gyur bar shes so// sems can rnams sdug bsngal las rab tu thar par bya ba'i smon lam btab pa de
bzhan du khyed kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ ga ba ba pa de ga ga mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par gyur cig/ rgyal po bdud rtsi dag pa nyid
@#/[.. ]/kyang zhi bram khre'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te smas pa/ e ma'o mchog tu zab pa po// khyod na bdel mi gnas te// khyod nisems can snying rje ldan//
khyod ni bdag gi mtshonam yin// de bzhin du sbyar te spyan ras gatrags dbang phyug gas smras pa/ sems can chags pa ngag la khyod ma chags// dbang po rta thul rnams las dbang rta tshul/
'a sha bo 'di rnams la nadabang mdzad di// gzungs dang ye shes kyis nimadzod du 'gyur// de bzhin du sbyar te/ mthu chen thob kyis sbas pa/ sems can bye ba stong phrag mang po rnams//
pa dge ba'i don dukun nas 'dus pa dag/ mchog tu dga' ba'i sdug bsngal chen po pa// khyong nang rjel na dubar byeng// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// brtson
grus ting 'dzin brtan pa dang// mkhas pa dang ni shes rab mchogo/ phreng ba dri dang byug pa yis// de phyir khyod la mchod par 'os// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i phyag rgyas smras
pa[;]snying rje chen pos sems can la// de ltar khyod kyis sbyin pa byin// khyod nadusa'ang 'danas kyang// mgon po mtshan gyi mchog tu 'gyur// byang chub samasadapa'
rdorjes gcod pa shes rab snaba'i dpalagyis 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba// de ltar khyod kyi snying rje'i gnas// khyod kyis sems ma'ajig med lam//
byungachub spyod pa dag kyang bstan// byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed shugs kyis smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par// sems can la brtse gzhan medade// gang
byari shes rab mkhas pa'i mchog/ khyodan yon tan kun Mdang ldan// spos kyis sangagos smras pa// khyod ni ma 'ongs dus na// bzangal nyon mongs bdud kyi tshi// sems can
sdug bsngal sgrol byed tsang// khyod kyi grags dang snyan pa 'gro ba// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos sbas pa// skye ba'i dgon par brtson gyur cing// log rgyusashan tu
nyamo ba/ sha zab dang khrag 'thung ba'i// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// mi 'khrugs pas smas pa// ma rag sgo pa'i sbubs chu cing// nyon mongs 'dam dubyung gyur la//
mtshamasamed pa dag byed pa po// sams rgyung tsha rnams gazungaba'agyu/ spos kyi glang pos sas pa// khyod kyis ma'os 'dzigs mthob// jaltabam long dkyil 'khor bzhin//
dam pa'i chos ni spong byengapa'i/sems rgyud tshig rnams gazungaba'agyur// na po che tog gse smras pa// yashes tshul khrims ting 'dzan dang// snya 'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// 'phags la
skur pa 'debs byed pa// sems rgyud tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// 'jags dngagadung bral gyis sbas pa// khyod kyis ngan song gsum lam du// sems can sdug bsngal rnams mthong//
[4 ]@#// chang pa stong 'drar gnas gyur pa// sems rgyung tshig rnams gzung bar gyur// lag na sud+ma las smras pa// khyed kyi snyi rje ye shes dang// brtson 'grus kyis 'khor
ba bcom// skye dang 'chibs gzi'i gyur pa// sems rgyud tsha rnams gzung bar gyur// ye shes grags pas smras pa// nademadagags nyen pa dang// nyon mongs rlung gis dedapa ngog/ ye she
chu yis 'byas te// bdud kyi sde rnams rab tu bcom/ gzungs kyi phyag rgyas kyang smos pa// ji ltar khyod ni nyi ma bzhin// nyon mongs dra ba rab bcom ste// nyon mongs zad cing rnam thar pa'i//
brtson 'grus brtan pa nge du la med// ul zla bas kyang smras pa// jiltar yon tan snying rje'i gnas// brtson 'grusabartan pa yang dag mos// srid pa'i bcing bas rab bsdams pa// khams

gsum po dag grol bar byed// driming dbang pos lcas pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi// snyang rje chen po dag bstan pa// snying rje'i rgyud las byung ba bo// khyed la brtag cagaphyag 'tshalal//
u0fc4 stobs chen shugs 'chang gis kyang smras pa// nyon mongs ldan pa'i rtsod dus tsho// byang chub gang dag khyod la rten// khyod kyis nyon mongs rtsad nas bcad// smon lam brtan pa 'grub par 'gyur//
skar ma skyong gis smras pa// ye shes mdzod dang mtshungs 'drab// driming smon lam btab pa yis// byang chub spyod phyir sems can gyi// stsand rten du byed 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs yang dag par ston pa ngu zhing bram ze'i rkang pa la yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas sbas pa/ kye ma shes sgron sems can rnams// nyon mongs nad
rnams rnam par bcom// khyod ni rab 'bar snying rje can// sems can sdug bsngal grol bar mdzad// rigs kyi bu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ lha dang dri za dang/ mi dang
bcas pa dag gis kyang/ bram ze'i ngapa la yan lag lngas phyag byas nas thal mo sbyar// don dngatshag sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gsasubacad pa dag gis mngon par bstod nas 'khodado//
'gas kyi bug ga tshobram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'amyen sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa dang/ de nas de'i med las che/
g.yos par gyur cing/ phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad dag ga sa ya g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tugayos/ 'khrugs
rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg mang/ kun tu rab tu 'ura'ur gyi bar du gyur nas/ yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi

zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang/ yongs su ma dag pa gang dag nas nigs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la sems can rnams la chos kyang
@#// ston pa dag tu yang snang ba chen po byung bar gyur cing/ me tog sna tshogs kyi char dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ me tog man ra ba dang/ man rab chen po dang/ 'ong mtha'/
yas kyi bar gyi me tog gi charang lta bu dag kyang rab tu bab pa gyur to// ngan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag chos nyan pa 'phyari/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi snga ma stan
'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gas sa g.yos pa de mthong nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la byang chub sems pa 'de dag gis 'di skad ces/ bcom ldan/
'das 'jig rten dus cher g.yos shing/ me tog gi char chen po yang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags shes yongs su zhus so// yang de'i tshon shar phyogs
logs su sas rgyas kyi zhing 'dis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gcig gi bye ma snyapa'i das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bsags pa zhes bya ba 'ge yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni
po tshe bsags pa de na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen zla ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tshoging gzhes la/ 'di lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu chudagras med pa dag gis yongs subaskor cing mdunagyis bltas te/ theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shag gi chos bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems
pa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i tog dang/ zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sgrub ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa rin chen zlul la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dus chen po g.yos shing/ me togag char chen po dag rab tu bab pa gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags rkyen gang
lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zlabs bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag nub phyogs logs sas rgyas kyi zhinge 'ji nas / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klungagacigag bye ma snyed 'das ba
ngan 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya bzhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
ba bzhi g bzhugs te 'tshonange gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul yang dag par ston pa 'i sgo lam bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzan gyi yul dang/ gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
'chadacing byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par tshogs pa'i byang chub du lung ston to// de na byang chub sems pa'i sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po
dang ldan pa gcig cig yodapa des/ smon lama'adi lta bu btab cing/ snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa bshad pa dang/ srog chags bye ba phrag mang po dag gis byang chub tu pu stomalam btab ning/ sangs rgyas kyi zhingag yon tan bkod pa dag kyang
yongs su gzung ba dang/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su 'dul ba'i bar gyi smon lam de lta bu dag kyang brjod pas na/ gang ga thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de zil gyis mnan cing rtsod
pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can sAgis ma lta rangaldan zhing nyen mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang mtshams med pa byed cinge/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'akher dang 'grogs la/ sems kyi rgyud
tshag pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gcig pu rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen podang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang//

lta dang ma dpalha ma yin dang/ drizir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po de spangs nas/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir btsun
zhangeyan lag lngas phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyar zhing 'dug nas/ de'i bsngags pa yang brjod par byed do// sems can chen po deyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
snying po'i spyan sngaran 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to// gang gi tshe sems can chen po des/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lce nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'[]/

bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyebadag g.yos shing me tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i
'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po de dag rab tu bsad par bya ba dang/ sA rje chen po dang ldan pa 'byang chub sems pa'i

smon lam gyi spyod ba nges par bstan par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dba'asems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing/ sas rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dgag phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang/
byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' nyen po rnams la ding 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pa'i bya ba'aphyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa des de lta bu'i tshe 'ophrul dag
bstan to// rags kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba la byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gis snyagis ma 'dang
ldan pa'i 'jig rtenadunyon mongs pa dang/ 'khrug pa bdo zhing rtsodapa'i dus la bab pa'i dus longs su bzungaste/ mtshams ma mchis pa brgyadeb dang/ mi dge ba'irtso ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur
tshang sems kyi rgyu tshagi pa'i 'dul ba'isems can rnams kyang yongs su bzungab rgyurapa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyapirje chen po dang ldan ba nges/ yun ringepo ji srong tsag nas
byang chub tu sems skyed cing/ yun bde po rdza srid cig tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhe chen zla bas bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po/
dang ldan pa des n de gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems dang po bskyod do// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas ni po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der deng la/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i sbyor pa 'jigs ba
mad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de la nga'i tshags dras la/ 'di skad du de bzhi gshegs pa rin chen zla ba skyes/
bu dam pa khyed la dri bar mdzad de// ma tog zla ba mdog mdzes drim med pa 'di bskur zhing ri gas so zhes bya ba byon te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bsad pa nas/ sAng rje
chen po brjod pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams sbas gang bar gyur te/ des na khyod kyis thams cad du snying

rnachen bo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yid rab tu thob pa yin no// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma rnams la'ang snying rje chen po/

brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams pa'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs par gyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de 'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi

rdul snyad na/ phyogs banu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad dag tu yad dang yang du byed kyi snyan pa dang/ grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyur ro// gang khyod
kyi sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po gras med pa dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzani tu bcugatsang btsud de rab tu bkod nas/ bcom ldan
'das la phul ba rnams kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i khyad chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod par 'gyur te/ de la kha cig smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod
pa dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dag ni phyir lud bstan pa thob par 'gyura'i// gang dag khyed kyis byang chub yang dag par 'dzan du bcug pa de dag thams cad kyang/ phyis

bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad kyi bar dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad po gzhan dag sa su rgyas nyid
thobacing/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas de dag khyod las brtsams nas bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum bo des n skyos bu dam pa khyod la gos so zhes kyang smosashig/
yang de 'i tshe byang chub sems dang da dung phyur phrag dgu dang/ bye ba phrag gnyis kyis mi 'thun par gsol ba/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gsheg pa/
kyi dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i saargyusan po che'i skang po de la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang la yan lag gsum gyis legs
so zhes bgyi ba srings shing/ me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di skur pa'i skyes bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i slad du/ sasargyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lags so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin
gshegs pa rin chen zla ba des bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la dbab pa jashas na der// der de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jig

pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu de nas rin po che tog dang/ zla ba tog gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen zla ba mdog mdzas dri ma med pa blang ste/ byang chub sems
dpa'i dung phyur phrag dgu dang/ bye ba phrag gnyis po dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams nichen bsags pa nas 'phagasan/ 2lta ste dper na/ klog bzhin du byang chub srems dpa'i 'khor de dang/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing na chen bsags pa de nas mi snang bar gyur to/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yod da ga rtog gi 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi bskyod mos tshal 'dar lhags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po
[c/ ]che'i sId bo ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying por zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis

mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na/ bram ze la thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dang 'i 'khor rnams kyis thal mo sbyar cing bsngags pa brjod pa mthong

ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'di gnyis 'di snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chen zla bas/ gang la ma tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag skur nga'i snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di ya'i
pa lta snyam mo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir phyogs te/ bram ze la ma rtog phulazhas 'di skad ces stsas so// skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa

rin chen zla bas khyed la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod la 'gas so zhes bya ba yang spang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/
shar phyogs kyi sas rgyas kyi zhing dang ga tu med gras med nga dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnams ma rtog zla ba mdog mdzes drim med pa dag thogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi nang
yang dag rtog tu lhagapa dang/ bram ze la me tog dag skur nga dang/ yan lag gsum gyis 'dogs so zhes bya ba sprang ba yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// de bzhin du lho phyogs phyogs su
khu@#/// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ba gam bskyangs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de
sangs rgyas kyi zhing ba gam gyis bskyangs pa den/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sang gi ltar bsgyings pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te
'a 'tsho zhing gzhes la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'batashig dag la theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig gi chos ston to// 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa'
T+Tha chen po gnyis la/ gcig na ye shes rdo rje'i tog ces bya/ gcig shes ni sangag rdo rje tog ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshags pa
sang gi ltar bskyis pa'i dbad phyug rgyal po la yongs u zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'a jig rtan dus cher g.yos shing me tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen
klu ni gang lags zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa ba zhanin// de bzhin du sbyar te/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med/ grangs med pa ba(zhan dang gzhan dag nas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa dag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yad dag rtog du lhags pa'i bar du yod ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i

tshan nub phyogs legs su sangs rgyas kyi zhade 'di nas/ gangs rgyas kyi zhi de bye ba khrag khrag 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyal ba can
zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul pa ya sa nga'i phyag zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho shange gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to// de na
byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnam par snyad byed bzang po zhes bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyis pa ni ngag ltar bskyangs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ skyes
bu dam pa de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po thul ba yangs pa'i spyan la sa chen g.yosAngashad mi tog gi char chen po bab pa ci las gyur ces/ don de yongs su zhus pa'i bar du
yang ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no/ yang de'i tshon byad phyogs logs su sa sa rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi dang bye ba khrag khrage 'bum phrag dgu bcu 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi
khams dur smag ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhag theg pa chen po la yad dag par zhugs
pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'bashig dag la thog pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig gi chos ston to// de na byang chub sems dang 'ams dpa' chen po gnyis la gcig ni mi g.yo brtan pa zhes
bya gcig shes na gsang ba 'dzin ces bya ste/ de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal bo la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa chen g.yos shing ma

tog gi char chen po bab par gyur ba'i rgyu ni gang lags rkyen ni gang lags shes yodas su zhus pa'i bar du yang ja ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshon 'og gi phyogs legs nu sangs rgyas kyi zhing
'di nas/ sas rgyas kyi zhing khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gti mug mun bral zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba'i 'dzi
ba bral pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'khor bzhi po dag la thag pa gsum gyi chos ston to// saargyas kyi zhing den byang chubs mas dpa' gnyis la/ gcig ni rnam par

snang byed rdul bral zhes bya/ gcig shes ni rnam par snang byed nyi ma zhes bya ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar smos pa bzhin no// yang de'i tshon stod gi phyogs su sas rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
nyis 'bum 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma tog kun tu rgyas pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ma tog rab rgyas
zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'khor bzhi po dag la theg pa gsum gyi chos khaston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems
dngam sa dpa' chen po gnyis shig 'khod ba la ni gcig ni rang gis rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa zhes bya/ gcig shes na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyis yad dag par
rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ste/ skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ma tog rab rgyas la btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sa chen
ga los shing ma tog gi char chen po bab par gyur pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags zhes zhus pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ma tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/
rigs kyi bu dag 'di nas 'ag gi phyogs logs su saargyus kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhang nyis 'bum 'das pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de bzhin
gangshegs pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar zhig bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i yul dang zhing yang dag par ston pa'i smon lam gyi yul

bkod pa'i ting nge 'a dzin gyi yul dang/ gzungs kyi sgo bkod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad cing byang nub soms dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
do// den byang chub sems dang 'tshams dang 'chen po snyad rdzachen po dang ldan pa gcig cig yod pa des/ smon lam 'di lta bu btab cing/ snying rje chen po yongs su bsgoms pa'i tshig brjod de/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa bshad pa dang/ ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' bye bo phrag/
kyi mang po dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi smon lam btab cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang/ 'dul ba'isems can rnams kyang yongs su gzung ba'i smon lam de lta bu dag kyang

tsha brjod pas na/ gang+gA'i thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor ni zil gyis mnan cing rtsod pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan zhing nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa can dang/ mtshams
mad pa byed 'di mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs laems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' zhims dpa' chen bo de gcig pu rnam pa thams cad snying
rdzachen po dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ lha dang mi dang/ lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la

mchod pa bya ba smras nas/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa phyi ma de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson zhing yan lag lngas phyag byas te/ thal mo sbyar cing 'dug nas de'i bsngags pa yang rjod par byed do//
sems can chen po de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug cing lung bstan pa nyan to// gang gi tsho sems can chen po des bam ldan 'das de'i spyan snga

napus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das des 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis chen po dag/
rnam pa drug tug yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tug yos shing/ 'gul pa dang/ mo tog gi char dag kyang mngon par rab tu bab par gyur pa de lta bu'i 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing

de dag thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag rab tu sad par bya ba dang/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi spyod pa nges par bstan par bya ba dang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dang/ 'a chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis phyogs nas bsdu bar bya ba dang/ byado rlung sams dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams la tang de 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa ni spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa des de lta bu'i tsho 'phrul bstan to//
khri ba chen bo snying rje pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las bam po bcu gnyis la//// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ma tog rab rgyas de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gis
rnam par 'byed pas yul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang/ gzungs kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de rigs kyi bu de gnyis kyis yongs su zhus pa/ btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das ga nga gis snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du nyon mongs pa dang/ 'brug pa bdo zhing rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa nyidus yongs su bzung zhing mtshams ma mchis pa
bgyid pa dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar dang 'grogs par gyur cing/ sems kyi rgyud tshig pa'i 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang yongs su bzung bar gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pho hing rje chen po dang ldan pa des/ yun ring po ji sride cug nas byang chub tu sems bskyed cing/ yun ring po ji srid cag tu byang chub kyi sbyad pa spyod pa lags/ de bzhin gshegags pa rnam par
sa snang mdzad ma tog rab rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des ni gdod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rigs kyi bu dag
khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po tsho'i snying bo de la blta ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ ting de 'dzin gyi sgo
bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs de yang mnyan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag rtog der deng la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyade rdzachen
po dang ldan pa la nga'i tshig gis dris la 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ma tog rab rgyas skyes bu dam pa khyed la dra bar mdzad de/ ma tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma

ba/ med pa 'di dag kyang skur zhing/ legs so zhes bya ba yang byin to// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis de ltar sems dang po bskyod pa nas snyade rje chen po brjod pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sarA

rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyad dag tu sgras gang bar gyur cing/ snying rje chen po'i sgra yang rab tu thob pa yin no// skyes bu dam ba de'i phyir na khyod thog pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyi'i mi rnams l yang snying rje chen po brjod pa'i smon lam gyis yang dang yang du byams ba'i rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs
ba'agyur te/ skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul
rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu yang dang yang du khyod kyi snyan pa dang/ grags pa'i sgras kun tu gang bar 'gyuyi// skyes bu dam pa de'i phyir khyod kyis sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po
grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de/ rab tu bkod nas bam ldan 'das la phul ba rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la bkod par gyur te/ de la kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas smon lam gyis sa sargyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag yongs su
bzung ba dag dang 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyang snying rje'i 'od zer dag gis kun tu bkab par gyur gang dag khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yod/
dag par 'dzin du bcug nas/ lung bstan pa ma thob pa de dag kyang phyis lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang phyi'i bskal pa grasad pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab

la snyad kyi bar dag gis phyogs banu'i 'jagi rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po gzhan dag tu sasargyas nyan thob cing chos dang ldan nga'i chos kyi 'khor la bskor nas/
khyod nyid las brtsoms shing bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur te/ rgyu gsum po des n skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes kyang smos shig/ yang de'i tshin byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dag
gas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i saargyas rin po che'i snying po de la blta ba dang/ phyag
bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang/ de bzhin gshags pa gang de la yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bgyi ba spring zhing me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dris med ra 'di dag bskul 'i
mas bu dam pa de yang blta ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog der mchi lags so// rigs kyi bu de bzhizhi gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad me tog rab rgyas des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
dag de ni dus la da bab pa shesan/ khyed cag deng la der de bzhin gshegs pa ni po che'i snying bo las dpe de 'dzin gyi sgo bstan pa'i spyod pa 'jigs pa med pa'i chos kyi rnam gras de yang nyon cig
gas kyi bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' rang gis rnam par 'byed bas ul yang dag par 'khrugs pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo yang dag par rab tu dga' ba rnam par 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba de
gnyis kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sna mdzad m dog ba rgyus de la ma tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa dag blangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dang lhan cig tu sas
rgyas kyi zhing ma tog kun tu rgyas pa nas 'phags te/ skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i 'dzam bu'i tshal gyis bsu mos tshul du lhags te phyin pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po

ma'i snying po ga la ba der dong ngo// yang de'i tshon thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog thag bachen bo pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ rang sasargyas kyi thag pa pa dang

na thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dag dang/ lhan ms dang/ ston pa chen po'i bar dag gis 'di ltar yongs su gang bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ bu ma shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ til gyi
'di dam/ 'bras kyi zhing rgyas pas kun tu khyab par gyur pa de bzhin du/ de'i tshon sasargyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog kyang/ theg pa chen po'i rigs kyi bu rnams dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i bar dang/
za sha/ gis yongs su gang zhing khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dbang de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni po che'i snying po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ ting nge 'dzin/
gyi stobs dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan sngan/ bram ze la thams cad dang ldan pa'i
'khor rnams thal mo sbyar te bsngags pa rjod cing 'khod pa mthong ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam dusams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzar ma tog rab rgyas kyis gang la/ ma
tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa'i 'di dag bskur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de ni 'di yin pa lta snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' dag bcom
ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir phyogs te// bram ze de la ma tog zla ba mdog mas dri ma med pa de dag phul nas smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ma tog rab rgyas kyis/
khyod la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa 'di dag bskur zhing skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so zhes bya ba yang byin te/ yan lag gsum gyis legs so zhes bya ba brjod pa'i bar du yang ji ltar sngar

smos pa bzhazhin// ma tog gang yin pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa dag tu char bzhin du rab tu bab par sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu dag pa'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis kyang kun gyis gang bar ]
gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra dang/ snang ba'i sgra dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang/ stobs kyisgra dang mi 'jigs pa'i sgra dang/ mngono
pa shes pa'i sgra dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sgra dang/ sku ba med pa'i sgra dang/ 'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang zhi ba'i sgra dang/ nye bar zhi ba'i sgra dang/ rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang/ byams

pa chen po'i sgra dang/ snying rje chen po'i sgra dang/ mi skyo pa'i chos kyi sgra dang/ dbang bskur ba'is thob pa'i sgra dang/ theg pa chen po'i gtam 'barashig gi sgra ste/ me tog gichar chen po de dag gis
dag ba'i sgra de lta bu s/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag bkang ste gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba/ chos zab mo la dbang thob pa/ gang dag 'dul
ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ra/ smon lam gyi dbang gis sa sa rgyas kyi zhing stod pa de dag tu lhags pa de dag gis sgra de thosas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ smon lam gyi
dbang dang ting nge 'dzan gyi stobs kyi de dag de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis 'di ltar mgyogs par dong ste// 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa brkyang pa las bskum pa 'am bskum pa las
brkyang pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhangastod pa de dag nas dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag rtog 'dir lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis
shuny+tsa// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po la/ mtshon pa byas shing thams cad dang ldan nga'i 'khor/

ka de la yang mchod pa byas nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir gnas ji lta bu thob par 'khod de// rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po tshe'i snying
po de la me tog zla ba mdog mdzes dri ma med pa de dag gis mchod pa byas te/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol
rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po dang nge 'dzin klog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ nying de 'dzin des thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag
rtog rin po che sna bdun gyird bzhin du gnas par gyur nas/ ri dengashing ljon pa rnams dang rtswa dang shing dang sa gzhi thams cad kyang ni po chesna bdun gyi rang bzhin du kun tu snang ngo// sems
can gang dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa de dag kyang dag ba'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed pa de lta bu'i lus su khacigazhi ser po/ kha cig na dkar po/ khacig na btsod ka kha cig ni

dmar po/ kha cig ni nag po/ khami gzhi skya bor gnas te/ khacig gi lus ni rlung lta bur kun tu snang/ kha cigani me lta bur/ kha cig na nam mkha' lta bur/ kha cig ni smig sgyu lta bur/ khacig ni ri mo
lta bur// po tshig ni tshangs pa lta bur/ kha cig ni brgya byin lta bur/ khacig nib tog lta bur/ khacig ni ma ba2 lding lta bur/ khacig ni sing ga lta bur/ kha cig ni nyi ma lta bur/ khacig/
ni zla ba lta bur/ khacig ni skaram lta bur/ khacig na bya rgod lta bur walta bu dag du kun tu snang ste/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de na 'khod pa'i sems can de dag dag pa'i phyogs ji lta bu yid la byed
pa de lta bu'i lus su kun du snang ngo// rigs kyi bu de na sems can dag gis rang rang gi lus ji lta bur mthong ba de lta bur sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'an po che'i snying po'i sku yang

mthong ngo// rigs kyi bu mdun na 'don gyi gtso bo bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul des kyang mdun na/ dpan gshegs pa zhu rolo'i snying bo bzhi bo rim bdun gyi pad 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i ga la bzhugs par mthong
do gas kyi bu de na sems can gang dag dang nam mkha' la 'dug pa 'am/ 'gror ba'i sems can ra ras kyang de bzhin gshags pa ni po che'i snying po 'di ltar mthong ste/ bdag
ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i snying po'i spyan snga na 'dug ste/ thugs thams cad kyis dgongs shing bdag gcig pu las brtsams te chos ston to snyam mo/[']rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i snying pos/ bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bram ze chen po snying rjechen po dang ldan pa khyod sems can bgrang ba las/
yang dag par 'das pa rnams la phan par byed pa dang/ 'jig rten la snang ba byed par gyur pa ni snying rje dang ldan pa yin te/ legs so legs so// bram ze 'di lta ste/ par/

ka na/ ma tog gi zhing phun sumatshogs pa zhig la/ kha dog sna tshogs dang/ dri sna tshogs dang/ reg pa sna tshogs dang/ 'dab ma sna tshogs dang/ sdong bu sna tshogs dang/ tsA ba sna tshogs dang/ sman
gyi yo byad kyi gnas sna tshogs yod de/ de la ma tog khacige kha dog dang/ dras ni dpag tshad brgyar kha cig gis dpag tshad nyis brgyar/ khacig gisan dpag tshad sum brgya lhang de lhagazher byed
T+ThA cing de bzhin du sbyar te/ de nam tog khacig drug dang/ drisan gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dulhang nge lhan nar byed la/ de nasoms can gang dag mig med pa de dag gis/ ma rtog
de'i dri bsnamasan ni mog dag thob par 'gyur/ len pa rnams kyisazhin bo dag thob par gyur/ yan lag thams cad kyi bar dag nyams pa rnams kyisazhi yan lag thams cad thob par 'gyur
ba dang/ de na sems na gong dag nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi po dag gis gtses par gyur pa de dag gis/ dri de bsnams nan nad thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur pa dang/ de nasems can gang
dog myos pa dang/ brgyal bo dang/ smyos pa dang soms rmugs pa dang/ sems rnam par g.yengs pa dang/ dran pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis/ me tog de dag gi bsnams na ni dran pa

thams cad thob par 'gyur ba zhig yod la/ me tog gi zhing de'i nang nas pad+ma dkar bo ma brang ba/ sra ba rdo rje las grub ba/ 'jam pa/ sdong bu'ad+d+him+ma/ 'dab ma ni gsar/ ze 'brun rdo'i snying po//
bri bani mu tig dmar po// pang du ni dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong/ rgyu ni dpag tshad 'bum yod ba gcig cig skyes par gyur la/ pad+madakar po de'i kha dog dang/ sa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten

gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag tu khyab de lhang nge lhan ner 'gyur la/ bram ze phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sas rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed po de dag
na sems can gyi khams gang dag lus ma mthun pa dang/ nad kyis nyin pa dang/ yan lag nyams pa snang/ myos pa dang/ brgyal ba dang/ smos pa dang/ gnyid log pa dang/ dran pa'i ba tu
nyams pa dang/ sems rnam par g.yos pa'i sems can de dag gis pad+ma dkar po de'i 'od mthong zhing dri bsams na/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing dran pa yang thob par 'gyur pa dang/
sas rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sems can gang dag shin s yun ring po ma len zhing/ lus ma zhig pa de dag gil pad+ma dkar po de'i 'od zer dag gis shog dris regan ro de dag kyang srog gi dbang po/
'thob par 'gyur zhing yang phyir langs te/ mdza'ashes dang/ snag gi gnyen mtshams dag mthong nas/ de dag thams cad bskyed mos tshal du zhugs te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag 'byor zhing
ldan par 'gyur la gnas par 'gyur ba dang ( gang dag yang de nas shi 'pho bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang tshangs pa'i gnas dag par skye bar 'gyur la/ de dag depatshadapag tu med par
kyi 'gyur zhing/ yun ring por gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ba zhig yod na/ bram ze ma tog gi zhing du ji lta bar theg pa chen po'i 'dus pa 'di yang de
bzhani du blta bar bya'o// ji ltar nyi ma 'char bar gnas pa'i dus na/ ma rtog de dag kha byon rab tu rgyus par gyur nas/ lhang nge lhan na zhing khacag gi 'bad dung ga tshad brgya/ khacig gi 'dzad

du ni dang ga tshad stong gabar du gyur nas/ sems can mang po de dag gi nad sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ de ltar ni 'jig rten du sas rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu dam pa byung ba yin no// ji ltar

kyi ma shar ba'i 'od zer dag gis me togade dag kha bye zhing lhamame lhang nge lhan nar gyur nas/ nad sna tshogs kyi nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba de ltar na/ skyos bu dam pa nga 'jagi
rten du byung// thugs rje chen bon 'od zer dag gis sems can rnams la khyab par mdzad ng kha phyanas yang dang yang du somasacan rnams kyi bsod namasar+ya ba'i dao pagasum po dag la mngon par

sbyor bar mdzad pa dang/ khyedakyis kyang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing/ btsun de rab tu bkod nas nga la phul ba de dag

[4/ ]thams cad kyis/ nga'i drud du sas rgyas kyi zhing dag yongs su bzung ste/ khacig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dag yongs u bzung/ kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa dag yongs su bzung zhing/

rang rang gi smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar ngas kyang lung bstan pa yin no// skyes bu dam pa gang dag gis ri thad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yongs su bzung ba dedag gis ni dul ba'i mgacan
bsam ba dag pa gdul sla ba/ dag pa ri rtse ba bskyed pa dag yongs su bzung bsan/ de'i phyir de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po zhes mi bya ste/ de dgan skyes bu dam pa chen po'i bya ba
byed pa ma yin no/ de dag ni snying chen pos soms//tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yongs su bzung zhang de ltar sems can tshad med grangs med dpag du med pa dag tshim par byas
kyang/ nga'i sems skadag gtsag tsam yang 'gyod bar m gyur pa la ltos/ der ngas smon lam 'di lta bu yang pa ba ste/ gal te bdag blon med pa gang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
khar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta na/ bdag gi bsam pa 'di yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ ji ltar bdag gas glange gcig tu rang gi lus kyis sems can thams cad tshim par byas pa de bzhani

dusangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul med lhun po spos 'di'i gling thams cad du yong la stong phrag gapa'i klung gi bye ma snyad du de lta bu'i lus 'byung bar gyur cig/ glang gcig tu la khri'i bar du ji lta ba de bzhin du gling
thams cad du yang rang gi sha dang khrag dang rags pa dang/ mig dang rna ba dang/ sna dang mchu dang lce dang sku dag gis sems can thams cad tshims par byas shing/ theg pa gsum po dag yang

dag par 'dzin du bcug par gyur cig/ mi rnams dang gnod sbyin dang/ srin po rnams dang dud 'gro'i skyo gnas thams cad dang/ gang dag ngasha za zhang khrag 'thung ba so so rigs gnod sbyin rnams dang/ gan/
'tsha gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi bar de dag kyang bdag gis tshim par byed par gyur cig/ ji ltar bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu rang gi lus kyis sems can thams cad tshim par byed 'gyur ba de

bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs kun kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing pa'i klung gi byam stod dag tu yang rang gangesha dang khrag dang pags pa dang/ mge dang rtse'i bar dag dang/ de lta bu'i lus kyis bskal pa chen po

gang+gA'i klung gi byam snyad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag de lta bu'i lus thob na// rang gi lus dang srog gisasems can rnams tshim par byed par gyur cig/ gal te bdag sems can rnams tshim par bya ba'i
phyir rod gi lus de lta bu dag yongs su gtong bar mi byed dam/ jiltar bdag shing sems pa'i bdag gi smon lam de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur na/ gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
gzhan dang/ gzhan dgan chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis bslus par gyur cig/ bdag kyang bag med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyabar ma gyucig/ bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos par ma gyur cage/ chos kyi sgra yang mi thos/ dge 'dun//
gyi sgra yang mi go/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra yang micos/ bdud kyi dpung pham pa'i sgra yang mi thos/ mi 'jigs pa'i sgra yang ma thos pa las/ 'khor ban dag ba'i sgra'i bar yod thos pa'i 'gyur zhing

rtag tu mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po na gnas par gyur cig ces smon lam de lta bu yang btab bo// jiltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling thams cad kyi gling re rer yang de lta bu'i lus dag sos su

btang zhing/ rang gi sha dang khrag gis sems can rnams tsham par byas pa de bzhin du/ phyogs su'i gzhan gyis rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gikhyu ma snyed dag tu yang de lta bu'i lus ngag yongs su btang ste/ rangagisha

dang khrag gis sems can rnams tshim par byas so// gis kyi bu de tshos rgyun ma chad par tshig dag yongs su btang ba gang yin pa de dag gi phung po yang 'dzamabu'i gling 'di nas sunutsagasum@#lha'i mthar

thug pa'i tshad tsam du gyur to/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i phal tu phyin pa la ltos/ rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin gshags pa'i lus rtogasu gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu zhib
mdor bsdus pa yin no// sems la byung ba dag la 'jug pa ma yin no// byang chusems dpa' de dag ni// soms thams cad la snying ba'i ri/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mos
ga su tshol ba ma yin te/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yos su dag pa de dag yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis snying brtsib sbas pa gzhano// gang dag nyan thos dang/
rang sargyas kyi thog pa dag yongs su sbas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dgazhi dngashes dang/ bsam pa la mkhas par gyur pa ma yazhego/ gang dag ji ltar bdag nyan thos
dang/ 'dasaargyas spangs pa/ dge ba'itshub dang 'grogs par gyur pa// bud med rnam par spangs pa/ soms na dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dar/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnam par sbas pa'i sa

pa rgyas kyi zhing du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ nyan thos dang/

rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su spras pa/ theg pa chen po ri gtama'adzashig gi chos ston par gyur cig/ bdag gis byang chub thob nas kyang tshe ring por gyur// mun ng du gnas shing bskal pa mang por bsam

pa dag pa dang/ gdul sla ba dang/ dag ba'i tsab dang 'grogs par gyur ba rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ ces smon lam de lta bu 'debs pa 'i byang chub sems dang 'a de dag ni/ des na shes dang bsam bal
mkhas par gyur ba yang ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang mi bya'o// rigs kyi bu des de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni po tsho'i snying bo des phyag brkyang ste// so[W/ ]

la las 'od zer ba dag snatshogs khag dum/ kha dog 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa dga' ba tu bkya'o// 'do zer de dag tshad med graa med dang ga tu med pa'i phyogasau dong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams snang bar/

byas nas/ den 'jig rten gyi khams mtha bon zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthe bo can de na mi rnams ni/ tshe lo bcu pa/ mdog ngan pa/ mi sdug pa mi dag bar rtse ba dang ldan pa ste/ khrun namatha bo'i

tshadatsam mo// de na de bzhi gshegs pa dgra bam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i lhun 5da rtsod pa'i dus kyi tshad kyi mi rnams

kyi khru gang dang/ mthu btsan gyi mi rnams kyi khru gsum dang/ mor bdun gyi tshadatsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'khor bzhi bo rnams la theg pa gsum po dag gi chos
ston to// rigs kyi bu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ sas rgyas kyi zhing de dang/ mde dganang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'isnyade bos bka' stsal ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba des ni/ bskal ba dang gtumed grangs med pa 'das pan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo tsho'i

gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar dang bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po dag/ blan med pa yad dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug cing bu tshud de rab tu bkod do// sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i n po tsha'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngan//

bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam btab ste/ khacig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi yong gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su dag pa dag yongs su bzung ngo// kha cig gis ni yongs su ma dag pa snyagis ma lnga dang ldan
pa dag yongs su bzung ngo// de nas nyams can chen po des nga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzi'i du bcuganang bzhag ste/ rab tu gnas bar byas nas/

der sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags par snang ba'i spyan sngar snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par/ na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon lam btab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang da la legs so legasaso zhes bya ba byin nas 1 da blag med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// den

gang gis byang chub yang dag par 'dzan du bcug pa de dag ba'i bshes gnyen skyes bu dam pa des/ snyigs ma lnga shin tu bdo zhing nyon mos pa dang/ rtsod pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ shin du nyon mongs pa'i sa dbu

rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'imasacan mtshams med pa byed pa dang/ mi dag ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa dang/ sems kyi rgyud tshig pa dang/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon ba nyam nga bar zhugs pa dag/
smon lam gyis yongs su bzung nas// skyes bu dam pa de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang ga tu med grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan/

'das rnams kyis kyang legs so legs so zhes pho nya btang ste/ snying rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba zhes bya bar ming btags so// nga'i dag pa'i bshes gnyen phanapa mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po skade rje chen po rnam par snang byed zhi ba de/ de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams ma the bo can du mthe bo'atshanatsam du mi rnams kyi nang du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas re po ma lon te/ de ba'i

gang gags pa khru gang tsam po des mthe bo'i tshad tsamagyi mi de dag nyad kyi khru gsum gyi tshad tsam gyis/ skye dgu tshel bcu pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te// dus dang po bla na med pa mad dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzan du bcug yi btsud de rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med ba dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag

gis kyang byang chub thob pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir spro na dag btang/ des dang po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de/
rab tu bkod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi byas pa gzo zhing rjesau dgongs pa de dag gis kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la me tog dag bskur ro// bram ze sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji
ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu dang ba dag na/ sems can tshar ng ba bsam pa yongs su dag pa// bde bar gnas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa rnams dang/ de bzhin

gshegs pa skar ma la dga' ba de de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhadirab tu ngan pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de lta bu sangs rgyas nyid thob nas/ sems can mtshams med pa byed pa dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par

'tsho gyur pa'i bar dag la tshe thung dus sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang po lhag par mdzad cing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ma myangs par chos ston pa la ltos/ skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis kyang de ltar

[‚Äì ]sangs rgyas kyi zhade shin tu ngan pa'i snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i mtshams med pa byed pa dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba'isems can rnams yongs su bzung zhing/ smon lam khyad par can
btab pan/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di dag thams cad zil kyis mnan to// byang chub sems dpa'i gang dag gis sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas 'osau spangs pa dang/ nyan

spyi sa dang 'du sangs rgyas yongs su spangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnams yongs su bzung zhing 'dul ba'i sems can bsam pa dag pa shin du dul ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa dag yongs su

bzung ba'i sems can de dag ni ma rtog lta bu zhes bya ste/ gang dag gan tu dul ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyi nad du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed bar 'gyur pa de dag ni/ pad dkar po lta bu'i
byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po dag ma 3ni'o// bram ze byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'di lo'i dngos po ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yodas su dag par smon pa dang/

sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang/ byang chub thob nas nyan thos dang/ dzad sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi ston par smon pa dang/ byang chub tho bzhi s
tshar bar smon pa ste/ bzhapo de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi le lo'i apo ni te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' ma rtog lta burnams zhes bya ba'i pad+ma dkar po lta bu yang sa ma yin la/ soms
dpa' chen po zhus kyang mi bya ste// bram ze 'di lta ste dperan/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 'di ma gtogs par khyab 'jug rlung gis gang gis phyir/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag pa yos su bzung
zhing 'dul ba'isems can nyon mos pas dkrugs pa rnams dang/ bskal pa bzang po2rigs kyi bu khacig kyang yongs su bzung ba lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dang/ 2 rnams kyis brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i

dngos po ni bzhi po 'di dag yin te/ bzhi gang zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yodas su ma dag pa smyon pa dang/ sems can bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par smon pa dang//

byang chub thobanas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston par smon pa dang/ byang chub thob nas tshe ha cang yang mi rong ha cang yang ma thung ba zhig bag mar sgrub par smon pa ste/ bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i dngos po yin te/ des n byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dan dkar po rnams zhes bya'am tog lta bu mas zhes mi

bya ste byang chub sems dpa' de dgan sems dpa' chen po rnams zhes kyang bya'o// bram ze 'di lta ste dper na/ khyed ni de ltar smon lamakyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar byang chub sems dang 'dabag

du med grasamod pa rnams kyi nang du/ dge ba lung bstan pa'i zhing du snyade rje pad+ma dkar po lta bur skyes pa yin no// gang gi tsho khyod kyis snying rje chen po brjod pas/ mtshams med dang byed pa dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang

ldan bar gyur pa'i bar gyi 'dul ba rnams yongs su bzung zhing snyigs ma lnga bdo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ba'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi

la stod dag gis kyang skyes bu dam pa khyed la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ pho nya dag kyang btang nas/ khyod kyi ming snying rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya bar btags so// 'khor 'di dag thams cad kyang khyed laachen

pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dusan bskal pa grangs med pa gda'i klung gi byes snyad cig 'dasas/ lhag ma bskal pa gros med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye

ma snyed gnyis pa labab pa na/ bsal pa bzang bo la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ skye dgu'i tsho la brgya nyi shu thub cing/ rga ba dang/ 'chi ba mang ba'isangs rgyas kyis 'di na 'jig rten ldedas pa 'don bzed

ba0 pa/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur cing/ sems can las ngan pas bcom ba/ nyam nga ba chen po theb pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa// 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa// dam pa'i chos stong ba/ ltung ba'i rtsa ba
'byung ba nas/ ji skad sngar smos pa'i bar dag lta bu s gang ba'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa 'grig pa dang zhabs su ldan panas saargyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du 'gyur te/ 'gro ba'i 'kho'o ni
bzlogo/ chos kyi 'khor lon bskor/ dbang bskur ba'i bdud dang/ nyon mos pa'i bdud na bcil te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu sgras khyab par byas nas/ khyod kyi

nyan thos 'dus pa chen po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'od lta ste/ dag slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang lhan cig smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar ma gyis gangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu
mtha' dag 'os su rdzogs par byed bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshan ji ltar rgyal po chen po bdud rtsi dag pa 'di 'od dpag med ces bya bar 'gyur de bskal pa tshad med pa dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha'

ga byed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyed kyang bskal pa chen po bzang po la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/skyo dgu'i tshabargya nyi shu thub pan/ de bzhan gshegs pa shAkya thub

pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ lo bzhi bcu tsaltas sas rgyas kyi mdzad pa de lta bu mang po mtha' dag byed par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang/ dam pa'i
chos lo stong lhag bar gs par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dam pa'i chos nub nas kyang/ lus skyes pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rang gis smon 'am ji ltar btab ba de ltar sad/
rgyas kyi mdzad pa mang bo mtha' dag byed par 'gyur te/ sngar ji skad smos pa de bzhin du/ yun ring por sems n rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de'i tshona gnas 'gro zhes bya ba na/ brag 'gi

yod pa des 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod bskal pa gros med pa de dang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod ban/ bdag kyang rtag du bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur zhing/ byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byadasbyor ba

dang/ 'grogs par byed de gyur nas/ khyod la bsnyen bkur byed par gyur cig/ khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur no/ bdag khyed kyi ngar gyur cig/ skyos bu dam pa bdag khyod kyis byang chub ba nga 'i sbyin bdag

gi mchog tu 'gyur zhing/ khyed kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang ston par gyur cige/ gzhan yang de nargya mtsho'i lha moshani du dul ba'i blo zhes bya ba des kyang smras pa/

bskal pa grangs med pa de dang de dag ces bya banas/khyed kyis srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur pan/ bdag khyod skyed pa'i mar gyur cig/ snyade rjechen po dang ldan pa khyod kyis byang chub thobanas/ bdag blan med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par gyur cig rgyu skar gyi lha mo tshulha spyod ces bya ba des kyang sbas pa/ de dang de dag ces bya ba nas byed srid pa tha ma pa'ibar du gyur pa na/ bdag khyodoban

pa'i ma ma byed pa'i mar gyur cig/ khyod kyi byang chub thob nas bdag kyang bla na med pa yod dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa'i gyur cig/ brgya ba'i mu khyud can zhes bya pa dang/ gzhan yang brgya bzhi ba/

rolasems zhes bya ba de gnyis kyis kyang smras pa// kyisnying chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag kyang de dgaces bya ba nas/ khyod kyis byang chub thob pa zhes bya pa'i bar duste/ bdag cag shes rab dang ldan pa dang/

rdzu 'phrul dang ldan po nyan thos rgyud du gyur tshagi (gzhan yang brgya byin spyad spyod ltamadzes tshogs zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smaago/ snying chen po dang ldan pa bdag cag kyang khyodadi dang de dgaces bya bas

srid pa tha ma pa'i bar du gyur ba'i bur gyur cig/ gzhan yad 'go rtsi'i lha mo des pa kare shu ka zhes bya ba des kyang smas pa/ snyade chen podang ldan pa bdag kyang tsho bas de dang de dag tu khyod kyi btsunamor

gyur cig/ khyod kyis bde chub thob nas bdag kyang bla na med pa ud dag par rdzogs pa'i khyad chu ba tu dud ston par gyur cig/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po ma sa spyod ces bya ba des kyang smras ba/ snying rjetshan bo

dang ldan pa khyod bskal pa grangs med pa derang de dag tu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pan/ bdag kyang skyes bu dam pa khyod la byams pa dang mthun pa'i yo byadakyis grogs byed pa'i bran nyid du gyur to// khyod la
bsnyon bkur byed par gyur cig/ khyod srid pa tha ma par gyur pa la yang bdag bsnyen bkur byed bar gyur cig/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis byang chub thob nas kyang chos dad ldan pa 'chos kyi 'khor lo
bskor ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs par gyur cig/ khyod kyis chos bstan pa bdag gis dang bod 'bras bu dang bcas par byed par gyurag chos kyis tshud kyang 'thud bar gyug
'chib med pa da rtogs par gyur cig/ nyon mongs pa thams cad pa des pa'i phyir/ dgru baa pa nyid kyi bar yang thob ba'agyur cig/ de la zhan du sbyar te/ den lha dang klu dang/ lham naga'i
klung gi bye ma snyed dag gse kyang/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir smon lam btab ste/ 'dul ba dag kyang nye bar bkod de// ba la/de nas 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur
'jigs byed cig bya ba gcig cig 'dug pa des snyas ba/ bya bram zechen po bdag kyang khyon la yo byad mang pa dag gis grogs byed bar gyur cig/ bdag bskal pa dpag tu med pa dag du no

la 'bras bu dang baa pa spyod cing nye bar 'tsho ba'i nye dur gyur cig/ rtag tu dngos po bslang ba'i don du khyod kyi drung du nye bar 'gro bar gyur cig mal tshanang/ stan dang/ bgo pa dang/ glang po chod

glu rtadang shing rta dang/ grong dang/ grong khyer dang grong brdal dang/ khyim dang bu dang/ bu mo dang/ sha dang khrag dang pags pa dang/ rus pa dang/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ lce dang/ rna ba dang sna
dar sog dang/ mgo dag slong bar gyur cig/ bram ze chen bo dag de ltar khyod kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i bar gyi grogs su yang gyur
cig bram ze chen po bdag de ltar kham byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur cig nam khyod kyis byang chub thob pa na/ bdag kyang khyod kyis nyan thos kyi gnas thob pa
gyur cig/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri 'dzin par gyur cig/ rjes su chos ston par gyur cig/ khyed kyi bdag thun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lungaston r 'gyur cig/ gis kyi bu bram

zasnying rje chen po dang ldan pas de thos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'an po che'i snying po'i zhabs 'a yan lag lngas phyag byas nas/ 'tshob pa mi 'gyur 'gas byed bos te smras ba/ skyes bu dam pa khyod/

ra'i bran med pa'i spyod pa'i grogs su 'gyur bzhi legs so 'a gas so// khyod tshe rabs khrag khrig 'bum phrag tshad pa'i bar dud la dngos po slong ba'i phyir nam 'das pa de'itsho/ ngas kyang sems rab tu dang

bas sbyin par bya ste/ khyod la yang bsod nams ma yin pa'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen bo dang ldan pa des/ de bzhin gshags pa ni/
po che'i snying po'i spyan sngar gsol la/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dang khag tu ma mchis/ grangasam mams pa de dag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
dbas skyobs par gyun tsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis samo pa la sems kyis skad cig tsam zhig khro ba bskyed bar gyur tam/ ma dad pa'i sems bskyed pa 'gyur tum/
sbyin pa'i rnam par zhi pa'i 'bras bu 'tshal bas/ sbyin pa stsol bar gyuran/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang gtum chis gras ma mchis pa gzhan dag na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos

kyang ston pa'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag gis bslus par gyur cig/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon ng ra rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ btsun pa

bcon ldan 'das gal te bdag gis slongs mo pa la sems ma dang bas sbyin pa stsol tam/ sbyin pa de yang len pa po la dad pas/ byin par gyur zhing chud za bar 'gyur ram/ gal te than skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas
tsam zhig dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyid par gyuran/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur cig/ gal te sku'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam zhig len pa po'i dgaba'i chos
gsal ba chan bgyid par rgyun/ bdag kyang mnaramod bar 'chiba'agyur cig/ zas la jilcab de bzhin du slongs mo pa gang dag bdag la gos dang/ mgo'i bar dug myong bar 'gyur zhing/ tshiga'ajam
bo'am/tshig rtsub po 'am/ bar s tshig gam/ tshigagasal bas mgo'i bar dag slong bar bgyidan/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gisaslongs mo pa la sems kyis skad cig gcig tsam zhig
khro ba'i sems bskyod par gyur tam/ ma dad pa'i sems bskyed par gyur tam/ sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa re 'bras bu 'atsal bas mgo bo'i bar dag yongs su gtong bar gyuran/ bdag gis sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur pa nas/ bdag mnar med par 'chi ba'i bar dugyurag/ sbyin pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du tshul khrims nas/ shes rab dag yongs su gtong ba la yang brjod par
bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa zhi po tsho'i snying po des/ byang chub sam na dpa' sonan dang 'a chen po snyade rdzachen po dang ldan pa lags so zhes bya ba na te/ skyes bu
dam pa khyod kyis snying rjen po la gnas pa'i sems kyis smon lam de lta bu btab pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa 'gas so legs so// rigs kyi bu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ lha dang/ dri za dang/
mi dang/ lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang thal mo sbyar te 'khod nas/de legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis snying rjechen po la gnas pa'i yade kyis smon 'am de
lta bu btab pa ni/ skyes bu dam pa 'gas [‚Äù]byed na stong rje chen por 'gyur ba dang/ mthun ba'i chos drug gis sems can rnams yang dag par tshim par byed par 'gyur ro// gas kyi
bu ji ltar sbyin ba len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'tshob pa mi 'gyur 'jig byed des smon lam btab pa de bzhin du/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis kyang smon lam btab bo// rigs kyi bu khyad
chub sems dpa' ms dpa' chen po snyade rdzachen po dang ldan pa des/ ji ltar 'tsho ba pa mi 'gyur 'jigs byed kyi smon lam btab pa de bzhin du/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis

kyang smon lam de lta bu dag btab pa thos pa dang/ de nas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de mchog tu dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes nas thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bltas
te/ mchog tu dga' ba'i yid kyis snyas pa/ a lal bdag chos kyis mu ge dang/ zad pa'i dus dang/ nyon mongs pa chen pos dkrugs shing rtsod pa ni dus na/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i
k+Sha 'jig rten mgon med pa'i ded dpon dang/ snang ra byed pa dang/ thon ma byed pa dang/ byis pa skyabs med pa/ ldongs pa rnams kyi lam ston par 'gyur ba dang ( 2na ltar bdagags soms dang po bskug

pas/ tshe rabs gzhan dag du gang dag gis mgo lag par 'gyur ba dang/ mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang// pags pa dang rus pa dang khrag dang/ kha zas kyi bar dag len par

rgyu 'gyur zhing/ blan med pa'i byang chub kyi spyod pa'i grogs byed pa de lta bu dgared pa ni ngo mtshar go rags kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub mams dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa des/
de bzhin gshegs pa rin po tsho'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/ gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das tshe rabs gzhan gyi ba skal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag da pagatum mchis/ grangs ma mchis

ba de dang de dag nas/ byang chub kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du bdag gis drung du slong mo pa gang dag zhi bar 'chi bar 'gyur zhing yun de do de srid kyi bar du zas sam/ skom dag blangs bar gyur pa dang/ bdag glu

gi sug ra nas than skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi tshad tsam gyi sbyin pa blangs ba gyur pa'i sems can de dag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gal te 'khor ba las 'o a/
su thar par mi bgyid dam/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rad sas rgyas kyi theg pa 'am thag pachen pos lung ston par mi bgyid na/ bdag gis gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/

'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sargyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bslus par 'gyur bas/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa re byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba'i bar
du gyur cig/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i n po tsho'i snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sAng chen bo dang ldan pa la legs so zhes bya ba bzhi te/ skyes bu dam pa

khyod kyis ji ltar sngon de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po tso 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs ba 'jig rten dbadu phyug 'od zer gyi spyan sngar dang po byang chub tu sems bskyod nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i smon lam 'di

lta bu btab ste/ skyes bu dam pa des smon lam ji ltar btab pa de bzhin du bskal pa chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las shin tu lhag pasnyed du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad nas/ 'di nas shar phyogs
legs su sa rgyas kyi 'dabye ba phrag 'bum 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zeo sor rtogs pa zhes bya bar/ skye dgu'i tsho'abo brgya thub pa'i nang du bla na med pa yang dag
pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub mgo pa rdzogs des rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyagangashesam tog rdul bral bya chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho zhes bya ba/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du gyur cig/ lo bzhi bcu rtsa lngar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad ba mdzad nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'imya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs so// snying rje chen po dang ldan pa re
bzhin gshegs pa yongashes ma tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yad dag mtho yongs su mya ngan las 'dasan/ de'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ni lo stod du gnas par gyur to// dam pa'i chos nub nas dam

pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang stod du gnas par gyur to/ snying rjechen po dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa sengashe ma tog rdul bral khyad chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho yongs sumya ngan las lhag pa'i
dam pa'i chos kyi tshul dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brtan gnas pa na/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma gang dag tshul khrims 'chal pa/ sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa mi mthun par spyod pa/ 'jig rten gyi

nor 'phrog pa dang/ ngotshamad pa rnams dang/ chos kyi mchod pa gcod par byed pa// ngotsha med pa dang 'dres pa rnams dang/ phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun dang/ mngon du gyur pa'i dge 'dun rnams kyi gos dang/

zas dang ma chadang stan dang/ nad kyi gsos sman dang/ yo byad gcod cing gang zag gir yongs su gzung ste/ bdag spyod par byed pa 'am/ khyim pa la sbyin pa 'byed pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/

de bzhin gshegs pa yengashes ma tog rdul bral byang chub dbang phyug yang dag mtho des/ theg pa gsum po dag gis rim gyis lung bstan to// snying rje chen po dang ldan ba gad su dag bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la
