pa dang tshan bo che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bud medagang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'atshatshan thosashing bzung ba de'i bud medakyi dngos po de tha ma pa yin par shes par bya'o/ pa
de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na gangadagamado 'dir bdang/ klog pa dang/ 'chad pa dang
gzhan dag la rgya cherayang dag par ston pa dang/ yi ger 'dri ba dang/ yi ger 'dA'i stsol pa dang/ glegs bam la bros te/ me tog dang bdug pa dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/
rgyal mtshan rnams kyis dkur bsti byed bab dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyis bu mo de dag la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla baiDUrma'i 'ododi'i mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs
kyir su bsgrags par bgyi'o// than rmi lam du'angasas rgyas kyi mtshan rna lam du re bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ tshon sna lnga ba'is kyis dkris te/ phyogs gtsang mar bzhagan/ gnamado 'di gnas
pa der/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stongagazhan yang machibar 'gyur ro/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin gshegs b sman gyi bla baiDUrma'i 'od de'i
mtshan dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyadapar rgyas pa'i m de 'di 'dzin pa de dag dus ma lags par 'gum par m 'gyur/ sus kyan dngas phrog par nus te/ phrogs na yang Hslar 'phrogs
par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'jam dpal de dobazhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// 'jam dpal dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bumo gang dag de
bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa byed pade dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku gzugs bya/ nyin zhag bdun du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'ison gnas la nye bar gnas par bya/
kha zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lus legs par bkrus te/ gos bzang po dris med pa ba gzhung phyogs gtsang ma me tog sna tshogs la ma bkram pa/ spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/ ras dang
gdugs dang/ rgyalamtshan snyatshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i sa phyogs su mamadapa'i sems dang/ rog pa med pa'i sems dang/ gnodasems med ba'i sems dang/ byams pa'i sems
dang/ gtang snyomasakyi sems dang/ mnyam pa'i sems su bya/ rol mo'isgyudang/ sil snyan dang/ klu dbyangs blangs zhing de bzhinagshegs pa'i sku gzugs de la bskor ba bya ste/ de'i sngon
gyi smon lam yang yid la bya zhing/ mdo'adi yang ston na/ gang bsamang dang/ gangasmosha ba'i bsamapa de thams cad yos su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gal tatshoring bar snyomananitshoring bor 'gyur ro//
bya/ gal te longs spyod dang ldan par smo nanalongs sbyoda'abyor ba 'gyur// gal te dbang phyug dbaldan pasmonatshogs chung dus rnyed par 'gyur ro// gal te bu 'dod nan bu red/
bar 'gyur bo/ gang dag sdug pa can gyi rmi lam s+sas sam/ gang dubya 'dang ltas ngana mthong ngam/ gnas gang du bkramashis pa brgya dag gnas par gyur pa la/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhi
rgyu gshegs pa sman gyi bla bi ma'a'od de pa mchod pa rnam pa sna tshog sakyis bkur ba byidan/ rmi lam napa dang/ ltas ngan pa dang/ bkra mi shis ba'i dngos po thoms cad mthong bar mi 'gyur lo/ gdag
me'i 'jig pa dang/ chusa'ajigs pa dang/ mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang/ dug gis 'jigs pa dang/ g.yang sas 'jigs pa dang/ glang po cho gtum bos 'jigs ba dang/ so ges 'jigs
pa dang/ stag gis 'jigasakha dang/ ngom dang dred dang/ sbrul gdug pasa'ajigs pa dang/ sdig pa dang rkang lag brgya bas 'jigs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de lamachodapa byas na/ 'ag
[%/ ]pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur// gang dag pa rol gyi dmagatshogs kyis 'jigs ba dang/ rkun pos 'jigs pa dang/ chom pos 'jigs ba dedag gisakyang de bzhin gshegs pa de
lamachod par bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dad pa'i gsakhu bas/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag srid 'tsho'i bar dugasum la skyabs su'adzanicing/ lhagazhanam 'tshan ba dang / gang dag 'phrul

kha'i gzhi lnga bo dag 'dzin pa dang/ gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi bcu bo 'di de 'dzin dang/ gang dag byang chub sems dang 'isdom pa'ibasub pa'i gzhibargya bo dag 'dzin pa dang/ khyim gyi gnas nas byung ba'i/

dge slong gang dag bslab ba'i gzhi nyis brgya lnga bcu bo dag 'dzin ba dang/ dge slong ma la gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi lngabargya bo dag 'dzin ba dang/ gang dag ji ltar yongs su gzung ba'i bslab ba'i sdom pa do dag/
gnang nas bslab pa'i gzhigang yang rung ba zhig las nyams par gyur te/ ngan 'gro song gas 'jigs skrag bgang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas na gyi bla baid+ma'i dade la mchod pa rnam pa
sna tshogs byed na/ de dag la ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal med par shes par bya'o// bud medagang la la bu btsa' ba'i dusan/ sdug bsngal m rungs pa khrag po'abazad pa myong ba des// bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bain+d+hama'i bod do la mchodan/ de myur du yongs su thar par 'gyur/ bu yang yan lagayongs su tshang bar btsa' zhing gzugs bzang ba dang/ mdzes pa dang/ blta na sdug
kha na dbang po rnob dang byed ldan pa dang/ nadamadacingaganod pa med bar 'gyur ro// de la mi gzhi bsamadangs 'phrog par ma nus so////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo gang gi phyir nga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs basman gyi bla bai rla'i 'od po'i yon tan brjod par khyed dad dam/ yisaches sam/ yang na khyodasangs rgyas kyi spyod yul
[7 ]thug/ khrab mo 'di la yid gnyis sam/ som nyi 'am/ the tsom za ba med dam/ des bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan ba kun dga' bos 'daskad ces gsol to// btsunab bam/
ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos rnams la yid gnyis sam/ som nyi ma/ the tsom 'tshal dmamachis so// de ci'i slad du zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa mas la
sku dang/ gsung dang thugasakyi kun tu spyod pa yongasum dag pa mamanga' ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das gdugs dang dgung zla 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba gsan rogs la ltung
yang gda'/ ri'i rgyal po ri reban gnas nas 'pho yang gda'i/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' gzhan du mi 'gyur lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasade ltar lags kyis kyang/ semaMs
can dad pa'i dibang po dang bral ba dgamachis te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyisangs rgyas kyag kyod yul 'dathos// de dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyuti/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan bad dra la
tsam gyis ji ltar shin tu yon tan dang/ phan yon du'agyur/mnas de dag ma dad cing yid machis te spong bas yug ring por gnod pa dang/ mi snyan ba dang/ mi bde ba dang rnam par ltung bar 'gyur ro//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de bzhinagshegs pa de'i mtshan su'i rna lam dugag par 'gyur pa de/ na'agro ngan songadu 'gro bar 'gyurab gnas medadage skabasam yin no//
kun dga' bo sangs rgyas rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi spyod yul na yid ches par daka'o/ kun dga' bo khyed dad cing yid ches ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin par
blta'o/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon bo skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams ma gtogs bar 'dinaM na thos dngarang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin no// zhun dga' bo ma'i
gyur pa red bar dka'o// dkon mchog gsum la dad cing gus pa'i ng redapar dka'o// de bzhin gshegs pa demtshan thog pa'i ngared bar shanicudakagokun dga' khobcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs basman kyi bla bai rla'i 'od de'i byang chung sems dba'i spyod pa de ni tshad med do// thabs makhas pa yang tshad med do// smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa yang tshad mad do// nga de bzhin
gshegs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsal ba'am/ bskalapa las lhag bar rgya cher yang dag par bshad par 'dod kyang baskal ba zad par 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
pasman gyi bla baiT+Thad+ma'i 'od de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyadabar rgyas pa'i mtha' rtogs par nama'agyur ro// yang de'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe chon po bskyabagrol
zhes bya ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzanas/ busamogayas pa'i lha ngasalabatsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thalamo sbyarab batud nas bcom ldan 'das
bka 'a daskad cesagasol to/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'adasasladagabagadama'adus na/ sems can na snyatshogs kyis yongs sug ri te/ yum mang po'i
brand kyis lus[¬©]sha bsashi/ bkres pa dang skoms pasagre ba dwangamachunaskams/ 'gum b.lan mngon du phyogs/ mdza' bshes dang/ tre du dang snagagaganyenA mtshams du ba rnams kyin
bskor/ phyogs rnams mun par mthong/ gshin rje'i ma rnams kyisan drangs te/ po'i lus 'di rtsal yang m par shes pa chos kyirgyal bo gshin rje'i mdun du khridatsang/ mi de dang lhan cig skye
pa lha slad bzhin 'brang ba gangalags bdes n/ des dge ba'am/ mi dge ba bgyis pa dethams cad legs par yi ge bris nas chos kyis rgyal bo gag la phul ba dang/ chos kyi rgyal
po gshani rjes de la dris gaMng brtags nas/ dge ba 'amam dgeb ji ltar gyis pa de bzhin du bsgo ba la gang dag nad pa de'i don tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla ma'i 'od de la
skyabasasumachi zhing/ 'di 'drab 'i sbyor bsamachod pa bgyidan/ de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing rmi lam rmis pa bzhin du bdag nyid kyis 'tshol ba'i gnas demachis te/ yang na ni gdugs
bdun/ yang na ni gdugasanyi shu rtsa gcig/ yang nan gdugs sumacu rtsa lnga/ yang nan gdugs bzhibcu rtsa dgul de'i rnam par shes pa slar ldog cing dran paredal de dge ba dang/ mi dge
0 ]ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa bdag nyid kyi mngon sum du 'gyur te/ srog gi slad du yang sdig pa'i lasamabgyid do// de lta lags bsadad ba'i'i ges kyi chu bam/ rigs kyi bumos/
de bzhin gshegs pa de lamachod par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan bkun dga' bos/ byang chub sems dpa' khaskyab grol la 'daskad ces snas so// rigs kyi bu ba lda
'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla baiDUrla'i 'od de la ji ltar macodabar bya/ byang chub sems dpa' bskyabagrolagyis smras l/ btsun pa kun dgab bgongadagad chen polas yongs su thar
par 'dod pa dedagags/ nad pa de'i don du nyin bdumtshan bdun du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong g sdom pa blang bar bya'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun lazas dang skom rnams dang/ yo
byad thams cad kyis ci nus sumachod pa dang rim gro bya'o// nyin lanagsum matshalan gsum dubcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla baid+ma'i 'od de'i mtshan yid la dran zhing/ mdo
snga 'a dilan bzhi bcu rtsa dgur gdon par bya'o// zhag bzhi bcu dgur mar ma bud par bya'o// sku gzugs bdun bya'o/ skugazugs re re'i spyan sngar dang mar me bdun bdun bzhag go/
ma mo'i 'o'i tshad kyang shing rta'i 'phang lotsamadzub ste/ cis kyang zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dguram mam zad bar bya'o// tshon snuljapa'i ba dan bzhicu rtsa dgu las lhag par bya'o/ btsun pa kun
@#/// dga' bo gzhan yang rgyal bo rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la nad kyi gnod pa 'am rang gi dmagatshog sasam/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi gnod pa 'am/ rgyu
skar gyi gnodapa a/ gza' zla ba'i gnod pa 'am/ gzaba'i ma'i gnod pa 'am/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang char gyi gnod pa bam/ than pa'i gnod pa yang rung ste/ gnod pa dang/ mdo/
(kha go ba dang/ 'khrug ba zhag nye bar gnas par gyur na/ rgyal bo rgyal rigs spyi bo dbang bskur ba des sems can thams cad l byams pa'i so mas su bya/ btson du bzung ba rnams btang bar bya

chang Da gong du smos pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa smanagyi bla blo'ozla'i 'od de la di lta bur mchod pa byas na/ rgyal porgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de'i dge ba'i rtsa bdedang/ bcom ldan

'dus de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai rla'i 'od de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyadapar gyis yul deb dang/ lo legs par 'gyur/ rlung dang char chu dug suljang zhing lo tog 'grub par 'gyur/ yul de na gnas pa'i

bya sems can thams cad kyang nad med pa dang/ bde ba dang/ mchog tu dga' bamang bar 'gyur/ yul der gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ 'byung po dang/ sha zam rug pas sems can rnams la gtso bar ma 'gyura'o/

ltas ngan pa thams cad mthong ba mi 'gyur// rgyal po rgyalarigs spyi bonas dbang skur bde'i tshe dang/ mdog dang/ stobs dang/ nad yodapa dang/ dbang phyugazhamasa mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de nas cho

dang ldan ba kun dga' bos byang chub sems dpa' bskyab gro'al 'di skad ces smras so// rigasakyi bu ltar tshe yongs su zad nas yang mngon par skye/ bya rgyu sems dang 'baskyabagrol gyis smras ba/ btsun pa
kun dga' bo dusam yan bar 'bad du yod par khyod kyis de bzhinagashegasapa lasamatho sam/ de'i phyi'i sngags dang/ sman gyi sbyor ba rnams bstanato// semAn+tan nad e btab pa la/ den tshebasamatshes
kyang sman dang ramagro byed pa dang/ ma ldan nam/ yang na/ snyanub smanam yin babyed ba yang yod de/'di'i dus ma yin pa'i chi ba dang po'o// dusam yin par 'chi ba gnyis pan/gang rgyal po'i chad pas
'chiba'i dus byed pa'o// dus ma yin par 'chibagasum ban/ gang dag ha cang bgamed de/ bag med bar gnasapa de dag lamam yin pa gang dag gi mdangs 'phrog pa'o// dus ma yin ng 'chib bzhi pa na/

gang dgamesatshag ste 'chi ba'i dus byed pa'o// dus ma yin pa'i chibasngabazhi/ gang dag chus 'chi bgo/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba drugangan gang dgasang ge dang/ stagadang wa dang sbrul dang/ gcan gzan khro/
bo'i nang du chud de 'chiba'o// dus ma yin bar 'achib bdunangan/ geng dgari'anas g.yang dultudaba'o// dusam yin par 'chib brgyad pan/ gang dag dugadang khyad stoudang/ las kyi sbyor bsagasod 'o

dus ma yin par 'chib dgu pan/gang dgazas dang skomamarnyed nasabakresal dang/ skom pas nyen te 'chi ba'i dus khyedapa'o//mdor na 'di dag nade bzhin gshegs pas dus ma yin bar 'chibachen por bstan pa ste/
gzhan yang dus ma yin par 'chiban/grasamedadabag tu med do// de nas 'khor der gnodasbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis 'dus par gyur te/ gnod spyan gyi sde dbonachen po ji'idzage

da dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rdo rje dang/ gnod na gyi sde dpon chen borgyana'adzin dang/ gnodan gyi dbo chen po bza' 'dzin dang/ gnod spyin gyi sdodapon chen borung dang/ gnodasbyin gyi sde dpochen po gnas

bcas dang/ gnod sbyan gyi sde dpon chen po dbang 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi snga dare zhachen po btung 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po sa'adzani dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sdo dbonachen pobasama'adzin dang/ gnod

sbyan gyi sde dpon chen po g.yo ba 'dzin dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen bo rdzogs byed de/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcu gnyis po de dag go/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po re re la yang g.yog gnodats+tshan bdun
'bum bdun 'bum yod pa ste/ de dag gisatshig gcig tu bcom ldan 'dasal 'disnyed ces gsol to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla baiDUrma'i 'od
de'i mtshan thos te/ bdag cagal yang n 'gror 'chiba'i'ajigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// des na bdag cag lhan cigatumathun bar ji srid 'tsho'i bar dusangs rgyas la skyabs sumachi'o// chos la skyabs su

mchi'o// dge 'dunal skyabs suma'i// sems can thams cad kyi don dang sman pa dang/ bde ba'i sladadu u0f97bar bgyi'o// bye brag tu nagrong ma/ grong khyer ram/ grong brdal 'a ma dgon pa'i gnas gangan mdo 'di

[0f7c]dpa dang/ gangan bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla baiT+Tham+ma'i 'od demtshan 'chang ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ ma gro byed pa'i sems na de dag la bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su
bskyang bar bgyi/ gnod pa thams cad las yongs su thar par bgyi/bsam ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyisdodapon chen po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba

byin te/ gnod sbyin gyi sdodapon chen po dag gang gi phyir khyed nga com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla ma'i 'od de la byas pa gzo zhe rjes su dran l/ soms can thams cad la phan pa'i phyire zhugs pa

legs so legs so// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu shes rab chung du kha ga 'dasnyam du sems te/ ji ltar na gangs rgyas kyi zhingagang+ga'i klung ga byi masnyed 'dasaban/ rnam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gsheg/

pa de ngag gamtshan thosab dang/ bzung ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyis yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pasalha'i bu blo chung du
de dgagasems yongs su rtogab thugs kyi mkhyen nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyizhing bskul ba zhes bya ba'ang nge 'dzani snyomasangar zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ting

nge 'dzin de lamanyam par bzhi gam thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad r bcugayos so// lha'itsan ngan gyi ma dang/ me tog ga sgron gyi char yang bab ba// de bzhin gshegs r
bdun po de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gshegs te/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lha'isajage'i khri la bzhugs shing/ byang chub sems dpo'

de thams cad kyis de'i skor/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yan dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen bo dang/ rgyal po dang blon po dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyis

yongs su bskor te chos ston cing/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bshAkya thub pa dang thabs gcig tu kun tu snang ngo// de nas lha'i bu de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngomatshar du gyur nas legs
so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thubapa la legs so legs so zhes gsol nas/ 'khor de thams cad kyis rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams las nges bar byang ba'i

me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ smog dang phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ sprad pa dang/ rgyan rnams dang 72rtsol mo'i sgra rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dga' mngon par mchod de/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/tshig
'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma sang rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisangs rgyus kyi yul dang/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par dang/ thabs lamakhas pa'i ngo mtshar du bgyi ba lags te/ sems can thams cad
sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa lags te/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'dalta bu thob par gyur cig cesasems can de dag thams cad kyis smon lamade skad btab bo// de nas 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la lan bdugaskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs bde dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/ kyis de bzhin/
gshegs pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ thabs la mkhasapa dang/ sems can yongs sus+san par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo// yang bcom ldan 'das ji ltaslad ma'i tshosladama'i dus
nasems can bsod nams chur/ bro nad kyis yongs su gzir ba/ gnod sems su gyur/ gza' dngargya skar gyi gnodang byungab/ 'chib dang/ dgra dang dgon pas gnod par gyur pa thams cad 'jigs pa
thams cad las bskyab pa dang/ mgon bgyi ba dang/ sems can de dag gis bcas sam/ bgragasasam/ yig 'dri ma yi gor 'dri'i sol tam/ 'donan de bzhin gshegs pas dgos pa dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa mthong ba dang/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs bar 'gyurang dang/ log par ltung bar mamachib dang/ dus ma lags pa 'gum pa ma 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa'isngon gyi smobu lam gyi byin
gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi tshig de lta bu bshad du gsol// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs sozhes bya bdun te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so//

'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ snying rje ba'i phyir khyod kyi spobs pa de ni di bzhi'i gshegs pa'i byazhigyi rlabs kyis skyes so// yang legs par rab tu nyon la yadel zung shig dang bshad do// 'jam dpal de bzhin
dgshegs pa'i tinge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa baiDUrma'ibodaces bya ba'i gzungs yod de/ rigs kyi bu bam/ rigs kyi bu mos sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems kyis gzungs de bzung
ngam bkrugs sam/ mchodanabasam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs shing/ de bzhin gshegs ba mthong bar 'gyur/ de lasakyi sgrib pa thamasacad rnam par dag pa'i sa=

rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpalagyis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa bskyud+ma'i 'od ces bgyi ba'i gzungs gang lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de

ra dgag gsungadabyangs gcig gis gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsalato// tad+ya thA gru me g+hum/ em/ de mihi/matim sa pa ta/ ta thA ga tasamAt+yA d+hiyete/ a te ma tepA le/ pA bshad+hani sarba pA paM sha ya/

ma ma bud+d+he/ bud d+hod ta le/ ume ku me bud+d+ha k+She tra pa ri sho d+hani/ d+ha me/ ni d+ha me/ ma ru me ru/ ma ru sha kha re/ sarba a kA lami tun bA ra Ni/ bud+d+hA su bud+d+he/ budaa d+him+mo tin/ kun tu me/ sarba de bA/ sa me as me/ sa man ha

ranatu sarba bud+d+ha badz+his tu/ shamashame pra Amanatume/ sarbaa tu pa dra ba bya d+haya/ pU ra Ne/b+hu ra Ne/ pUrayame/ sarbaAshAriDUrlabrate b+hA se/ sarbapA paMk+Shayang ka ra swAhA// 'gazusa'adabaka'al pa'i tshe/

snang bal bo byung ste sa chen po g.yos nas/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa dag snang ngo// 'khor ji lta dzaltar lhags pa des kyang/ lha'i spos dang/ bdug pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod nas/ legs
so zhes bya ba gsol te/ lan bdunabaskor ba byas so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces bka' stsalato// rigs kyi ya/ gsabumo gang lazhig gzungs 'dir cang ma/ glog
gam/ mchodadam/ gtsangam byas te/ phyogs gtsang mar 'phags pa'i lam yanalag brgyadadang ldan par byas la/ sems can thams cad la mchog dusAngarje bas/ des de bzhin gshegs pa bdun po de dag gi
gzugs byas la/ de bzhin gshegs ba 'di galame tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ mar me dang/ spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ rol mo'i sgra dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dana rnams kyis mchod pa byed cing/ tshig bdun/
du'aphags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la gnas te/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag lan stong rtsa brgyad du bton na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgongs par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dapa' thamasacad sems
bar 'gyur/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyang yang dag par srung bar 'gyur/ lha thams cad dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa thams cad dang/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang yongs
su bskyab par 'gyur/ mtshams me da pal la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ nad thams cad [‚Äù ''']kyis ma btab par 'gyur/ ring du 'tsho bar
'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yongasasu thar par 'gyur/ 'chib dang dgradang/ dgon pa'i gnod pa dang/ 'thab pa dang/ rtsodapa dang/ 'gyed pa thamA cad btu
zhi bar 'gyur/ dgra thams cad kyi dbang du mi 'gro bar 'gyur/ ci bsams pa'i bsam ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' la gan rdo rje dang/
lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang/ rgyal pochen po bzhi bo de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thar mo sbyab btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de

ts+tshA bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyisonalamagyi khyad par rgyas pa yang thos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mngon du mthong ste/ mchod pa bgyis so// yang bcom ldan 'dasu sa phyogs
glu ganganade bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan dang/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag spyod pa der bdag cag g.yog dang bcas te mchi bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig 'chang ba dang/
klog bdamachod par bgyid ba dang/ yi ger 'dri'i ba dang/ yi ger 'dripisolabader bdag cag mthun par lhan cig tu mchis te/ rig kyi bu'am rigyi bumo 'am rgya la po 'am rgyal de'i khron po/

mdosI'i dbang po 'dzin pa dang/ 'dri ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis bsrung bar ba// grong dang grong khyer dang/ phyogs kyang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi// 'tshad dang/ dgradang/ dgen
ba dang nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/bdag cag 'di bzhin gshegs pa dang/ sems can thamAgal byas pagazo ba lags te/ dusam 'gas bar 'gum pa thams cad bzlog bar bgyi'o// 'thab pa dang/
0 'thab mo dang/ rtsod ba dang/ 'gyed thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// ltar bsams ba dang/ sems yid bde ba dang/ longs sbyodadang/ dbang phyug dang/ nor dang/ 'bru rnams 'phel bar bgyi'o/thamA

cad du bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi ring gi bro bor ba dang/ dam bcas pa 'di dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bumo sasudran bir bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ a h+phum sgyu tar glu/ mam sgyu/ gyur/

tsA b+hu te/gragranusmra/ dzudzu re/ dzu'i sAhA/ gang la lazhig de bzhin gshegaba'i mtshan rnams dang/ gzungs kyi tshig 'di dag 'chang ba dang/ gog pa dang/ yi ger 'dri'i ba dang/ yi gor 'dir stsol pa dang/ rab tu

gus pa'i machod pa bgyid pa den ngan song gsum dum tshibar 'bad par bgyi ste/ ji bla na med pa yang dag par rdo gas pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog par 'gyur/ltar 'tsholaba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur

de bzhin gshegapamathobar 'gyur/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/nga nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' gan dze rjesade bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to//rigs

kyi bu ma/'gagyi bumo mdosdo'i dbang po 'dzin bdag gdon tu bdag gis gzungs kyi gsangasngagasakyi gzhi rnams rab tu stsal bar bgyi yis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol// de nas sangs

rgyas bcomalda'adas de dag gis gsung gcig gis byang chub semAdapalag na rdo rjel legs so zhes bya ba byin te/lag na rdo rje legaso legasaso// 'gan rdo rje khyod la dgos zin gyis mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la phan pa 'dod pa

dang rebathams cad yongs su rdzogs bar bya ba'i phyir/gzus kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smos shig de nas byang chub sems dang na sems dang ba ga ba ga de rjes ga tshud kyi gsang sngag kyi gzhi 'di

dag skyas bod yang dag par rdzogapa'igs rgyab bdun bo dag la phyag 'tshako rdo rdzo'adzani thams cad la phyag 'tshal//tad+ya thA/ obadzebadzra/ma hA badzebadzrapAg rU ri/ des ma sa masaman ta/a pra ti ha ta badzra/ mgam pu sha man ta/

saja bya rtaya/ kur kuru sarbakam nI sa ma ya ma nu smar b+hag ban 'adzrapANaM/sarba Ashamache/pA ripUr ya swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig de bzhi gshegag pa 'di dag gamtshan dang/ sngon gyi snyolan gyi khyad nga brgyag pa

pa dang chos kyi mgrangs 'di'achang ba dang/ klog pa de'i re ba thams cad bdag gis yosubasang bar bgyigo/ don thams cad kyang bsgrub par bgyi'o// gal te des b.lug mthong bar tshal na/chos kyi mgrangs 'damige 'dri'i skul bar bgyi/

de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag gi sku gzugs bdun kyang bgyi rdo rje'adzan kyang sku gdung dang bcas par bgyi/de bzhin gshegs bde dag la yang ji skadagong du smosab bzhin du sbyos dang/ bdug pa dang/ ma che dang/ ngab dang/ rgyan

rgyu dang rol mo'i sgra dang/ sal snyan dang/ theg rdzob bdams kyis mchod de bskor bar bgyi/gzuagyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag kyang gdon bar bgyi/sems can thams cad la yang phan pa'i sogs dang/ byams pa'i nyin

su bgyi 'phags pa'i lam yan lagabargyad pa'i bse naganyisal gnas te/ lan gsum khrus bgyi zhingegs lan gsum brje bar gyi tshes brgyang nas brtsamasate/ zla ba ma'i bco lnga'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du rig sngags

lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlasan/de la bdag gis rmi lam du mthong bstsal pa bgyi/'bel ba'i bka'amachid kyang bgyi/rebathams cad kyang yongs su bkang bar bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor de thams cad kyis

byang chub sems dpa'i lag na rdo rdzol legs so// zhe bya bsite/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis gzungs kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi'adi dag legs par sasapa legasalegasaso// de bzhin gshegs ba de dag gis kyang

bdaskad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje pad kyis sems can thams cad kyi donadang/ na pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i phyi'i/gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag byin gyis brlabs so// de nas sangs/

rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis brgya bzhidang/ tshag ba dang/ 'jig rtenaskyobarnanA les tedaka' stsal ba/grogs po dag khyed la chos kyi rnam grangasa'adi/ gu gtad kyis/ khyedas nas kyang chog kyi rnam grangs chen

bo deban gshegs podang mtshungs pa// sdig pa thams cad byang ba byed ba/re bathams cad mos su song ba'adi phyi 'tsho phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya thamakhasems bsod nams chung dudam pachos spongakha/'phags
palaskur pa 'debs ba rnams kyi lag tu myur du nub bam 'gyur bar srungs shig/ de nas tshod ldan bdun dgostan las langs te/ blogogo brag pa gcig tugakhra nas busachogayas pa'ilha nga sa la btsugs te/
bcom ldan 'adas ga la ba de logs suthalaMm sbyor ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'a das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasachos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming lags/ 'didziltar gzung bar bgyi/bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun gyi sngon
gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ byang chub sems dang 'al gnardo rjes dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang thup+pashig/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad ma par skyong zhing re ba
thams cad yongs su skyong ba zhes bya bar yang zungashag/ gnod sbyin gyisde dpon chen po bcu gnyis kyis dam bcas pa zhes bya bar yang zung gaMg/ bcom ldan 'das kyiri skad ces bka' stsal nas/
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rjod ng/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ lha dang/ ma dang lha mi
yin dang/ dri zer bcas ba'i 'jig rten yi rangasate/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba la mngon par bstod do// 'phags ba de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad
par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'amado brgyad brgya ba rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mikhan bo dzan ma du dang/ shi len dra bo d+hi dang/ zhuchen gyi btsad
banang+ge ye shesasdes bsgyurang zhus te/ skad gsar cad kyis kyang bcos te gtan laphab pa// bya ba'i rgyud du gtogs so//
